Program.FullCard.Name: Berserker Rage
Program.FullCard.Rules:
You may destroy any number of abilities attached to your hero.
Ongoing: Your hero has +1 ATK while attacking for each 5 damage on it.
Program.FullCard.Rulings: [FoO Rules FAQ] You can play this card even if your hero has no abilities attached. Your hero has +1 ATK while attacking if it has 5 to 9 damage, +2 if it has 10 to 14, and so on.

Program.FullCard.Name: Berserker Stance
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Ongoing: If your hero would deal damage, it deals that amount of damage plus 1 instead.
If your hero would be dealt damage, it is dealt that amount of damage plus 1 instead.

Program.FullCard.Name: Berserking
Program.FullCard.Notes: From the Through the Dark Portal FAQ
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Troll Hero Required
Ongoing: When your hero is dealt damage, put a berserk counter on Berserking.
When your hero attacks, remove all berserk counters from Berserking. Your hero has +1 ATK this combat for each counter you removed.
Program.FullCard.Rulings: [TDP Rules FAQ] You add one berserk counter for each packet dealt to your hero, regardless of the size of that packet.

Program.FullCard.Name: Besh'iah
Program.FullCard.Rules: Destroy an ally in your party Destroy target ability.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "A favorable wind blows this day. It is a sign of things to come."
Program.FullCard.Name: Besora Galefeather
Program.FullCard.Rules: Assault 2 (+2 ATK on your turn)

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Let loose da animal within bruddah!" - Sen'zir Beastwalker
Program.FullCard.Name: Bestial Rage
Program.FullCard.Rules: Ongoing: Your hero has Assault 1 for each Hunter and Warrior you control.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "If ya become one wit da beasts, then not even death can separate joo, bruddah." - The Longeye
Program.FullCard.Name: Bestial Resurgence
Program.FullCard.Rules: Put up to three Pets with different names from your graveyard into your hand.

Program.FullCard.Name: Bestial Swiftness
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Beast Mastery Hero Required
Ongoing: Target Pet has ferocity this turn.

Program.FullCard.Name: Bestial Wrath
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Beast Mastery Hero Required
Target Pet has +3 ATK this turn. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to it this turn.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "We still have much to do, but our work here will be much more manageable thanks to your efforts." - Stefan Vadu
Program.FullCard.Name: Betrayal
Program.FullCard.Rules:
On your turn, destroy an ally in your party and pay 1 to complete this quest.
Reward: Draw a card.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "The ends always justify the means, especially in war." - Boarguts the Impaler
Program.FullCard.Name: Betrayer of Humanity
Program.FullCard.Rules: As an additional cost to play this weapon, destroy a Human or Orc you control.

Program.FullCard.Name: Bhenn Checks-the-Sky
Program.FullCard.Rules: When Bhenn Checks-the-Sky enters play, you may exhaust target ally.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Killing for survival is savage. Killing for sport is civilized.
Program.FullCard.Name: Big Game Hunter
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Pay 2 to complete this quest.
Reward: Reveal the top four cards of your deck. Put a revealed equipment card into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Fools are quick to dismiss what they don't understand as evil. I see what I do as a series of calculated risks in exchange for greater power and insight. Oh, with demons."
Program.FullCard.Name: Bildros Nullvoid
Program.FullCard.Rules: 2, Flip Bildros Pet cards in your hand are instant this turn.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "I wonder when I'm gonna have to pay for all this power…" - Bimble Blackout's last journal entry
Program.FullCard.Name: Bimble Blackout
Program.FullCard.Rules: Whem Bimble is removed from the game from anywhere, draw a card.

Program.FullCard.Name: Binding Heal
Program.FullCard.Rules: Your hero heals 5 damage from itself and 5 damage from another target hero or ally.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "This fight is slipping away from you." - Kana Nassis
Program.FullCard.Name: Bindings of Lightning Reflexes
Program.FullCard.Notes: Available as part of Crafting Redemption Program (The Hunt for Ilidan) - requires 4 Primal Air, 4 Primal Water, 4 Heavy Knothide Leather, 12 Wind Scales, 4 Heart of Darkness
Program.FullCard.Rules:
When you play an ability, put a bolt counter on Bindings of Lightning Reflexes.
Heroes and allies in combat with your hero have -1 ATK for each bolt counter.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: In these dire times, sacrifices must often be made for the greater good. - Saeryn Dusksorrow
Program.FullCard.Name: Bitter Cold Armguards
Program.FullCard.Rules: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 1 frost damage to target hero or ally you control.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "You just need to catch him to stop him, but good luck with that whole catching thing. He's more slippery than an Umbrafen eel." - Rotun Daggerhand
Program.FullCard.Name: Bitties
Program.FullCard.Rules: At the end of your turn, if Bitties has damage, destroy him.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Wielding fel magic is like fixing a machine - you have to break a few things to get it to work."
Program.FullCard.Name: Bizzik Sparkcog
Program.FullCard.Rules: , Destroy an ally in your party Draw a card.

Program.FullCard.Name: Black Amnesty
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Your hero has dual wield.
1, If your hero is defending against an ally, remove your hero from combat.

Program.FullCard.Name: Black Blood
Program.FullCard.Rules: Your hero deals 5 shadow damage to target ally. If you control a Disease, your hero also deals 5 shadow damage to target hero.

Program.FullCard.Name: Black Bow of the Betrayer
Program.FullCard.Rules:
When you strike with Black Bow of the Betrayer, your hero has long-range this combat.
[Hunter]: When an ally is dealt combat damage with Black Bow of the Betrayer, ready up to four of your resources.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Forging is complete when the anvil shatters.
Program.FullCard.Name: Black Felsteel Bracers
Program.FullCard.Notes: Available as part of Crafting Redemption Program - requires 15 Primal Shadow, 6 Felsteel Bar, 1 Primal Nether
Program.FullCard.Rules: Put a +1 ATK counter on target weapon.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Alexstrazsa herself has bestowed this gift unto me, and I will not take it for granted." - Kana Nassis
Program.FullCard.Name: Black Ice
Program.FullCard.Rules: When you strike with this weapon on an opponent's turn, your hero may deal 1 frost damage to target hero or ally. A character dealt damage this way can't attack this turn.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: This crossbow was once a weapon of the shadow hunter Vosh'gajin
Program.FullCard.Name: Blackcrow
Program.FullCard.Rules: When you strike with Blackcrow, your hero has long-range this combat. (Defenders deal on combat damage to it.)

Program.FullCard.Name: Blackened Spear
Program.FullCard.Rules: Blackened Spear has +1 ATK if an ally with arcane torrent is in your party. This is also true for berserking, hardiness, war stomp, and will of the forsaken.

Program.FullCard.Name: Blackout Truncheon
Program.FullCard.Rules: When Blackout Truncheon enters play, exhaust target hero or ally. That character can't ready during its controller's next ready step.

Program.FullCard.Name: Blade Flurry
Program.FullCard.Notes: From the Through the Dark Portal FAQ
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Combat Hero Required
Ongoing: When your hero deals combat damage with a weapon to an ally, you may have your hero deal that much melee damage to another target hero or ally.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Its dark magic penetrates well beyond the bounds of the mortal realm.
Program.FullCard.Name: Blade of the Empty Void
Program.FullCard.Rules: While this weapon is in your graveyard, your hero has Protector.

Program.FullCard.Name: Blade of Unquenched Thirst
Program.FullCard.Rules: At the end of your turn, if no damage was dealt with Blade of Unquenched Thirst this turn, destroy it.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Give yourself to the flame of this blade, and your enemies will be consumed by its power." - Vor'na the Disciplined
Program.FullCard.Name: Blade of Wizardry
Program.FullCard.Rules: 1, , Discard an ability card Destroy target ally.

Program.FullCard.Name: Blade Twisting
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Combat Hero Required
Ongoing: When your hero deals combat damage to an ally, destroy it, and it’s controller discards a card.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: The deeds may be forgotten, but the name lives forever.
Program.FullCard.Name: Bladebreaker Gauntlets
Program.FullCard.Rules:
When this armor enters play, you may destroy target armor or weapon.
Opposing weapons have -1 ATK.
Opposing armor have -1 [Def].

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Ours is the TRUE Horde! The only Horde!" - Kargath Bladefist
Program.FullCard.Name: Bladefist's Breadth
Program.FullCard.RequireClass: Druid, Hunter, Paladin, Rogue, Shaman, Warrior
Program.FullCard.Rules: When you play a weapon, ready your hero.

Program.FullCard.Name: Blademistress Lyss
Program.FullCard.Rules: When an opposing hero or ally deals damage to Lyss, ready up to that many of your resources.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Don't start something that will end with your corpse in rags."
Program.FullCard.Name: Blaine Roberts
Program.FullCard.Rules: 2, Flip Blaine Destroy target armor or item.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Fire burns everyone - it doesn't care who you are!"
Program.FullCard.Name: Blaize Brightspark
Program.FullCard.Rules: 1, Flip Blaize Blaize deals 3 fire damage to target hero or ally that was dealt fire damage this turn.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "You don’t want to see what happens…" - Kana Nassis
Program.FullCard.Name: Blast Nova
Program.FullCard.Rules: Flip Magtheridon's Lair

Program.FullCard.Name: Blast Trap
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Trap (You may exhaust your defending hero rather than pay this card's cost.)
Destroy target attacking ally with cost 4 or more.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Time to turn up the heat!"
Program.FullCard.Name: Blast Wave
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Fire Hero Required
Your hero deals 2 fire damage to each opposing hero and ally. A character dealt damage this way can't protect this turn.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Safe? When was the last time you had any REAL fun doing something safe?" - Maxima Blastenheimer
Program.FullCard.Name: Blastenheimer 5000 Ultra Cannon
Program.FullCard.Rules: Ongoing: 3, You may put an ally card from your hand into play. If you do, destroy it at the start of the next turn.

Program.FullCard.Name: Blastershot Launcher
Program.FullCard.Rules:
When you strike with Blastershot Launcher, your hero has long-range this combat.
Hunter: When Blastershot Launcher enters play, your hero deals 3 ranged damage to target hero or ally.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "You can crunch numbers and probabilities all you want; what it all boils down to is fire, baby - FIRE!" - Blaize Brightspark
Program.FullCard.Name: Blaze
Program.FullCard.Rules: Your hero deals 1 fire damage to target ally for each card in your hand.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "The dancing flames are quite mesmerizing, are they not?"
Program.FullCard.Name: Blazemistress Lindsey
Program.FullCard.Rules: , Discard an ability This ally deals 4 fire damage to target hero or ally.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "How can the Scourge hope to escape while the Light now rides these golden wings?" - Durizon, Champion of A'dal
Program.FullCard.Name: Blazing Hippogryph
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Argent Crusade Reputation
Ready a location you control.
When you place a resource face up, your hero may heal all damage from target Unique ally you control.
(Mounts can't attack or be attacked.)

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "You've got a little something on your armor." - Kaniya
Program.FullCard.Name: Bleed
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Attach to target hero or ally.
Ongoing: At the start of your turn, destroy Bleed if attached character is undamaged. Otherwise, your hero deals 2 melee damage to it.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "You can try all you want, but you aren't taking me down!" - Addisyn
Program.FullCard.Name: Blessed Defense
Program.FullCard.Rules: Target ally is a protector this turn. Prevent all damage that it would be dealt while defending this turn.

Program.FullCard.Name: Blessed Life
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Holy Hero Required
Ongoing: If your hero would be dealt damage, you can put Blessed life into to your hand. If you do, prevent that damage.

Program.FullCard.Name: Blessed Medallion of Karabor
Program.FullCard.Rules: Remove Blessed Medallion of Karabor from the game Move to the right of another friendly player. Use only on your turn.

Program.FullCard.Name: Blessed Protector
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Your hero has protector this turn.
Draw a card.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Cenarius's blessings offer more than the simple mending of flesh and bone." - Arktos
Program.FullCard.Name: Blessing of Cenarius
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Attach to target ally.
Ongoing: Attached ally has +1 / +1.
When attached ally is destroyed, you may draw a card.

Program.FullCard.Name: Blessing of Defense
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Attach to target ally.
Ongoing: Attached ally has +5 ATK while defending.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Go forward with the strength of heroes, and let foulness break itself upon the power of your mandate."
Program.FullCard.Name: Blessing of Divinity
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Attach to target ally.
Ongoing: Attached ally has +1 ATK and +1 health.
When attached ally becomes exhausted, your hero heals 1 damage from it.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Those who walk the path of the righteous ned not fear restraint.
Program.FullCard.Name: Blessing of Freedom
Program.FullCard.Notes: From the Through the Dark Portal FAQ
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Attach to target hero or ally in your party.
Ongoing: Attached character is untargetable.
At end of turn, destroy Blessing of Freedom.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "And you thought things couldn't get any worse for you…" - Addisyn
Program.FullCard.Name: Blessing of Kings
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Protection Hero Required
Ongoing: Each ally in your party has +X ATK / +X health, where X is its cost.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "You have my protection. Allay your fear and charge!" - Vakeron
Program.FullCard.Name: Blessing of Liberty
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Attach to target friendly non-hero card.
Ongoing: Attached card has Untargetable.
Death Rattle (When this ability enters your graveyard from anywhere.): Target friendly non-hero has Untargetable this turn.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Bestowed upon the worthy, increased might can facilitate great deeds.
Program.FullCard.Name: Blessing of Might
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Attach to target hero or ally.
Ongoing: Attached character has +1 ATK while attacking.

Program.FullCard.Name: Blessing of Protection
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Attach to target hero or ally in your party.
Ongoing: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to and dealt by attached character.
At end of turn, destroy Blessing of Protection.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: A true hero is willing to bear the burdens of others.
Program.FullCard.Name: Blessing of Sacrifice
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Attach to target ally in your party.
Ongoing: If attached ally would be dealt damage, that much damage is dealt to your hero instead.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Why is he laughing?" - Blaine Roberts
Program.FullCard.Name: Blessing of Salvation
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Ongoing: When Blessing of Salvation enters play, choose a friendly player.
That player is untargetable.

Program.FullCard.Name: Blessing of Sanctuary
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Protection Hero Required
Attach to target hero or ally.
Ongoing: Prevent all combat damage that attached character would be dealt. When damage that an attacking ally would deal is prevented this way, destroy that ally.
At end of turn, destroy Blessing of Sanctuary.

Program.FullCard.Name: Blessing of the Heavens
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Attach to target ally.
Ongoing: Attached ally has +2 ATK / +2 health.
When attached ally is destroyed, you may put Blessing of the Heavens from its owner's graveyard into his hand.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "We are all brothers and sisters in the eyes of the Light." - Jaenel
Program.FullCard.Name: Blessing of the Kindred
Program.FullCard.Rules:
When this ability enters play, name a class.
Ongoing: Friendly allies of that class have +1 / +1.

Program.FullCard.Name: Blessing of the Martyr
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Attach to target ally.
Ongoing: Attached ally has +2 ATK while attacking.
When attacked ally is destroyed, its owner puts it from his graveyard into hand.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Remain devout in your faith to the Light, and you too shall be rewarded." - Auryna the Lightsworn
Program.FullCard.Name: Blessing of the Templar
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Attach to target hero.
Ongoing: Attached hero has Assault 3 and Mend 3.

Program.FullCard.Name: Blessing of Trials
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Attach to target ally. The next time it would be dealt damage by an opposing hero or ally this turn, prevent that damage and put that many strength counters on Blessing of Trials.
Ongoing: Attached ally has +1 ATK / +1 health for each strength counter.

Program.FullCard.Name: Blessing of Virtue
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Attach to target ally.
Ongoing: Attached ally has +2 / +2, and damage that it would deal is unpreventable.
Stash (As this enters your resource row, you may have it enter face up. Immediately turn it face down.): Damage that allies you control would deal is unpreventable this turn.

Program.FullCard.Name: Blessing of Wisdom
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Attach to target hero or ally.
Ongoing: Attached character has " Draw a card."

Program.FullCard.Name: Blind
Program.FullCard.Rules: Target player can't play cards this turn.
Program.FullCard.Rulings: [MoL Rules FAQ] That player can still propose attacks, use powers, complete quests, and place resources as usual.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Never doubt the Light's ability to show you a better path." - Katianna
Program.FullCard.Name: Blind Faith
Program.FullCard.Rules: Ongoing: At the start of your turn, you may discard your hand. If you do, reveal the top three cards of your deck. Put a revealed ability card into hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.

Program.FullCard.Name: Blindside
Program.FullCard.Rules: Each raiding player removes his hand from the game. At the end of your next turn, put each card removed this way into its owner's hand.

Program.FullCard.Name: Bling
Program.FullCard.Rules: Ongoing: You can have up to ten Rings.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "A well-timed blink can be the difference between a good story and a tearful eulogy."
Program.FullCard.Name: Blink
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Draw a card.
If your hero is defending, remove all attackers from combat.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Terokkar Forest is a bad place to travel if you're jumpy.
Program.FullCard.Name: Blinky
Program.FullCard.Rules:
3 Remove Blinky from the game and put a warp counter on him.
3, Remove a warp counter Put Blinky into play. Use only if Blinky is removed from the game.
Program.FullCard.Rulings: [MoL Rules FAQ] Blinky enters play ready and without damage, because all counters (including damage) are removed from a card as it changes zones.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Sometimes, the direct approach works best.
Program.FullCard.Name: Blistering Fire
Program.FullCard.Rules: Your hero deals 3 fire damage to target hero.

Program.FullCard.Name: Blizzard
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Ongoing: At the start of each opponent's turn, your hero deals 1 frost damage to each hero and ally in that opponent's party. A character dealt damage this way can't attack this turn.
When a card leaves your hand, destroy Blizzard.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "What this fight needs is a little Blizzazz!"
Program.FullCard.Name: Blizzazz
Program.FullCard.Rules: When Blizzazz enters play, draw a card.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "There is only one way to ease the pain: death." - Rantuko Grimtouch
Program.FullCard.Name: Blood Boil
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Destroy and number of Diseases you control.
Your hero deals 2 shadow damage to each opposing ally for each Disease destroyed this way.

Program.FullCard.Name: Blood Chill
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Attach to target hero.
Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 1 frost damage to attached hero.
If damage is dealt this way, exhaust each opposing hero or ally with Protector.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Be prepared for the beating of a lifetime.
Program.FullCard.Name: Blood Frenzy
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Arms Hero Required
Ongoing: Heroes and allies in your party have +1 ATK while in combat with heroes and allies with an attachment.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Lok-tar ogar!"
Program.FullCard.Name: Blood Fury
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Orc Hero Required
Blood Fury enters play with X fury counters on it.
Ongoing: Your hero has +1 ATK while attacking for each fury counter on Blood Fury.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Do your duty to the Horde, and join the fray!"
Program.FullCard.Name: Blood Guard Gulmok
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Protector
When another Horde ally enters your party, you may destroy target ally.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "If'n I taste my own blood, I know I'm doin' somethin' right."
Program.FullCard.Name: Blood Guard Mal'wani
Program.FullCard.Rules: Blood Guard Mal'wani has +1 ATK for each damage on him.

Program.FullCard.Name: Blood is Life, The
Program.FullCard.Rules:
During your turn, destroy an ally in your party and pay 1 to complete this quest.
Reward: Your hero heals damage from itself equal to that ally's health.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Is that all you need?"
Program.FullCard.Name: Blood Knight Haeleth
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Protector
Once per turn: 2 Haeleth heals 2 damage from target hero or ally.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Death to all who oppose the blood elves!"
Program.FullCard.Name: Blood Knight Kyria
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Protector
When you play an ability, Kyria heals 4 damage from target hero or ally.

Program.FullCard.Name: Blood Knight Tarae
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Protector
1 Remove target ability card in a graveyard from the game. If you do, Tarae heals 1 damage from target hero or ally.
Program.FullCard.Rulings: [MoL Rules FAQ] This power requires two targets, and so its effect is not interrupted if only one becomes illegal in response. It can be used even if all characters in play have no damage or can’t be healed.

Program.FullCard.Name: Blood Lord Vorath
Program.FullCard.Rules: Flip Vorath, remove a Scourge ally in your graveyard from the game Vorath deals 1 shadow damage to target ally for each ally in its controller's graveyard.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Your weakness will soon spread like a plague to all those who fight beside you. - Randolphe Mortimer
Program.FullCard.Name: Blood Plague
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Attach to target hero.
Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 1 shadow damage to attached hero.
If an ally in attached hero's party would be dealt damage, it is dealt that much +1 instead.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Every victorious battle empowers our pursuit of vengeance." - Highlord Darion Mograine
Program.FullCard.Name: Blood Presence
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Ongoing: If your hero would deal damage, it deals that much +1 instead.
When your hero deals damage, it heals 1 damage from itself.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "There are times when blood is stronger than steel." - Erondra Frostmoon
Program.FullCard.Name: Blood Rune
Program.FullCard.Rules:
As an additional cost to play, remove an equipment in your graveyard from the game.
Ongoing: You pay 1 less to play your next card this turn.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: As the channelers extract the blood of Magtheridon, the legion of fel orcs continues to grow.
Program.FullCard.Name: Blood Siphon
Program.FullCard.Rules: Ongoing: Destroy Blood Siphon Draw three cards.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "One after another they fell to his blade, as the rest of us looked on in horror." - Emek
Program.FullCard.Name: Blood Strike
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Your hero deals 2 melee damage to target ally.
That ally has -1 health this turn for each Disease you control.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: This cloak of Orbaz Bloodbane imbues the wearer with his latent aggression.
Program.FullCard.Name: Bloodbane's Fall
Program.FullCard.Rules: Your hero has Assault 1. (+1 ATK on your turn.)

Program.FullCard.Flavor: A blade that has tasted blood develops a thirst for it.
Program.FullCard.Name: Bloodbath
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Traitor Hero Required
Ongoing: 1, Destroy an ally in your party Put a +1 ATK counter on each of your weapons.

Program.FullCard.Name: Bloodblade
Program.FullCard.Rules: Bloodblade can attack only heroes.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: The eyes of a raptor reveal a feral, vicious intelligence at work.
Program.FullCard.Name: Bloodclaw

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Have you heard of my brothers? No? Good."
Program.FullCard.Name: Bloodeye
Program.FullCard.Rules: Bloodeye can attack only heroes.

Program.FullCard.Name: Bloodfang Hood
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Exhaust target hero or ally. Use only on your turn.
When you play a Rogue ability, ready Bloodfang hood.

Program.FullCard.Name: Bloodfang Pants
Program.FullCard.Rules:
When you play a Rogue ability, you may pay 1.
If you do, your hero deals 1 melee damage to target exhausted hero or ally.

Program.FullCard.Name: Bloodied Arcanite Reaper
