This equipment has +3 ATK for each heirloom counter on it.
Stash (As this enters your resource row, you may have it enter face up. Immediately turn it face down.): Add an heirloom counter to target equipment you control.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "It's scary even when someone other than an ogre mage casts it." - Moala Stonebinder
Program.FullCard.Name: Bloodlust
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Horde Hero Required
Heroes and allies in your party have +2 ATK while attacking heroes this turn.

Program.FullCard.Name: Bloodlust Brooch
Program.FullCard.Rules: When your hero deals combat damage, put that many Fanatic ally tokens into play with 1 [Melee] ATK / health.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: More pain, more gain.
Program.FullCard.Name: Bloodrage
Program.FullCard.Rules:
As an additional cost to play Bloodrage, put 2 damage on your hero.
Draw two cards.
Ongoing: At the start of your turn, put 1 damage on your hero and draw a card.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: After years of raiding the waters of Azeroth, the naga have acquired a treasury for themselves."
Program.FullCard.Name: Bloodsea Brigand's Vest
Program.FullCard.Rules: 2, Destroy Bloodsea Brigand's Vest Put the top two cards of your deck into your resource row face down and exhausted.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Blood is what it wants, and blood is what it'll get - one way or another.
Program.FullCard.Name: Bloodseeker
Program.FullCard.Rules:
When you strike with Bloodseeker, your hero has long-range this combat.
At the end of your turn, if no damage was dealt with Bloodseeker this turn, put 3 damage on your hero.

Program.FullCard.Name: Bloodskull Destroyer
Program.FullCard.Rules: 1, Destroy Bloodskull Destroyer Destroy target ally with protector.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Doom comes for you, and it takes pleasure in your resistance."
Program.FullCard.Name: Bloodsoul
Program.FullCard.Rules: Bloodsoul can attack only heroes.

Program.FullCard.Name: Bloodstained Ravager Gauntlets
Program.FullCard.Rules: Double target weapon's ATK this turn.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Come with me, mon. The Soulflayer is waiting."
Program.FullCard.Name: Bloodtusk
Program.FullCard.Rules:
5, Flip Bloodtusk Discard your hand. Each opponent discards a card for each card you discarded this way. Use only on your turn.
Hakkari

Program.FullCard.Flavor: The armaments of the Deathsworn will be Illidan's undoing.
Program.FullCard.Name: Bloodwarder's Rifle
Program.FullCard.Rules: Your hero has long-range.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Take one more step and you will become my shooting post."
Program.FullCard.Name: Bloodwatcher Denissa
Program.FullCard.Rules: When an opposing ally enters play, Denissa deals 1 ranged damage to it.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Within all of us burns a desire to do more with ourselves. . ." - Ivan, Bladewind Brute
Program.FullCard.Name: Bloody Grip
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Attach to target weapon.
Ongoing: As this ability enters play, choose one: This ability has "Attached weapon has +3 ATK"; or this ability has "You pay 3 less to strike with attached weapon."

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Death has taught me many lessons in the art of combat. Let me show you one."
Program.FullCard.Name: Bloody Mary
Program.FullCard.Rules: 2, Flip Bloody Mary Opposing allies have -1 ATK this turn.

Program.FullCard.Name: Bloody Ritual
Program.FullCard.Rules:
As an additional cost to play, put 4 damage on your hero.
Draw four cards.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Attacking unseen is not cowardice, but rather the height of wisdom." - Teina Cloudstalker
Program.FullCard.Name: Bloody Slaughter
Program.FullCard.Rules: Your hero deals X melee damage to target exhausted hero or ally, where X is the cost of a non-hero Druid or Rogue you control.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "I've been expecting you."
Program.FullCard.Name: Bloody Welcome
Program.FullCard.Rules: Your hero deals 3 ranged damage to target ally. If that ally entered play this turn, ready up to two of your resources.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "It's more valuable than you might think." - Landro Longshot
Program.FullCard.Name: Blue Diamond Witchwand
Program.FullCard.Rules:
When an opponent discards a card, put a +1 ATK counter on Blue Diamond Witchwand.
When damage is dealt with Blue Diamond Witchwand, remove all +1 ATK counters from it.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Keep off!"
Program.FullCard.Name: Blue Suede Shoes
Program.FullCard.Rules: When Blue Suede Shoes enters play, target card in play you control is untargetable this turn.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Those tubers are impossible to find unless you know just where to look. That's why I've trained these snufflenose gophers to find them for me."
Program.FullCard.Name: Blueleaf Tubers
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Pay 2 to complete this quest.
Reward: Shuffle your graveyard into your deck.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "I've never hunted prey that had already been claimed by the earth, but I look forward to the challenge."
Program.FullCard.Name: Bluffstalker Honovi
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Assault 2
Allies have -2 ATK while defending against this ally.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Those who visit the capital city of the tauren know better than to misbehave.
Program.FullCard.Name: Bluffwatchers
Program.FullCard.Rules: Bluffwatchers has +1 ATK and +1 health for each other ally named Bluffwatchers in your party.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Oh, boy!" Pugg said. "I sure could go for an omelet!"
Program.FullCard.Name: Blunder into the Eggs
Program.FullCard.Rules: Put a Whelp into play for each opposing hero. Those Whelps have ferocity this turn.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "The Scourge are nothing more than leaves to be blown aside in the Earthmother's presence." - Brahu Starseer
Program.FullCard.Name: Blustering Winds
Program.FullCard.Rules: Target up to three heroes and/or allies. They can't attack or protect this turn.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "I was brought back for a reason - to see the Lich King and his armies burned from the face of Azeroth!"
Program.FullCard.Name: Blythe the Pyromaniac
Program.FullCard.Rules: If you control another Mage: Flip Blythe Blythe deals 3 fire damage to target hero or ally that was dealt damage this turn.

Program.FullCard.Artist: Clint Langley Clint Langley Clint Langley
Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Feed my steel with your gutless, spineless flesh!"
Program.FullCard.Name: Boarguts the Impaler
Program.FullCard.Rules: 3, Flip Boarguts Boarguts has +1 ATK this turn for each of your weapons.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "The Scourge dare threaten the Horde? My blade will not stop until Naxxramas is filled with silence and the plague of undeath has been stamped out from this place."
Program.FullCard.Name: Boarguts the Impaler
Program.FullCard.Rules: 3, Flip Boarguts Boarguts has +1 ATK this turn for each weapon you control.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: If you get into trouble, Booty Bay is a great place to lie low.
Program.FullCard.Name: Boat to Booty Bay
Program.FullCard.Notes: From the Through the Dark Portal FAQ
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Ongoing: Remove an ally in your party from the game. Use only on your turn.
, Destroy Boat to Booty Bay Put all ally cards removed by Boat to Booty Bay into play under your control. Use only on your turn.
Program.FullCard.Rulings: [TDP Rules FAQ] Ally cards return to play ready and with no damage counters. If you destroy this card to use its power, it returns all ally cards that were removed by the card you destroyed and only that card. If you remove an ally in your party with Boat to Booty Bay, and then that Boat leaves and reenters play, that ally card can’t be returned because it was removed by a different card.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: All the best parts of a bog lord.
Program.FullCard.Name: Boggspine Knuckles
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Your hero has dual wield.
Boggspine Knuckles has +3 ATK while while your hero has more damage than an opposing hero.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: In Zangarmarsh, it's difficult to tell the spore bats from the trees.
Program.FullCard.Name: Bogspike
Program.FullCard.Rules: When Bogspike enter play, he may deal 1 melee damage to target ally.

Program.FullCard.Name: Bo'ja, Arcanist Absolute
Program.FullCard.Rules: 5, Flip Bo'ja Target player readies all of his resources.

Program.FullCard.Name: Boki Earthgaze
Program.FullCard.Rules: Ferocity (This ally can attack immediately.)

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "The wind lets nothing stop its movement, so why should you?"
Program.FullCard.Name: Bolan Earthmend
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Protector
When Bolan readies, he heals all damage from target ally.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "It will be a constant struggle here in the Plaguelands until we have fully driven back the forces of the alliance." - Emissary Gormok
Program.FullCard.Name: Bolstering Our Defenses
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Pay 2 to complete this quest.
Reward: Reveal the top three cards of your deck. Put a revealed [Horde] card into hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Snakes are bad enough. But flying lightning snakes? Sheesh!" - Ruby Gemsparkle
Program.FullCard.Name: Bolton
Program.FullCard.Rules: Long-Range (Defenders deal no combat damage to this character.)

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Arthas! The blood of your father… of your people… demands justice!"
Program.FullCard.Name: Bolvar, Highlord of Fordragon Hold
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Untargetable
When this ally enters play, you may search your deck for a card named Fordragon Hold and put it into your resource row face up and exhausted.
Death Rattle: Put each location you control into its owner's hand.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Strategy gave way to chaos as a hail of arrows littered the battlefield.
Program.FullCard.Name: Bombard
Program.FullCard.Rules: Destroy all abilities, allies, and equipment that entered play this turn.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Brimstone and fire follow in his wake.
Program.FullCard.Name: Bonechewer Behemoth
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Traitor Hero Required
When Bonechewer Behemoth enters play, he deals 4 fire damage to target hero.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Glory to the Fel Horde!"
Program.FullCard.Name: Bonechewer Shield Disciple
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Traitor Hero Required
Protector

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Those who act heroically will find themselves justly rewarded." - G'eras
Program.FullCard.Name: Bonefist Gauntlets
Program.FullCard.Rules: You pay 2 less the next time you strike with a weapon this turn.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: It cuts through leather and leg alike.
Program.FullCard.Name: Bonereaver's Edge
Program.FullCard.Rules: When Bonereaver's Edge enters play, you may destroy target armor.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: He'll drag you with him to the grave.
Program.FullCard.Name: Boneshanks
Program.FullCard.Rules: When Boneshanks is destroyed, destroy target ally.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Skreeee!"
Program.FullCard.Name: Boomer
Program.FullCard.Rules: Once on each of your turns: Emit a sonic blast Exhaust target hero or ally. This ally deals 1 nature damage to it.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: (The Light will take care of its own.) - A'dal
Program.FullCard.Name: Boon of A'dal, The
Program.FullCard.Rules:
On an opponent's turn: Pay 7 to complete this quest.
Reward: Draw three cards.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: …cleansing the body in favor of life anew is something well within my grasp… - Alexstrasza the Life-Binder
Program.FullCard.Name: Boon of Alexstrasza, The
Program.FullCard.Rules:
On an opponent's turn: Pay 4 to complete this quest.
Reward: Draw two cards.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Every boon the Light offers has bountiful rewards for its true believers." - Thatia Truthbringer
Program.FullCard.Name: Boon of Light
Program.FullCard.Rules: Your hero heals 12 damage from target hero or ally. Draw a card.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: I hope that this acorn is able to purify your crusader and save him from the wretched fate of the plague. - Keeper Remulos
Program.FullCard.Name: Boon of Remulos, The
Program.FullCard.Rules:
On an opponent's turn: Pay 2 to complete this quest.
Reward: Draw one card.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "It would be wise of us to gain favor of the Aspects if we wish for additional aid against the Lich King." - Shaii, Strategist Supreme
Program.FullCard.Name: Boots of the Renewed Flight
Program.FullCard.Rules: When this armor prevents damage, you may pay 4. If you do, draw a card.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Stout and sturdy - two things you want from your armor.
Program.FullCard.Name: Boots of the Resilient
Program.FullCard.Rules: When you’re hero is dealt damage, exhaust Boots of the Resilient.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Feet, don't fail me now!"
Program.FullCard.Name: Boots of the Whirling Mist
Program.FullCard.Rules:
[Druid] Hero: Remove your hero from combat.
[Rogue] Hero: Interrupt target ability that's targeting your hero.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "When it comes to lurking, there's no such thing as 'to hidden'." - Rordag the Sly
Program.FullCard.Name: Boots of Utter Darkness
Program.FullCard.Notes: Available as part of Crafting Redemption Program (Scourgewar) - requires 12 Primal Shadow, 4 Heavy Knothide Leather, 2 Primal Nether
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Leatherworking Hero Required
While you control an ability, your hero has Untargetable.
While you control an ally, your hero has Elusive.
While you control a weapon, your hero has Stealth.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "I liiike!"
Program.FullCard.Name: Borak's Belt of Bravery
Program.FullCard.Rules: When Borak's Belt of Bravery prevents damage, put 1 damage on your hero.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Lead those monstrosities to my sights, lad! I'll make sure there's nothing left for the Lich King to resurrect!"
Program.FullCard.Name: Bordrak Barrelblast
Program.FullCard.Rules: If you control another Hunter: Flip Bordrak Put a +1 ATK counter on target Ranged weapon

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "I'd lay off the short jokes if ye want me to keep ye alive, laddie."
Program.FullCard.Name: Boris Brightbeard
Program.FullCard.Rules: X, Flip Boris Brightbeard Boris heals X damage from target hero or ally. Use only on your turn.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: His hunger knows no limits.
Program.FullCard.Name: Borlis Brode
Program.FullCard.Rules: Borlis Brode can't ready during your ready step.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "These reflexes and this gun have saved my hide more than once."
Program.FullCard.Name: Boum Headshot
Program.FullCard.Rules: Ferocity (Can attack immediately.)

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Hit 'em with your best shot!"
Program.FullCard.Name: Boum the Bloodseeker
Program.FullCard.Rules: 3, Flip Boum Target ally has ferocity this turn.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: The best that defenders can hope for is a quick death.
Program.FullCard.Name: Boundless Agony
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Heroes and allies can't be healed.
Damage that would be dealt is unpreventable.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "When you focus hard enough, you may find yourself able to cast a string of spells." - Archmage Barstow
Program.FullCard.Name: Boundless Concentration
Program.FullCard.Rules: Ready up to X resources you control, where X is the cost of target non-hero Hunter or Mage you control.

Program.FullCard.Name: Brace or Mace
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Choose one: Your hero heals 4 damage from target hero; or attach to target ally.
Ongoing: Attached ally has +1 ATK / +1 health.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: For some, night is the new day.
Program.FullCard.Name: Bracers of the Eclipse
Program.FullCard.Rules: 1, Remove Bracers of the Eclipse from the game Remove your deck from the game. Shuffle your graveyard face down. It is now your deck.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: A stronghold without walls, guns, or towers.
Program.FullCard.Name: Bracers of the Green Fortress
Program.FullCard.Notes: Available as part of Crafting Redemption Program - requires 20 Primal Life, 6 Hardened Adamantite Bar, 1 Primal Nether
Program.FullCard.Rules: Each of your face-down resources is also an armor with 1 DEF.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "When you've been dead and buried, you develop a certain affinity for the cold."
Program.FullCard.Name: Bradford the Frozen
Program.FullCard.Rules: 1, Discard a [Mage] card with cost X This ally deals X frost damage to target ally.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "The key is not letting the enemy know how big your army is."
Program.FullCard.Name: Braeden Nightblade
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Protector
Shadowmeld (Elusive and untargetable while ready.)

Program.FullCard.Name: Bragvi Stormstein
Program.FullCard.Rules: FRONT: 4 Flip Bragvi. BACK: When an opposing hero is dealt natur ([Nature]) damage, Bragvi may deal 1 nature damage to target ally.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "With the Earth Mother on your side, you will never be alone."
Program.FullCard.Name: Brahu Starsear
Program.FullCard.Rules: On your turn: 4, Flip Brahu Put two Treant ally tokens into play with 1 [Melee] ATK / 1 health.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "You know that feeling you get when you suck down too much Tigule and Foror's ice cream at once? Kind of like that."
Program.FullCard.Name: Brain Freeze
Program.FullCard.Rules: Players can't draw cards this turn.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Destroy your enemy's mind, and his body will soon follow.
Program.FullCard.Name: Brain Hacker
Program.FullCard.Rules: When your hero deals combat damage with Brain Hacker to a hero, that hero's controller discards a card.

Program.FullCard.Name: Brain Lock
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Ongoing: Brain Lock enters play with two frost counters.
If an opponent would draw a card, he skips drawing that card and you remove a frost counter instead. If none remain, destroy Brain Lock.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Why should I shed my own blood?"
Program.FullCard.Name: Brainwash
Program.FullCard.Notes: From the Through the Dark Portal FAQ
Program.FullCard.Rules: Gain control of target attacking ally.
Program.FullCard.Rulings: [TDP Rules FAQ] The target ally stops attacking as it changes control. You gain control of it until it leaves play.

Program.FullCard.Name: Branu Wildbloom
Program.FullCard.Rules: When Branu Wildbloom enters play, put the top card of your deck into your resource row face down and exhausted.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "I'm awake. I'm awake."
Program.FullCard.Name: Braxiss the Sleeper
Program.FullCard.Rules: Elusive

Program.FullCard.Name: Braxxis' Staff of Slumber
Program.FullCard.Rules: While you control a Form, your hero has +2 ATK while attacking and each of your armor has +2 DEF.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: In the midst of the furnace, Ta'zo spied a troll-sized cleft in the molten rock wall. He quickly decided that he and his flammable armor would fit perfectly.
Program.FullCard.Name: Break in the Action
Program.FullCard.Rules: Each player draws a card.

Program.FullCard.Name: Break in the Action, A
Program.FullCard.Rules: Exhaust any number of ready heroes and allies in your party. Each of those characters heals 2 damage from itself.

Program.FullCard.Name: Breanna Greenmother
Program.FullCard.Rules: Allies in your party can use activated () powers the turn they enter your party.
Program.FullCard.Rulings: [FoO Rules FAQ] Breanna’s power means that each ally in your party ignores the usual restriction of not being able to activate unless it’s been in your party continuously since the start of your most recent turn. While you control Breanna, you can activate allies in your party regardless of how long they have been there.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Borrowed power lasts but a brief time; make of it what you will." - Valeos Chillheart
Program.FullCard.Name: Breastplate of Undeath
Program.FullCard.Rules:
This armor enters play with five +1 [Armor] counters.
At the start of your turn, remove a +1 [Armor] counter. If none remain, destroy this armor.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Feel the surging elements invigorate your mind, body, and soul." - Malaxia Wizwhirl
Program.FullCard.Name: Breath of the Elements
Program.FullCard.Rules: Ready each ally you control.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Turn back now. You are not welcome here."
Program.FullCard.Name: Breen Toestubber
Program.FullCard.Rules: Opposing allies have -1 ATK.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Yer powers are weak!"
Program.FullCard.Name: Brelnor Mindbender
Program.FullCard.Rules: When Brelnor enters play, gain control of target ally while Brelnor remains in your party.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: The best guards are those your enemy cannot see.
Program.FullCard.Name: Bretander of the Claw
Program.FullCard.Rules: Protector, Stealth

Program.FullCard.Name: Brigg
Program.FullCard.Rules: When Brigg deals combat damage to an ally with damage on it, destroy that ally.

Program.FullCard.Name: Bringer of Death, The
Program.FullCard.Rules: 3, , Destroy The Bringer of Death Destroy all abilities, allies, and equipment. Use only on your turn.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: You might as well be wearing nothing.
Program.FullCard.Name: Brittilize
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Ongoing: When Brittilize enters play, you may destroy target armor.
Destroy Brittilize Your hero deals 2 frost damage to target hero or ally. A character dealt damage this way can't attack this turn.

Program.FullCard.Name: Broan Charges-the-Fight
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Ferocity
When Broan Charges-the-Fight enters play, you may ready target ally with cost 2 or less.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Alive, dead, undead . . . It matters not to me."
Program.FullCard.Name: Broderick Langforth
Program.FullCard.Rules: When this ally is in your graveyard, your hero has Assault 1.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "I'm gonna need a bigger bag."
Program.FullCard.Name: Brodien
Program.FullCard.Rules: As Brodien enters play, choose whether he is elusive or untargetable.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "The time between fights is the time to find a fight."
Program.FullCard.Name: Brok Bloodcaller
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Ferocity
At the end of your turn, destroy Brok if he's undamaged.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "And I just sharpened it, too." - Fillet
Program.FullCard.Name: Broken Hopes
Program.FullCard.Rules: Ongoing: Destroy Broken Hopes Destroy target ability or equipment.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Mebbe dey got da right idea," Ta'zo thought as a group of his allies sped past him. "I could use da exercise."
Program.FullCard.Name: Broken Ranks
Program.FullCard.Rules: You may put up to X target allies into their owner's hands, where X is the current stage.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "I fight to live, Valeera. While you blood elves…"
Program.FullCard.Name: Broll Bearmantle
Program.FullCard.Rules: Broll has +1 ATK / +1 health for each Arena card in play you control.
Program.FullCard.Rulings: [BoG Rules FAQ] Broll counts himself, so he has 1 ATK / 1 health if you control no other Arena cards in play.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "The Light shines brightest on those who light the way."
Program.FullCard.Name: Bronson Greatwhisker
Program.FullCard.Rules: 5, Flip Bronson The next time target ally would be dealt damage this turn, prevent it, and your hero heals 1 damage from that ally for each damage prevented this way.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "We must fortify ourselves if we are to withstand the onslaught of the Scourge."
Program.FullCard.Name: Bronthea the Resolute
Program.FullCard.Rules:
You can strike with [Paladin] weapons you control while this ally is in combat.
[Paladin] armor you control can prevent damage that would be dealt to this ally.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "If I must pay the ultimate price to defeat the Scourge, then so be it."
Program.FullCard.Name: Bronwyn Lightborn
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Frost Resistance (Prevent all frost ([Frost]) damage that would be dealt to this ally.)
At the start of your turn, you may destroy this ally. If you do, destroy target ability.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Whelps! Many whelps! Now! Handle it!
Program.FullCard.Name: Brood of Onyxia
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Stage 2 Only.
Put ten Whelps into play.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "In time, Syth had me cast out of the Halls, but he refused to let me take our sister Lakka with me. Will you help me rescue her?" - Isfar
Program.FullCard.Name: Brother Against Brother
Program.FullCard.Rules:
While you control three or more abilities, pay 1 to complete this quest.
Reward: Draw a card.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "We cannot defeat the Lich King on our own. Divided, all of will fall!"
Program.FullCard.Name: Brother Keltan
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Argent Crusade Reputation
When this or another Unique ally enters play under your control, it may deal 2 unpreventable holy damage to target ally.

Program.FullCard.Name: Brother Rhone
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Protector
Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to Brother Rhone by attacking allies.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Tear that keep asunder, death knight. Find Koltira!" - Thassarian
Program.FullCard.Name: Brothers in Death
Program.FullCard.Rules:
On your turn: Pay 3 to complete this quest.
Reward: Remove target ally in a graveyard from the game. If you do, put a 3 [Melee] / 3 [Health] Ghoul ally token into play.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "The onslaught will never cease as long as I am here."
Program.FullCard.Name: Brumdor Dreadforge
Program.FullCard.Rules: 1, Destroy on of your equipment Draw a card.

Program.FullCard.Name: Brush Aside
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Interrupt target ability, ally, or equipment card.
Magtheridon deals 1 melee damage to its controller's hero for each Blood in play.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Underestimate the power of the Light, and you will meet your end swiftly." - Gladiator Zophos
Program.FullCard.Name: Brutal Gladiator's Greatsword
Program.FullCard.Rules: Preparation (On your first turn, you may play this card without paying its cost.)

Program.FullCard.Name: Brutality Blade
Program.FullCard.Rules: Destroy Brutality Blade Opposing heroes and allies can't be healed this turn.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Here's an idea: GET DOWN! They'll see you!"
Program.FullCard.Name: Bubula del Kissel
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Stealth (Can't protect against this character.)
Target hero or ally has stealth this turn.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: All he needs is to hit you once.
Program.FullCard.Name: Bulkas Wildhorn
Program.FullCard.Rules: 3, Flip Bulkas Wildhorn Destroy target ally with damage on it. Use only on your turn.

Program.FullCard.Name: Bully
Program.FullCard.Rules: Destroy target ally or equipment with cost 4 or less.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Our duty requires faith."
Program.FullCard.Name: Bulvai of the Watch
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Aldor Reputation (Can't put Scryer cards in your deck.)
Protector
If damage would be dealt to your hero, it's dealt to Bulvai instead.

Program.FullCard.Name: Bulwark of Ancient Kings
Program.FullCard.Notes: Available as part of Crafting Redemption Program (Drums of War) - requires 3 Primal Air, 3 Primal Fire, 3 Primal Earth, 3 Primal Water, 5 Primal Mana, 2 Eternium Bar, 3 Khorium Bar, 1 Nether Vortex, 3 Primal Nether, 2 Hardened Adamantite Bar
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Blacksmithing Hero Required
Your hero has +5 health.
Destroy Bulwark of the Ancient Kings Your hero has +25 health until the end of your next turn.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "The savage weapons of the Amani demand an equally potent defense." - Harrison Jones
Program.FullCard.Name: Bulwark of the Amani Empire
Program.FullCard.Rules: Bulwark of the Amani Empire can prevent damage that would be dealt to allies in your party.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "The true measure of a hunter's talents lies in adapting to new surroundings, no matter their nature."
Program.FullCard.Name: Buma Sharpstride
Program.FullCard.Rules: Scourge heroes and allies have -2 ATK while in combat with this ally.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Thanks for everything!" - Timmo Shadestep
Program.FullCard.Name: Burgle
Program.FullCard.Rules: Target any number of opposing abilities, allies, and equipment. You control them until the end of your turn.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "They will be like waves crashing against an adamantite wall." - Danath Trollbane
Program.FullCard.Name: Burly Bellow
Program.FullCard.Rules: Opposing allies have -5 ATK this turn.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Her actions speak lounder than her words ever could.
Program.FullCard.Name: Burly Berta
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Assault 2
When this ally deals damage to a hero, you may draw a card.
Death Rattle: Target ally you control has Assault 2 this turn.

Program.FullCard.Name: Burn Away
Program.FullCard.Rules: Destroy target ability.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: All her life, Dizdemona believed the power of shadow was absolute. Then she saw the dragon's fire…
Program.FullCard.Name: Burn to a Crisp
Program.FullCard.Rules: Onyxia deals 1 fire damage to target opposing ally for each resource you have.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Suddenly the lair was aflame, everything burning like thatched-roof cottages."
Program.FullCard.Name: Burninate
Program.FullCard.Rules: Destroy all opposing abilities, allies, and equipment.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: A little knowledge can be a dangerous thing.
Program.FullCard.Name: Burst of Knowledge
Program.FullCard.RequireClass: Druid, Mage, Paladin, Priest, Shaman, Warlock
Program.FullCard.Rules: 1, Put Burst of Knowledge into its owner's hand You pay 2 less to play your next card this turn.

Program.FullCard.Name: Butcher
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Finishing Move (To play, remove X Combo cards in your graveyard from the game, where X is 5 or less.)
Choose X from among "ability," "ally," "equipment," "location," and "quest." Target player reveals his hand and discards a card of each of the chosen kinds.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "If you can keep their engineers and tinkerers busy, it would greatly slow down their progress, buying me the time I need." - Altruis the Sufferer
Program.FullCard.Name: Buying Time
Program.FullCard.Rules:
During your turn, pay 2 to complete this quest.
Reward: You and target opponent each put the top card of your decks in your resource rows face down and exhausted.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: The squasher has suddenly become the squashee.
Program.FullCard.Name: Buzz
Program.FullCard.Rules:
When this ally enters play, you may destroy target equipment.
Death Rattle When this ally enters your graveyad from anywhere): You may destroy target weapon.

Program.FullCard.Name: Caddrick Von Styler
Program.FullCard.Rules: 5, Each player destroys one of his resources.

Program.FullCard.Name: Cadon Thundershade
Program.FullCard.Rules: When this ally enters play, you may put target ability into its owner's hand.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Ha! There's no need to coddle me, boy. I may be old, but I'm not helpless."
Program.FullCard.Name: Cairne Bloodhoof
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Protector
Other Tauren in your party have +10 health.

Program.FullCard.Name: Cairne, Earthmother's Chosen
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Tauren heroes and allies you control have Warstomp. When they attack or defend, you may exhaust target hero or ally.)
Stash: Put a 1 [Nature] / 1 [Health] [Horde] Tauren Warrior ally token into play.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "They never see it coming." - Gyro of the Ring
Program.FullCard.Name: Calamity's Grasp
Program.FullCard.Rules: When this weapon enters play, choose "ability," "ally," or "equipment." You may discard a card of that kind. If you do, destroy target card if it shares that kind.

Program.FullCard.Name: Caleb Pavish
Program.FullCard.Rules: FRONT: 2 Flip Caleb. BACK: At the start of your turn, Caleb deals 1 nature damage to target hero.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Will you take up our clause?" - Tilda Darathan
Program.FullCard.Name: Call of the Crusade, The
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Argent Crusade Reputation
For each Unique ally you control, you may pay 2 to complete this quest.
Reward: Draw a card for each 2 paid this way.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "The plague of undeath is a constant threat to our ongoing mission of preservation." - Lanthus the Restorer
Program.FullCard.Name: Call of the Grove
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Ongoing: Each turn, you can place an additional resource if you've placed a quest that turn.
Death Rattle (When this ability enters your graveyard from anywhere): Reveal the top three cards of your deck. Put a revealed quest into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: To heed such a call is to forsake man-made weaponry in favor of a more feral response.
Program.FullCard.Name: Call of the Wild
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Ongoing: When your hero attacks, it deals 1 melee damage to target opposing hero.
Your hero is in cat form. (+1 ATK while attacking. Destroy this card when you strike with a weapon or play a non-Feral ability.)

Program.FullCard.Flavor: “As our ancestors watch over us in our passing, so too will they aid in our return from the spirit realm.” - Grennan Stormspeaker
Program.FullCard.Name: Call the Spirit
Program.FullCard.Rules: Put target ally card from your graveyard into your hand.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Critical troop deployments are necessary on a day by day basis." - Alliance Brigadier General
Program.FullCard.Name: Call to Arms: Alterac Valley
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Pay 4 to complete this quest.
Reward: Draw a card. You pay 3 less to complete your next quest this turn. You may add an honor counter to a Battleground card you control.

Program.FullCard.Name: Call to Arms: Arathi Basin
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Pay 5 to complete this quest.
Reward: Reveal the top three cards of your deck. Put all revealed ability, ally, and equipment cards into hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck. You may add an honor counter to a Battleground card you control.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "We must show the enemy that we will fight them wherever we find them." - Horde Warbringer
Program.FullCard.Name: Call to Arms: Eye of the Storm
Program.FullCard.Rules:
On your turn, pay 3 to complete this quest.
Reward: Draw a card, and target hero or ally can't ready during its controller's next ready step. You may add an honor counter to a Battleground card you control.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Today we have an opportunity to drive the enemy from our lands once and for all." - Horde Warbringer
Program.FullCard.Name: Call to Arms: Warsong Gulch
Program.FullCard.Rules:
If a protector is in your party, pay 2 to complete this quest.
Reward: Draw a card. You may add an honor counter to a Battleground card you control.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Hush."
Program.FullCard.Name: Canissa the Shadow
Program.FullCard.Rules: Arcane Torrent (When this ally enters play, target opposing card in play loses and can't have powers this turn.)

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Mmmm...brains."
Program.FullCard.Name: Cannibalize
Program.FullCard.Notes: From the Through the Dark Portal FAQ
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Undead Hero Required
Remove any number of ally cards in graveyards from the game. Your hero heals 2 damage from itself for each card removed.
Program.FullCard.Rulings: [TDP Rules FAQ] You can remove ally cards from any number of different graveyards.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "'Dashing' isn't a word I'd use to describe an orc - unless he were running." - Kintara Wintermoon
Program.FullCard.Name: Captain Swash
Program.FullCard.Rules: Swash has +3 ATK while attacking an exhausted hero or ally.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "The deed you have done is a great boon to our battle efforts." - Corporal Teeka Bloodsnarl
Program.FullCard.Name: Capture a Mine
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Pay 1 to complete this quest.
Reward: Reveal the top three cards of your deck. Put a revealed location or quest card into hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.

Program.FullCard.Name: Caretaker Devonar
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Protector
Devonar is elusive while ready.

Program.FullCard.Name: Caretaker Heartwing
Program.FullCard.Rules: Heartwing is untargetable while ready.

Program.FullCard.Name: Caretaker Mooncrier
Program.FullCard.Rules: Ready allies in your party have +2 ATK.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: If you aren't prepared to fight, you'll soon find yourself six feet under.
Program.FullCard.Name: Carnage
Program.FullCard.Rules: Destroy each opposing ally with cost 4 or less.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Purity be necessary for joo to be at one's best, mon. The mojo got da flow clean." - Runetusk
Program.FullCard.Name: Castigate
Program.FullCard.Rules: Your hero deals 2 unpreventable holy damage to target hero or ally, or 6 if your hero has no damage.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Druids always land on their feet.
Program.FullCard.Name: Cat Form
Program.FullCard.Notes: UDE Card Preview, Errata: Clarified to state it goes into its owner’s hand from the graveyard.
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Ongoing: Your hero is in cat form. (+1 ATK while attacking. Destroy this card when you strike with a weapon or play a non-Feral ability.)
When Cat Form is destroyed, you may pay 2. If you do, its owner puts it from his graveyard into his hand at end of turn.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Those who embrace the Light are free to share it."
Program.FullCard.Name: Catarina Clark
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Protector
Catarina heals 4 damage from target hero or ally.

Program.FullCard.Name: Caught Off-Guard
Program.FullCard.Rules: Target hero or ally has -2 ATK this turn.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Your thoughts betray you."
Program.FullCard.Name: Cedric Darwin
Program.FullCard.Rules: When this ally enters play, you may search target player's deck for a card and remove it from the game.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Sometimes you have to cast the wrong spell at the right time.
Program.FullCard.Name: Celee Cogfreeze
Program.FullCard.Rules: When you play an ability, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Gotta go!"
Program.FullCard.Name: Celerity
Program.FullCard.Rules: Ongoing: If your hero is defending against an ally, remove your hero from combat.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "I am merely the conduit. It will be all of you who will make us victorious this day." - Taheo Skyspeaker
Program.FullCard.Name: Celestial Communion
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Your hero deals 1 arcane damage to target hero or ally for each [Arcane] ally in your party.
Draw a card.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "I can do this all day!" - Dorn
Program.FullCard.Name: Celestial Shard
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Your hero deals 3 arcane damage to target hero or ally.
Ongoing: At the start of your turn, you may put Celestial Shard into its owner's hand.

Program.FullCard.Name: Censure
Program.FullCard.Rules: Put target opposing attacking ally into its owner's hand.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Do you work out?"
Program.FullCard.Name: Center of Attention
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Attach to target ally.
Ongoing: Attached ally is AWESOME! (At the start of your turn, each player may compliment this ally. If he does, he draws a card.)

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Did you actually think you could cause me harm?"
Program.FullCard.Name: Centurion Addisyn
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Protector
As Addisyn enters play, choose arcane, fire, frost, nature, or shadow.
Addisyn has the chosen resistance.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Burn them to ash and let the wind take them out to sea."
Program.FullCard.Name: Ceraka
Program.FullCard.Rules: On your turn: 1, Turn a quest you control face down This ally deals 3 fire damage to target hero.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "A lost battle is nothing if you win the war."
Program.FullCard.Name: Cerrik Blooddawn
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Protector
When you play an ability, ready Cerrik.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "I have quite the hot temper."
Program.FullCard.Name: Cerripha Sunstreak
Program.FullCard.Rules: 1, Flip Cerripha Cerripha deals 3 fire damage to target hero.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Evey blade of grass in the Emerald Dream holds a lesson. I could spend an eternity there and still have more to learn."
Program.FullCard.Name: Cerwyn
Chaigon Steelsight
Program.FullCard.Rules: 1, Flip Chaigon Target ally has -3 ATK this turn.

Program.FullCard.Name: Chain Heal
Program.FullCard.Rules: Target up to three heroes and/or allies. Your hero heals 3, 2, and 1 damage from them, respectively.
Program.FullCard.Rulings: [FoO Rules FAQ] You can’t target the same character twice. You can target fewer than three characters. If you choose two, for example, your hero heals 3 and 2 damage from them, respectively.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: The air crackled with electricity as the bolt leapt from body to body, leaving the scent of charred flesh in its wake.
Program.FullCard.Name: Chain Lightning
Program.FullCard.Rules: Your hero deals 3 nature damage to target hero or ally. Your hero may deal 2 nature damage to another hero or ally. Your hero may deal 1 nature damage to another hero or ally.
Program.FullCard.Rulings:
[Paul Ross 9/3/2006] You can target a totem with Chain Lightning to deal 3 nature damage to it, but you can't choose to deal 2 or 1 nature damage to a totem.
[Mike Rosenberg 8/26/2006] Chain Lightning only has one target that it deals 3 damage to. After you successfully resolve Chain Lightning, after you deal 3 damage you can deal 2 damage to a card other than the card you dealt 3 damage too. The 1 damage can be dealt to any card not already dealt damage by your Chain Lightning card.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Your magic cannot protect you! It cannot protect them either!" - Urrth
Program.FullCard.Name: Chain Purge
Program.FullCard.Rules: Target up to three abilities. Destroy the first. Destroy the second if it costs less than the first. Destroy the third if it costs less than the second.

Program.FullCard.Name: Chains of Ice
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Attach to target opposing ally. Search your deck for a Disease, reveal it, and put it into your hand.
Ongoing: Attached ally can't attack.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Take Brogg's clan banner and travel east until you see a cave like a dragon's mouth." - Brogg
Program.FullCard.Name: Challenge to the Black Flight
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Pay 2 to complete this quest.
Reward: Draw a card if a Dragonkin entered play this turn. Draw a card if a Dragonkin left play this turn.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Allow yourself to be sentenced by High Justice Grimston and place the banner firmly on the ground in a sign of defiance." - Falrin Treeshaper
Program.FullCard.Name: Challenge, The
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Pay 5 to complete this quest.
Reward: Put the top card of your deck into your resource row face down and exhausted, then draw a card.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Come get some!"
Program.FullCard.Name: Challenging Shout
Program.FullCard.Rules: This turn, opposing heroes and allies must attack if able and can attack only your hero if able.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "When on learns to stand, then others will surely fall." - Codex of Defense
Program.FullCard.Name: Champion Stance
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Ongoing: If your hero would deal damage, it deals that much +1 instead.
If your hero would be dealt damage, prevent 1 of it.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Retribution is swift upon the enemies of the Light."
Program.FullCard.Name: Champion Zosimuus
Program.FullCard.Rules: When a Holy ally in your party is dealt damage, it deals 2 holy damage to the source of that damage.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "The Light rewards faith, not form."
Program.FullCard.Name: Chancellor Velora
Program.FullCard.Rules: 2, Flip Velora Velora deals 1 unpreventable holy damage to target hero or ally. Use only on your turn.

Program.FullCard.Name: Chaotic Rush
Program.FullCard.Rules: Put target ally on top of its owner's deck.Ongoing: Opposing allies enter play exhausted.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: A charge is one of those things that always ends badly for someone.
Program.FullCard.Name: Charge
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Exhaust target hero or ally.
Draw a card.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: The mighty charger serves as the steed for all those who serve the Light.
Program.FullCard.Name: Charger
Program.FullCard.Rules:
You pay 1 less to complete quests.
When you place a resource face up, your hero may deal 1 unpreventable holy damage to target hero or ally. Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to a second target hero or ally this turn.
(Mounts can't attack or be attacked.)

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Let me show you the meaning of panic, dread, and fear."
Program.FullCard.Name: Charkov
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Will of the Forsaken (This ally cant leave play unless it has fatal damage or 0 health.)
When Charkov enters play, each player puts an ally from his party into its owner's hand.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "The right clothes make all the difference."
Program.FullCard.Name: Charles Worth
Program.FullCard.Rules: This ally has Mend X, where X is the combined [Armor] of Cloth armor you control.

Program.FullCard.Name: Charmed Ancient Bone Bow
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Long-Range
This equipment has +2 ATK for each heirloom counter on it.
Stash (As this enters your resource row, you may have it enter face up. Immediately turn it face down.): Add an heirloom counter to target equipment you control.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "That which you desire lies this way, hero."
Program.FullCard.Name: Charming Courtesan
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Traitor Hero Required
If Charming Courtesan would be dealt 2 or less damage, prevent it.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Moonshadow looked on grimly as the pillar of fire roasted the man inside. The dust left behind was beyond even her ability to mend.
Program.FullCard.Name: Charred Bones
Program.FullCard.Rules: Shuffle any number of target graveyards into their owners' decks.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "A-Me good. Home. Find home."
Program.FullCard.Name: Chasing A-Me 01
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Pay 3 to complete this quest.
Reward: Put target ally card from your graveyard into your hand.

Program.FullCard.Name: Chasten
Program.FullCard.Rules: Your hero deals 3 unpreventable holy damage to target hero or ally.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "You have been judged unworthy. May the Light have pity upon your blackened soul." - Boris Brightbeard
Program.FullCard.Name: Chastise
Program.FullCard.Rules: Your hero deals 2 holy damage to target hero or ally. That damage can't be prevented.

Program.FullCard.Name: Cheat Death
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Subtlety Hero Required
Remove your hero from the game. As your next turn starts, put it into play flipped the same way and with the same damage. (You can’t play cards while your hero is removed.)
Program.FullCard.Rulings:
[MoL Rules FAQ] Your hero enters play ready at the same time you ready your cards. Each card that was attached to your hero is put into its owner’s graveyard as your hero leaves play, and they don’t reattach as it returns to play.
While your hero is removed from the game:
- It’s not in play, so it can’t attack, exhaust, flip, or be attacked, targeted, or have damage dealt to or put on it.
- You can’t play cards, but can still propose attacks with allies, complete quests, and place resources as usual. You can’t use hero powers, but you can still use powers that refer to your hero.
- Anything looking for the orientation of your hero

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Is trouble brewing?"
Program.FullCard.Name: Chen Stormstout
Program.FullCard.Rules:
When Chen Stormstout enters play, say "I bring PANDA-MONIUM!" and opposing allies can't attack this turn.
3, Say "Another round?" Target ally can't attack this turn.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Ever notice how totems look like scratching posts?" - Warden Stormclaw
Program.FullCard.Name: Chew Toy
Program.FullCard.Rules: If you control a Form, destroy target ally.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Have you felt the cold chill? Perhaps what you thought was a hand on your shoulder?"
Program.FullCard.Name: Chief Apothecary Hildagard
Program.FullCard.Rules: When Hildagard deals combat damage to a hero, destroy that hero.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "If you are not her to help the cause, get out."
Program.FullCard.Name: Chief Researcher Amereldine
Program.FullCard.Rules: When you complete your first quest each turn, you may turn it face up if it's in play.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Wonderful. This will help us in our battle against the Horde filth that have surfaced in Outland."
Program.FullCard.Name: Chief Researcher Kartos
Program.FullCard.Rules: When you complete your first quest each turn, you may ready all resources exhausted to complete it.

Program.FullCard.Name: Chill
Program.FullCard.Rules: Your hero deals 1 frost damage to target hero or ally. A character dealt damage this way can't attack or protect this turn.

Program.FullCard.Name: Chilly Slobberknocker
Program.FullCard.Rules:
As this weapon enters play, name two damage types.
If the first type of damage would be dealt, that much +1 is dealt instead. If the second type of damage would be dealt, that much -1 is dealt instead.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "And now, to add that special finishing touch . . ." - Levander of the Sanguine Shot
Program.FullCard.Name: Chimera Shot
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Marksmanship Hero Required
You may choose a different one for each different name among Stings you control: Destroy target ally; destroy target equipment; or destroy target resource.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "She's faltering! Press on!" Warrax called. He raised his hammer and charged.
Program.FullCard.Name: Chink in Her Armor
Program.FullCard.Rules: Opponents may destroy target ability of their choice.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Underestimate me at your peril, long and tall!"
Program.FullCard.Name: Chloe Mithrilbolt
Program.FullCard.Rules: 1, Flip Chloe When Chloe protects this turn, ready her.
Program.FullCard.Rulings: [BoG Rules FAQ] Chloe can't protect unless she gains the power to do so.

Program.FullCard.Name: Choker of Fluid Thought
Program.FullCard.Rules: Reveal the top card of target player's deck. You may remove that card from the game.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: It has the desperate fell of a hand around your neck.
Program.FullCard.Name: Choker of Vile Intent
Program.FullCard.RequireClass: Druid, Hunter, Paladin, Rogue, Shaman, Warrior
Program.FullCard.Rules: At the start of your turn, you may destroy an ability, ally, or equipment you control. If you do, each opponent destroys a card of that kind he controls.

Program.FullCard.Name: Cholda Wildbloom
Program.FullCard.Rules: When Cholda enters play, you and target opponent each put the top card of your decks into your resource rows face down and exhausted.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "I can't see who's winnin' - but it's probably not the guy under the boar."
Program.FullCard.Name: Chops
Program.FullCard.Rules: When Chops attacks, you may exhaust target hero or ally.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: As battle raged around him, Christopher's pre-planned strategies fell to the wayside as his instincts took over.
Program.FullCard.Name: Christopher the Devout
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Protector
1, Destroy Christopher Target hero or ally has protector this turn.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: The cloak shimmers with power. Its fabric feels electric to the touch.
Program.FullCard.Name: Chromatic Cloak
Program.FullCard.RequireClass: Druid, Mage, Paladin, Priest, Shaman, Warlock
Program.FullCard.Rules: If your hero would deal damage with an ability, it deals that amount of damage plus 1 instead.
Program.FullCard.Rulings: [Danny Mandel 10/25/2006] Chromatic Cloak will increase any damage that's dealt with an ability so it will increase Shadow Word: Pain, Curse of Agony etc. It's especially great with Fireball because it will increase the initial damage to 5 and each "tick" of damage will deal 2.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "You could say that we have met before. To that end, we shall also meet again."
Program.FullCard.Name: Chromie
Program.FullCard.Rules: , Remove Chromie from the game Take an extra turn after this one.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Equality is in the eye of the controller." - Loraala the Frigid
Program.FullCard.Name: Cincture of Polarity
Program.FullCard.Rules: Heroes and allies you control have +2 [Health] while you control an even number of heroes and allies.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "You must be victorious." - Oronok Torn-heart
Program.FullCard.Name: Cipher of Damnation, The
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Pay 3 to complete this quest.
Reward: Reveal the top two cards of your deck. If they have different card types, put both into hand. Otherwise, put both on the bottom of your deck.

Program.FullCard.Name: Circle of Blood, The
Program.FullCard.Rules:
When a hero or ally in your party deals damage, add an arena counter.
, Remove three arena counters Put an Arena Gladiator ally token into play with 1 [Melee] ATK / 1 health.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "All your effort has been wasted."
Program.FullCard.Name: Circle of Healing
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Holy Hero Required
Your hero heals 10 damage from each friendly hero and ally.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "If one of us should fall in battle, our brothers and sisters shall rally tenfold!" - Moonshadow
Program.FullCard.Name: Circle of Life
Program.FullCard.Rules: Ongoing: When an ally is destroyed, its controller may search his deck for an ally card with the same name and put it into play exhausted.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Marrowgar had no idea the power that lay amongst the bones of his slain enemies." - Ayaka Winterhoof
Program.FullCard.Name: Citadel Enforcer's Claymore

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Her looks are all the distration her allies need to land a killing blow.
Program.FullCard.Name: Claemora Amberglare
Program.FullCard.Rules: When this ally enters play, target hero or ally has Assault 2 this turn. (+2 ATK on your turn)

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Death is only the beginning.
Program.FullCard.Name: Clara Graves
Program.FullCard.Rules: You may remove four ally cards in your graveyard from the game rather than pay Clara Grave's cost.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Mana most efficiently fills an unbroken vessel.
Program.FullCard.Name: Clarity of Thought
Program.FullCard.Rules: Ongoing: Draw a card. Use only if your hero has no damage on it.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Snarling, the druid lunged not with hand, but with paw.
Program.FullCard.Name: Claw
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Your hero deals 3 melee damage to target hero or ally.
Ongoing: Your hero is in cat form. (+1 ATK while attacking. Destroy this card when you strike with a weapon or play a non-Feral ability.)

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Omedus watched in silent disbelief as the beast tore through a clawful of warriors. Limbs flew through the air, a current of blood ran toward him, and for the first time in his unlife, he felt fear.
Program.FullCard.Name: Claw, Claw, Bite
Program.FullCard.Rules: Onyxia deals 1 melee damage to each hero and ally in target player's party.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Foul magics, poisons, and diseases all fall before the cleansing Light.
Program.FullCard.Name: Cleanse
Program.FullCard.Rules: Destroy any number of abilities attached to target friendly hero or ally.

Program.FullCard.Name: Cleansing Witch Hill
Program.FullCard.Rules:
On your turn: Pay 4 to complete this quest.
Reward: Turn target resource face down. Draw a card.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Two bodies are better than one.
Program.FullCard.Name: Cleave
Program.FullCard.Notes: Errata: Talent should be Fury, not Arms
Program.FullCard.Rules: Your hero deals X melee damage to each of up to two target allies, where X is 1 plus the ATK of one of your Melee weapons.
Program.FullCard.Rulings: [Paul Ross 9/7/2006] At its heart, Cleave says "Your hero deals X melee damage to each of up to two target allies". How do you calculate X? Well, you start with 1, then you can choose a Melee weapon you control and add its ATK. No Melee weapon to choose? Then X=1. If Cleave was restricted to being played "only if you control a Melee weapon" then that would be spelled out.

Program.FullCard.Name: Cleave Apart
Program.FullCard.Rules: Destroy an ability, ready ally, and equipment controlled by target raiding player.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Hey, how do I get rid of this?"
Program.FullCard.Name: Clinging Curse
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Attach to target hero or ally.
Ongoing: Untargetable
At the start of your turn, your hero deals 1 shadow damage to attached character.

Program.FullCard.Name: Cloak of Darkness
Program.FullCard.Notes: Available as part of Crafting Redemption Program (Blood of Gladiators) - requires 8 Primal Shadow, 6 Heavy Knothide Leather, 8 Bolt of Soulcloth, 2 Primal Nether
Program.FullCard.RequireClass: Druid, Hunter, Paladin, Rogue, Shaman, Warrior
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Put a +1 DEF counter on Cloak of Darkness.
, Remove all +1 DEF counters Your hero deals 1 shadow damage to target hero or ally for each counter removed this way.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Revel in the cool shelter of the shadows." - The Assassin's Creed, Chapter 5
Program.FullCard.Name: Cloak of Shadows
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Destroy any number of target abilities attached to your hero.
Your hero is untargetable this turn.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "You're mine! You just don't know it yet…" - Spiritualist Sunshroud
Program.FullCard.Name: Cloak of Subjugated Power
Program.FullCard.RequireClass: Druid, Mage, Paladin, Priest, Shaman, Warlock
Program.FullCard.Rules: On your turn: 1, , Destroy an ally in your party with cost X Gain control of target ally with cost less than X.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Keeps you dry in rains of both water and blood.
Program.FullCard.Name: Cloak of the Pit Stalker
Program.FullCard.Rules: Target attacker has -1 health this turn.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Imbued with the energy of both the light and the darkness.
Program.FullCard.Name: Cloak of the Shadowed Sun
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Your hero has Protector.
[Druid] Hero: Opposing allies have -1 ATK.
[Warrior] Hero: Opposing allies have -1 [Health].

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Its threads deceive even the most potent magics.
Program.FullCard.Name: Cloak of the Shrouded Mists
Program.FullCard.Rules: The next time your hero would be dealt non-combat damage this turn, prevent it.

Program.FullCard.Name: Close Quarters Combat
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Combat Hero Required
Each player destroys resources he controls until he controls three.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Timing is everything.
Program.FullCard.Name: Clutch Shot
Program.FullCard.Rules: Target ally has +2 ATK this turn. A second target ally has -2 ATK this turn.
Program.FullCard.Rulings: [BoG Rules FAQ] This card requires two (different) targets. If one becomes illegal in response, the other is still affected.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: The mask hides the face of the snake-hearted; venomous and quick to strike.
Program.FullCard.Name: Cobrascale Hood
Program.FullCard.Notes: Available as part of Crafting Redemption Program - requires 8 Primal Shadow, 8 Primal Air, 3 Heavy Knothide Leather, 5 Cobra Scales, 1 Primal Nether
Program.FullCard.Rules: At the start of you turn, your hero deals 2 nature damage to each opposing hero for each face-up resource its controller has.

Program.FullCard.Name: Coif of the Wicked
Program.FullCard.Rules:
[Hunter]: When you place a quest, ready your hero and all of your Ranged weapons.
[Shaman]: When you place a quest, ready your hero and all of your Melee weapons.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Ssslavesss, asssissst your massster!"
Program.FullCard.Name: Coilfang Myrmidon
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Traitor Hero Required
When Coilfang Myrmidon is destroyed, reveal the top card of your deck. If it's named Coildfang Myrmidon, draw it.

Program.FullCard.Name: Coilskar General
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Traitor Hero Required
When Coilskar General enters play, put three Naga ally tokens into play 1 [Melee] ATK / 1 health.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: His pets are ill-treated and ill-tempered.
Program.FullCard.Name: Coilskar Wrangler
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Traitor Hero Required
2, Destroy an ally in your party Each opponent destroys an ally in his party.

Program.FullCard.Name: Cold Blood
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Assassination Hero Required
Draw a card.
When your hero deals damage to an ally this turn, destroy that ally.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Never wake a sleeping bear. - The Greatest Race of Hunters
Program.FullCard.Name: Cold Bones
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Frost Resistance (Prevent all frost ([Frost]) damage that would be dealt to this ally.)
Your hero has Frost Resistance.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Only those who survive the snowfields of Alterac Valley could hope to wield this uniquely crafted mace.
Program.FullCard.Name: Cold Forged Hammer
Program.FullCard.Rules: You pay 1 less to play Cold Forged Hammer for each [Frost] ally in your party.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "I'll freeze you all!" - The Shade of Aran
Program.FullCard.Name: Cold Front
Program.FullCard.Rules: Allies can't attack this turn.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: To be slain honorably on the field of battle brings us all glory. To be frozen in a block of ice and endlessly taunted does not… - Brijana
Program.FullCard.Name: Cold Hearted
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Pay 3 to complete this quest.
Reward: Draw a card. Target ally's damage type becomes [Frost] this turn.

Program.FullCard.Name: Cold Snap
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Frost Hero Required.
Remove Cold Snap from the game.
Put up to X Frost ability cards with different names from your graveyard into your hand.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Your friends can't save you now.
Program.FullCard.Name: Collateral Damage
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Attach to target hero.
Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 1 melee damage to each ally in attached hero's party.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Ummm…what is that?"
Program.FullCard.Name: Collidus the Warp-Watcher
Program.FullCard.Rules: When Collidus enters play, put each other ally into its owner's hand.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Its gruesome appearance is matched only by its insatiable hunger for victims." - Triton the Sacrilegious
Program.FullCard.Name: Colossal Skull-Clad Cleaver
Program.FullCard.Rules:
When an opposing ally is destroyed, add a skull counter.
This weapon has Assault 1 for each skull counter.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Who would have thought that a huge piece of lumber could take such punishment." - Ivan, Bladewind Brute
Program.FullCard.Name: Colossal Totem
Program.FullCard.Rules: Ongoing: If a friendly hero or ally would be dealt damage, it's dealt to this ability instead. (Totems can be attacked or targeted like allies.)

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "A little fire goes a long way." - Cerripha Sunstreak
Program.FullCard.Name: Combustion
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Fire Hero Required
Your hero deals X fire damage to each hero and ally, where X is target ally's health.
Program.FullCard.Rulings: [BoG Rules FAQ] If the target is no longer legal as this card tries to resolve (or it has 0 or less health), no damage is dealt.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Desperate times call for desperate measures. - Victoria Jaton
Program.FullCard.Name: Command Decision
Program.FullCard.Rules: Ongoing: 1, Target ally you control has Protector this turn.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Dispatch the Scourge with all the zeal you can muster!"
Program.FullCard.Name: Commander Falstaav
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Argent Crusade Reputation
Protector
Once per turn: 2 Target Unique ally has +X ATK this turn, where X is its ATK.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "You stand in judgment before the Light!"
Program.FullCard.Name: Commander Michael Goodchilde
Program.FullCard.Rules: 2, Flip Michael If a friendly ally would deal combat damage while defending this turn, it deals that much +2 instead.

Program.FullCard.Name: Commanding Shout
Program.FullCard.Rules: Ongoing: Allies in your party have +1 health.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Your distractions are but a minor nuisance." - Justice Blindburn
Program.FullCard.Name: Concentration Aura
Program.FullCard.Rules: Ongoing: Your ability cards are instant and can't be interrupted.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "You're a true hero of the Alliance!" - Alliance Brigadier General
Program.FullCard.Name: Concerted Efforts
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Pay 1 to complete this quest.
Reward: Reveal the top three cards of your deck. Put a revealed card with an even cost of 2 or more into hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "The chill of frost will pierce flesh and bone, all the way to your very core." - "Black Ice" Fizzlefreeze
Program.FullCard.Name: Cone of Cold
Program.FullCard.Rules: Your hero deals 1 frost damage to each of up to three target heroes and/or allies. A character dealt damage this way can't attack this turn.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Confess your sins so that I may strip them from your flesh."
Program.FullCard.Name: Confessor Mildred
Program.FullCard.Rules: 2, Destroy Confessor Mildred Destroy target ability.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Sometimes you need to burn the forest down to find your prey." - Kana Nassis
Program.FullCard.Name: Conflagration Trap
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Trap (You may exhaust your defending hero rather than pay this card's cost.)
Attach to target attacker.
Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 1 fire damage to each other hero and ally in attached character's party.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: When you need a quick bite to eat.
Program.FullCard.Name: Conjured Cinnamon Roll
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Ongoing: 1, Destroy Conjured Cinnamon Roll Your hero heals 1 damage from itself for each of your resources.
1 Target player gains control of Conjured Cinnamon Roll.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "I hope you brought enough for everyone."
Program.FullCard.Name: Conjured Sparkling Water
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Ongoing: 4, Destroy Conjured Sparkling Water Ready all of your resources.
1 Target player gains control of Conjured Sparkling Water. Use only on your turn.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Muster all the strength that you can. We must be victorious! - Halavar
Program.FullCard.Name: Conquering Shout
Program.FullCard.Rules: Ongoing: Allies you control have Assault 2. (They have +2 ATK on your turn.)

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Time is fleeting. No matter how hard you try, you will soon feel the grip of death."
Program.FullCard.Name: Conqueror Edge
Program.FullCard.Rules: When this ally enters play, you may put target [Hunter] equipment on the bottom of its owner's deck.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "I've got my eye on you!"
Program.FullCard.Name: Conqueror Gurzom
Program.FullCard.Rules: Prevent all damage that Rogues would deal to this ally.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "The fury of the elements will not stop until your precious shield is broken down."
Program.FullCard.Name: Conqueror Hashkon
Program.FullCard.Rules: When this ally enters play, he deals 3 nature damage divided as you choose to any number of target opposing Priests.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "You are no Arthas, death knight. Your powers will not protect you from the Earth Mother."
Program.FullCard.Name: Conqueror Jarano
Program.FullCard.Rules: When this ally enters play, you may destroy target [Death Knight] ability or equipment.

Program.FullCard.Name: Conqueror Kagon Blackskull
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Protector
3 Remove target ally card in any graveyard from the game, and Kagon deals 1 frost damage to target hero or ally. A character dealt damage this way can't attack this turn.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Your command of the elements is noteworthy, but my mastery of the Light is superior."
Program.FullCard.Name: Conqueror Nairi
Program.FullCard.Rules: If an opposing Shaman would deal damage, prevent 2 of it.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Fear THIS."
Program.FullCard.Name: Conqueror Neusuada
Program.FullCard.Rules: When this ally attacks, you may destroy target non-hero Warlock or [Warlock] equipment.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "We have two very different definitions of 'safe distance.'"
Program.FullCard.Name: Conqueror Tristos
Program.FullCard.Rules: This ally has Assault 2 and Long-Range while attacking Mages.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Ya be blinded by your devotion, bruddah."
Program.FullCard.Name: Conqueror Vun'jin
Program.FullCard.Rules: When this ally enters play, target an opposing Paladin ally. You control it and it has Protector while this ally remains under your control.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Da fire power gonna blast yoo apart, bruddah."
Program.FullCard.Name: Conqueror Yun'zon
Program.FullCard.Rules: Opposing Warriors and [Warrior] cards in play lose and can't have powers.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "The more you run, the worse this will be for you."
Program.FullCard.Name: Conqueror Zaala
Program.FullCard.Rules: At the start of your turn, you may remove another ally you control from the game. If you do, remove target Druid ally, [Druid] ability, or [Druid] equipment from the game.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "My church is the field of battle." - Uther Lightbringer
Program.FullCard.Name: Consecration
Program.FullCard.Rules: Your hero deals 2 holy damage to each hero and ally in target player's party. That damage can't be prevented.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "I count all among the Alliance as not only friends, but as brothers and sisters."
Program.FullCard.Name: Consul Rhys Lorgrand
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Human Hero Required
Diplomacy: [Alliance] allies
Rhys has +1 ATK / +1 health for each different [Alliance] race among allies in your party other than Human. (Draenei, Dwarf, Gnome, and Night Elf)

Program.FullCard.Name: Contagious Poison
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Attach to target hero or ally that was dealt combat damage by your hero this turn.
Ongoing: At the start of your turn, you may reattach this ability to target hero or ally. Then, your hero deals 2 nature damage to attached character.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "It is our charge to preserve the sanctity of the time-stream." - Andormu
Program.FullCard.Name: Continuum Blade
Program.FullCard.Rules: At the start of each player's turn, if he didn't take the last turn, he takes an extra turn after this one.
Program.FullCard.Rulings: [DoW Rules FAQ] Let’s consider a sequence of turns in the middle of a game between players A and B. If player A plays Continuum Blade during the first turn, the sequence will be ABBAABB, and so on until the Blade leaves play. However, if player B destroys the Blade during the second turn of this sequence (after it triggers for the first time), the sequence becomes ABBABAB, and so on. In other words, when the Blade triggers and grants an extra turn, that turn is still taken even if the Blade leaves play before it starts.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Cure the body - save the soul.
Program.FullCard.Name: Convalescence
Program.FullCard.Notes: From the Through the Dark Portal FAQ
Program.FullCard.Rules: Your hero heals all damage from target ally. You may destroy an ability attached to that ally.
Program.FullCard.Rulings: [TDP Rules FAQ] You can target an ally with no damage on it and/or no abilities attached to it.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Do as she says, lest you incur her wrath and bring ruin upon all of the tuskarr." - Elder Mana'loa
Program.FullCard.Name: Conversing With the Depths
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Pay 3 to complete this quest.
Reward: Draw a card for each five cards in your graveyard.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Hunters aren't the only ones who can trap you." - Zophos
Program.FullCard.Name: Convert
Program.FullCard.Rules: Destroy target attacking ally. If you do, your hero heals damage from itself equal to that ally's ATK.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "The unbridled force of nature is a power not to be trifled with." - Lanthus
Program.FullCard.Name: Convocation
Program.FullCard.Rules: Ongoing: When you play an ally, your hero either deals nature damage to or heals damage from target hero equal to that ally's cost.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Here's da plan. You sneak up on it, den I toss dis axe at its head!"
Program.FullCard.Name: Coordinated Attack
Program.FullCard.Rules: Ongoing: Friendly heros have " This hero deals 1 ranged damage to target hero or ally."

Program.FullCard.Name: Core Hound Tooth
Program.FullCard.Rules:
At the start of your turn, put a +1 ATK counter on Core Hound Tooth.
When your hero deals combat damage with Core Hound Tooth, remove all +1 ATK counters from Core Hound Tooth.

Program.FullCard.Name: Core Rager
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Protector
At the end of your turn, ready Core Rager.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "It says that they have Corki and if we don't cooperate, they're going to eat him." - Arechron
Program.FullCard.Name: Corki's Ransom
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Put Corki's Ransom into its owner's hand and pay 2 to complete this quest.
Reward: Draw a card.
Program.FullCard.Rulings: [FoO Rules FAQ] You pay costs in any order, so you can exhaust Corki’s Ransom to pay for itself before putting it into its owner’s hand.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "This existence is not without its perks." - Triton the Sacrilegious
Program.FullCard.Name: Corpse Explosion
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Unholy Hero Required
Remove target ally in a graveyard from the game. If you do, your hero deals 4 shadow damage to each opposing hero and ally.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Nothing is certain except death and repair costs.
Program.FullCard.Name: Corpse Run
Program.FullCard.Rules: Ongoing: When an ally in your party is destroyed during your turn, you may put it from its owner's graveyard into his hand at end of turn.

Program.FullCard.Name: Corrosion Prevention
Program.FullCard.Rules:
If a hero or ally you controlled dealt nature ([Nature]) damage this turn: Pay 2 to complete this quest.
Reward: Draw a card.

Program.FullCard.Name: Corruption
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Attach to target hero or ally.
Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 1 shadow damage to attached character.
When attached character is destroyed, its controller discards a card.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "My quest here is to find those powerful enough to slay Theradras so we may recover Zaelar's remains before returning to Stonetalon." - Keeper Marandis
Program.FullCard.Name: Corruption of Earth and Seed
Program.FullCard.Rules:
You pay 1 less to complete this quest for each [Nature] ally in your party.
Pay 3 To complete this quest.
Reward: Draw a card.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "It's good to be back, and I'd like to keep it that way."
Program.FullCard.Name: Corruptor Mimi Whippleshade
Program.FullCard.Rules: At the start of your turn, this ally deals 3 shadow damage to each opposing hero for each Disease attached to that hero.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "The Nether thanks you for your generous donation."
Program.FullCard.Name: Corvus Promaethon
Program.FullCard.Rules: Remove target ability or equipment from the game.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Face the Kolkar invaders, and end their threat in the Barrens. Kill them until their leader, Warlord Krom'zar, appears. Defeat him and bring me a piece of his banner as proof." - Regthar Deathgate
Program.FullCard.Name: Counterattack!
Program.FullCard.Rules:
While there are more allies in an opponent's party than in yours, pay 3 to complete this quest.
Reward: Draw two cards.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "No voodoo for you, mon." - Ta'zo
Program.FullCard.Name: Counterspell
Program.FullCard.Rules: Interrupt target ability card.

Program.FullCard.Name: Counting Out Time
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Pay 4 to complete this quest.
Reward: Draw a card. If you control ten or more resources, draw another two cards.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Let there never be rest for the weary." - The Assassin's Creed, Chapter 4
Program.FullCard.Name: Coup de Grace
Program.FullCard.Rules: Destroy target exhausted ally.

Program.FullCard.Name: Courageous Defense
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Draw a card.
Ongoing: Your hero is a protector.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Tread softly. We must keep our presence here a secret." - Oakenclaw
Program.FullCard.Name: Cover of Silence
Program.FullCard.Rules: Your hero has Stealth. Opponents can't play cards on your turn.

Program.FullCard.Name: Cower
Program.FullCard.Rules:
If your hero is in combat, remove it from combat and ready it.
Ongoing: Your hero is in cat form. (+1 ATK while attacking. Destroy this card when you strike with a seapon or play a non-Feral ability.)

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Diiiiiiiiiiiiiie!"
Program.FullCard.Name: Cowering Shout
Program.FullCard.Rules: Target ally has -3 ATK / -3 health this turn.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: The most effective assassins are those without a conscience.
Program.FullCard.Name: Cowl of the Guiltless
Program.FullCard.Rules: When you play an ability, target hero or ally has stealth this turn.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "To be honest, that wasn't quite what I had in mind." - "Black Ice" Fizzlefreeze
Program.FullCard.Name: Crackling Purge
Program.FullCard.Rules: Destroy target ability. If it wasn't attached to a friendly hero or ally, your hero may deal nature damage to its controller's hero equal to its cost.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Service to the Stormpike can provide the staunchest supporters with the means to annihilate their foes.
Program.FullCard.Name: Crackling Staff
Program.FullCard.Rules: When a [Horde] ally is dealt nature or [Nature] damage, destroy it.

Program.FullCard.Name: Crash of Tides, The
Program.FullCard.Rules: Your hero deals 1 nature damage to target hero or ally and heals 1 damage from a second target hero or ally for each damage dealt this way.
Program.FullCard.Rulings: [BoG Rules FAQ] This card requires two (different) targets. If the second becomes illegal in response, the first is still dealt damage, but no damage is healed. If the first becomes illegal in response, nothing happens.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Ye won't be getting past me, laddy!"
Program.FullCard.Name: Crazy Igvand
Program.FullCard.Rules: Protector

Program.FullCard.Name: Creeping Shadow
Program.FullCard.Rules: Attach to target hero or ally.Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 2 shadow damage to attached character.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "After seeing those I thought dead return to the battlefield, I have become more thorough." - Grindel Hellbringer
Program.FullCard.Name: Cremate
Program.FullCard.Rules: Your hero deals 2 fire damage to target hero or ally. If that character would be destroyed this turn, remove it from the game instead.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Press the advantage, kid, or you'll never be the Amphitheater of Anguish champ!" - Gurgthock
Program.FullCard.Name: Crimson Cranium Crusher
Program.FullCard.Rules: When an opposing resource turns face down, you may draw a card.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Don't make me raise my wand!"
Program.FullCard.Name: Crimson Felt Hat
Program.FullCard.Rules: When you play an ability, you may exhaust target armor.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: The heat of the Molten Core shimmers inside the wand's glowing tip.
Program.FullCard.Name: Crimson Shocker
Program.FullCard.Rules: When Crimson Shocker enters play, your hero may deal 2 fire damage to target hero or ally.

Program.FullCard.Name: Crippling Poison

Attach to target hero or ally that was dealt combat damage by your hero this turn.
Ongoing: At the start of each turn, exhaust attached character unless its controller pays 3.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: A well-placed shot can weaken the strongest arm and slow the swiftest hand.

Program.FullCard.Rules: Target hero or ally had -5 ATK this turn.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "You are nothing short of clueless." - Boum Headshot
Program.FullCard.Name: Crippling Strike
Program.FullCard.Rules: Ongoing: Target ally has -3 ATK while in combat with your hero this turn.

Program.FullCard.Name: Cromarius Blackfist

Program.FullCard.Name: Crown of Destruction
Program.FullCard.Notes: From the Through the Dark Portal FAQ
Program.FullCard.Rules: At the end of each player's turn, that player destroys one of his abilities, allies, or equipment.
Program.FullCard.Rulings: [TDP Rules FAQ] That player must choose an ability, ally, or equipment that can be destroyed. He can’t choose a card that can’t be destroyed or a card type that he doesn’t control.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Every young night elf is taught the history of the kaldorei and Teldrassil.
Program.FullCard.Name: Crown of the Earth
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Pay 3 to complete this quest.
Reward: Choose one: Put your hand on the bottom of your deck, then draw that many cards; or draw a card. If your hero is a Night Elf, you may choose both.
