Program.FullCard.Flavor: The hand's cruelty is a reflection of the cruelty Timmy had endured in his short life.
Program.FullCard.Name: Cruel Hand of Timmy, The
Program.FullCard.Rules: When your hero deals combat damage with The Cruel Hand of Timmy to a hero, that hero's controller destroys one of his resources.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "What's the point of doing a job if you're not going to do it well?" - Bulkas Wildhorn
Program.FullCard.Name: Cruelty
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Fury Hero Required
Ongoing: Your hero has +1 ATK while you have a weapon.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "The Light will unite the righteous to strike down the wicked." - Commander Goodchilde
Program.FullCard.Name: Crusade
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Retribution Hero Required
Ongoing: Your hero has +2 ATK when attacking.
When your hero deals combat damage to a Demon ally, destroy it.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Where both the Alliance and the Horde failed, the Argent Crusade succeeded."
Program.FullCard.Name: Crusade Commander Entari
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Argent Crusade Reputation
At the end of your turn, this ally deals 1 unpreventable holy damage to each opposing hero and ally for each Unique ally you control.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "We need fuel, and they need to die. We call that a 'win-win.'"
Program.FullCard.Name: Crusade Engineer Spitzpatrick
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Argent Crusade Reputation
Protector
When this or another Unique ally enters play under your control, you may draw a card.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "With the Sunwell restored, we Blood Knights must turn our energy to the north and test our new strength against another great evil."
Program.FullCard.Name: Crusader Farisa
Program.FullCard.Rules: On your turn: Flip Farisa, discard a Paladin Farisa heals 3 damage from target ally. Draw a card.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "We need every able-bodied man and woman to help keep the tide of evil at bay!"
Program.FullCard.Name: Crusader Lord Dalfors
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Argent Crusade Reputation
If a Unique ally you control would be dealt damage, prevent 1 of it.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Our cause is just. Nothing will stand in our way."
Program.FullCard.Name: Crusader Michael Goodchilde
Program.FullCard.Rules:
2, Flip Michael If an opposing ally would be dealt combat damage while defending this turn, it's dealt that much +2 instead.
Scarlet Crusade

Program.FullCard.Name: Crusader Strike
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Retribution Hero Required
Your hero deals melee damage to target hero or ally equal to 3 plus the ATK of one of your Melee weapons.
You may put an ongoing Judgement or Seal card from your graveyard into play.
Program.FullCard.Rulings: [DoW Rules FAQ] Judgement of Light and Judgement of Wisdom have received errata. Both now have the Judgement tag.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: All are equal before the searing power of the Light.
Program.FullCard.Name: Crusader's Sweep
Program.FullCard.Rules: Your hero deals 1 unpreventable holy damage to each opposing hero and ally.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Puny mortals…"
Program.FullCard.Name: Crush
Program.FullCard.Rules: Destroy target ally.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "You didn't even have time to say hello."
Program.FullCard.Name: Crush Soul
Program.FullCard.Rules: Interrupt target ally card. If you do, remove it from the game and put damage on your hero equal to that card's ATK.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Metal is no match for rage.
Program.FullCard.Name: Crushing Blow
Program.FullCard.Rules: Choose one or both: Destroy target armor; or destroy target weapon.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Its darkness can strangle heroes and suffocate hope.
Program.FullCard.Name: Crushing Shadows
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Traitor Hero Required
Each opponent discards a random card, and your hero deals shadow damage to his hero equal to that card's cost.

Program.FullCard.Name: Crushing Strike
Program.FullCard.Rules: Destroy target opposing equipment. If you do, your hero may deal 3 melee damage to its controller's hero.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Two claws, six legs, all cantankerous
Program.FullCard.Name: Crusty
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Protector
When Crusty deals combat damage to an ally, he may also deal that much melee damage to a second target hero or ally.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: If you aren't mindful of your surroundings, you may soon find yourself wrapped in webs and waiting to be feasted upon. - Crusader Lord Dalfors
Program.FullCard.Name: Crypt Fiend
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Scourge Hero Required
Prevent all damage that [Alliance] and [Horde] allies would deal to this ally.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Even the cruelest weaponry may serve a righteous and just cause." - Justice Blindburn
Program.FullCard.Name: Cryptfiend's Bite
Program.FullCard.Rules: When you strike with this weapon on an opponent's turn, put two 1 [Melee] / 1 [Health] Scarab ally tokens into play.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Do you know how hot a jewel has to get to burn? That's a lot of power!" - Blaize Brightspark
Program.FullCard.Name: Crystalfire Staff
Program.FullCard.Rules: Exhaust your hero Target player draws a card.

Program.FullCard.Name: Crystalheart Pulse-Staff
Program.FullCard.Rules: 2, Remove a friendly ally fom the game. If you do, its owner puts it into play at the end of your turn.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "What am I talking about? Why, the crystals, of course!" - J.D. Collie
Program.FullCard.Name: Crystals of Power
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Pay 3 to complete this quest.
Reward: Reveal the top five cards of your deck. Put a revealed [Nature] card into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Flameweave is coming back in style this season." - Cerripha Sunstreak
Program.FullCard.Name: Cuffs of Devastation
Program.FullCard.Rules: When Cuffs of Devastation enters play, your hero deals 4 arcane damage to target opposing ally.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "The Earth Mother smiles upon you this day."
Program.FullCard.Name: Cul Rendhoof
Program.FullCard.Rules: 3, Flip Cul Rendhoof When target ally in your party is destroyed this turn, its owner puts it from his graveyard into his resource row face down and exhausted.

Program.FullCard.Name: Cull the Weak
Program.FullCard.Rules: Each friendly player may destroy an ally in his party. Your hero deals shadow damage to target hero equal to the combined ATK of the destroyed allies.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Hearing their screams, watching the last life fade from their wretched bodies. . .it's invigorating, is it not?" - Serinar
Program.FullCard.Name: Culling the Damned
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Reveal any number of cards from your hand and pay 5 to complete this quest.
Reward: If you revealed an ability, draw a card.
If you revealed an ally, draw a card.
If you revealed an equipment, draw a card.

Program.FullCard.Name: Curse of Agony
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Attach to target hero or ally.
Ongoing: At the start of your turn, put an agony counter on Curse of Agony, then your hero deals 1 shadow damage to attached character for each agony counter on Curse of Agony.

Program.FullCard.Name: Curse of Contagion
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Attach to target ally.
Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 1 shadow damage to attached ally.
When attached ally is destroyed, you may put Curse of Contagion from it owner's graveyard into play attached to target ally.

Program.FullCard.Name: Curse of Doom
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Attach to target opposing ally.
Ongoing: At the start of your turn, destroy attached ally. If you do, reveal the top X cards of your deck, where X is the number of resources you control. Put a revealed Demon with cost X or less into play and shuffle the rest into your deck.

Program.FullCard.Name: Curse of Endless Suffering
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Attach to target hero or ally.
Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 1 shadow damage to attached character.
3 Search your deck for a card named Curse of Endless Suffering and attach it to attached character.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Submit now and ease your burden." - Little Shizzle
Program.FullCard.Name: Curse of Exhaustion
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Affliction Hero Required
Target player skips his next turn.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "You look tired."
Program.FullCard.Name: Curse of Fatigue
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Attach to target hero or ally.
Ongoing: At the start of your turn, put a fatigue counter on Curse of Fatigue.
Attached character has -1 health for each fatugue counter.

Program.FullCard.Name: Curse of Frenzy
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Attach to target ally.
Ongoing: Attached ally must attack if able and can only attack allies if able.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Not much of a hreo, are you?" - Kristoff Manchester
Program.FullCard.Name: Curse of Midnight
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Attach to target hero, and you may turn it face down.
Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 1 shadow damage to attached hero.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Sometimes I hurt you; sometimes I just make it easy for you to be hurt." - Harrigan Soulsunder
Program.FullCard.Name: Curse of the Elements
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Attach to target hero.
Ongoing: If attached hero would be dealt fire, frost, or nature damage, it's dealt that much +3 instead.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Sister Clara gasped as she tried to speak and nothing but demonic utterances issued forth.
Program.FullCard.Name: Curse of Tongues
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Attach to target hero.
Ongoing: Attached hero's controller pays 1 more to play abilities.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "The squeezing grip of shadows is not easily broken." - Kileana
Program.FullCard.Name: Curse of Weakness
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Attach to target hero or ally.
Ongoing: At the start of attached character's controller's turn, exhaust it unless he pays 4.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Sargeras burned away the Betrayer's eyes to gift him with the vision of the Legion.
Program.FullCard.Name: Cursed Vision of Sargeras
Program.FullCard.Rules: If you completed a quest this turn, turn target resource face down.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "I am an equal-opportunity pain provider." - Jonas White
Program.FullCard.Name: Cut to the Chase
Program.FullCard.Rules:
As an additional cost to play, remove up to five Combo cards in your graveyard from the game.
Your hero deals that much melee damage to each opposing ally.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Ysera sleeps in the Emerald Dream, watching over both the Dream and Azeroth." - Nishera the Garden Keeper
Program.FullCard.Name: Cycle of Life
Program.FullCard.Rules:
If an ally entered play and an ally left play this turn: Pay 2 to complete this quest.
Reward: Draw a card.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Gentle breezes seldom stay that way for long.
Program.FullCard.Name: Cyclone
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Attach to target hero or ally, and put three wind counters on Cyclone.
Ongoing: Attached character can't attack or protect.
At the start of your turn, remove a wind counter from Cyclone. If you removed the last one, destroy Cyclone.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Don't worry, it's just the leaves rustling." - The last words of Ertog Ragetusk, Splintertree Post Guard
Program.FullCard.Name: Cymbre Shadowdrifter
Program.FullCard.Rules: Shadowmeld (Elusive and untargetable when ready.)

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Some fear the bitter cold, while I choose to embrace it.
Program.FullCard.Name: Cynthia Masters
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Assault 1 (This ally has +1 ATK on your turn.)
This ally has an additional Assault 1 for each other [Frost] ally you control.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Bargaining with rogues is like inviting a fox to live in your hen house." - Pappy Ironbane
Program.FullCard.Name: Dagger of Betrayal
Program.FullCard.Rules: On your turn: Target opponent chooses an ally he controls. Exchange control of that ally and this weapon.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Move ober, Ty'gor! Me kan still see you." - Dagg'um
Program.FullCard.Name: Dagg'um Ty'gor
Program.FullCard.Rules: Conspicuous (An opposing hero or ally may protect against this ally.)

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Give yourself to the Scourge, and I promise you a painless and hasty transition into the unending service of the Lich King.
Program.FullCard.Name: Dalronn the Controller
Program.FullCard.Rules: Flip Dalronn, remove a Warlock in your graveyard from the game Target Demon has +3 ATK this turn.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "The end is upon you!" - Kel'Thuzad
Program.FullCard.Name: Damnation
Program.FullCard.Rules: Opposing cards everywhere have "Death Rattle: Your hero deals 1 shadow damage to itself."

Program.FullCard.Name: Dampen Magic
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Attach to target friendly hero or ally.
Ongoing: If attached character would be dealt damage with an ability, prevent 1 of that damage.

Program.FullCard.Name: Dancing Rune Weapon
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Blood Hero Required
Put a weapon with cost less than or equal to the number of resources you control from your hand into play. At the end of this turn, put that weapon from play into your hand.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Humans and dwarves share a bond that has remained through countless conflicts.
Program.FullCard.Name: Daniel Soortan
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Diplomacy: Dwarves (You pay 1 less to play Dwarf allies, to a minimum of 1.)
Target player puts the top two cards of his deck into his graveyard.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Keep it coming!"
Program.FullCard.Name: Dannon Spellsurge
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Protector
When you play an ability, Dannon has +2 ATK this turn.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "In life I sought to heal all wounds, but in death I seek to further them."
Program.FullCard.Name: Danyssa Stillheart
Program.FullCard.Rules: 1, Discard a card Target hero or ally has -1 [Health] this turn.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Each Scourge I see is just another target that must be cleansed in a bath of holy fire."
Program.FullCard.Name: Daralis the Sanctifier
Program.FullCard.Rules: When you play an Ongoing [Priest] ability, this ally may deal 3 unpreventable holy damage to target hero or ally.

Program.FullCard.Name: Darbun Steppeheart
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Protector
War Stomp (When this ally attacks or defends, you may exhaust target opposing hero or ally.)

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Your screams of pain only encourage me to try harder."
Program.FullCard.Name: Dark Archon Farrum
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Will of the Forsaken (This ally can't leave play unless it has fatal damage or 0 health.)
Your hero can protect Farrum.

Program.FullCard.Name: Dark Cleric Ismantal
Program.FullCard.Rules: 4 Dark Cleric Ismantal deals 1 shadow damage to target hero or ally. That character's controller discards a card for each damage dealt. Use only on your turn.

Program.FullCard.Name: Dark Cleric Jocasta
Program.FullCard.Rules: When Dark Cleric Jocasta enters play, you may put target ally card from your graveyard into your hand.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "The power of death compels you." - Randolphe Mortimer
Program.FullCard.Name: Dark Command
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Attach to target ally.
Ongoing: Attached ally has -3 ATK, must attack if able, and can attack only your hero if able.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "What a shame your will was not as strong as your body. Now they both belong to me." - Tilly Fiddlelight
Program.FullCard.Name: Dark Extortion
Program.FullCard.Rules: Target player chooses an ally he controls. Gain control of that ally.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Freshly scourged, eh? Ya still be reekin' of da living!" - Overlord Drakuru
Program.FullCard.Name: Dark Horizon
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Pay 3 to complete this quest.
Reward: Draw a card. If a hero or ally you controlled dealt shadow ([Shadow]) damage this turn, draw another card.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "It is a price I am willing to pay." - Forang Deathrattle
Program.FullCard.Name: Dark Justice
Program.FullCard.Rules: Remove target ally from the game and put damage on your hero equal to that ally's ATK.
Program.FullCard.Rulings: [BoG Rules FAQ] Put damage on your hero equal to the ATK that ally had as it left play.

Program.FullCard.Name: Dark Mending Channeler
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Dark Mending Channeler can attack only heroes and has +X ATK while attacking, where X is 1 plus the number of Warlocks that have left your party.
Dark Mending Channeler heals all damage from target friendly ally. Use only on your turn.

Program.FullCard.Name: Dark Pact
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Affliction Hero Required.
As an additional cost to play Dark Pact, destroy one of your Pets.
Draw X cards, where X is the cost of the Pet you destroyed.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "The cost is irrelevant. Only the outcome truly matters." - Omedus the Punisher
Program.FullCard.Name: Dark Penance
Program.FullCard.Rules: Target opponent discards a random card and destroys a random ally he controls.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Those who stand against the shadow will ultimately be consumed by it."
Program.FullCard.Name: Darkeater, The
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Other Shadow allies have +2 ATK / +2 health.
Non-Shadow allies have -2 ATK / -2 health.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "It's…not…OVER!" - Gladiator Emek
Program.FullCard.Name: Darkest Before the Light
Program.FullCard.Rules: Your hero heals all damage from each friendly hero and ally.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "This is madness!"
Program.FullCard.Name: Darkmoon Card: Madness
Program.FullCard.Rules: On your turn: 2, Remove the top card of target opponent's deck from the game. If it's an ability, ally, or equipment card, he destroys a card of that kind he controls.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "We have it all…delicious food, strong drink, exotic artifacts, fortunes read, amazing prizes, and excitement without end!" - Silas Darkmoon
Program.FullCard.Name: Darkmoon Faire, The
Program.FullCard.Rules:
1, , Discard a card Draw a card.
At the start of your turn, if you control cards in play with costs 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, and 8, you win the game.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Your mind has betrayed you." - Kintara Wintermoon.
Program.FullCard.Name: Darkness
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Shadow Hero Required
Target player discards his hand.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "It would seem that you have been…chosen." - Stephan Vadu
Program.FullCard.Name: Darkness Calling
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Pay 3 to complete this quest.
Reward: Draw two cards, then discard a card.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Be careful of your actions, for Yogg-Saron can penetrate even the most resolute minds.
Program.FullCard.Name: Darkspeaker's Footpads, The
Program.FullCard.Rules: Ready a resource you control.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: You haven't truly mastered your craft if you have not learned the power that lies in the shadows.
Program.FullCard.Name: Darktwister Kern

Program.FullCard.Flavor: By the grace of Elune…
Program.FullCard.Name: Darnassus
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Night Elf Hero Required
On your turn: 1, Ready target Night Elf in your party. It can't attack this turn.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Tor ilisar'thera'nal!"
Program.FullCard.Name: Darnassus Sentinels
Program.FullCard.Rules: When Darnassus Sentinels enters play, you may pay 1. If you do, put a card named Darnassus Sentinels from your graveyard into your hand.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Bring me some of Ironforge's finest brew when I'm done here, laddie."
Program.FullCard.Name: Darok Steelstrike
Program.FullCard.Rules: Find Treasure (When this ally enters play, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.)

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "This is my elekk. There are many like it, but this one is mine."
Program.FullCard.Name: Darynus
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Aldor Reputation (Can't put Scryer cards in your deck.)
Protector
Inspire: Ally (Ready one of your allies during each other player's ready step.)

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Have you met me friends?"
Program.FullCard.Name: Dashel Stonefist
Program.FullCard.Rules: Dashel can attack friendly heroes and allies (including other characters in your party).

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Whoever said you can't have too many weapons is a genius. Oh wait - that was me."
Program.FullCard.Name: Daspien Bladedancer
Program.FullCard.Rules: 5, Flip Daspien Bladedancer Daspien deals X melee damage to target hero or ally, where X is the combined ATK of your Melee weapons.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Tough times are ahead…for all of us."
Program.FullCard.Name: David Smythe
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Protector
When David readies, you may remove an ally card in your graveyard form the game. If you do, destroy target equipment.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Do not let doubt assail you. You are far stronger than you realize."
Program.FullCard.Name: Dawn Ravensdale
Program.FullCard.Rules: When Dawn enters play, you may turn target face-down hero face up.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Let the Light alleviate any wounds you may have received in battle." - Marta Spires
Program.FullCard.Name: Dawn's Grace
Program.FullCard.Rules: Your hero heals 6 damage divided as you choose from any number of target heroes and/or allies.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: As the second daughter of Roza, Dayna is blessed with her mother's resolution.
Program.FullCard.Name: Dayna Cousin-to-Sun
Program.FullCard.Rules: Dayna Cousin-to-Sun has +1 health for each resource you have.

Program.FullCard.Name: Daze
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Look at target player's hand and choose a card. He discards that card.
Stash (As this enters your resource row, you may have it enter face up. Immediately turn it face down.): Look at target player's hand.

Program.FullCard.Name: Deacon Johanna
Program.FullCard.Rules: 2 Deacon Johanna heals 2 damage from target hero or ally. Use only once per turn.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: The body need not be slain for a priest to exert command over the soul.
Program.FullCard.Name: Deacon Markus Hallow
Program.FullCard.Rules: 6, Flip Deacon Markus Hallow Gain control of target opposing ally if its controller has no cards in his hand. Use only on your turn.
Program.FullCard.Rulings: [FoO Rules FAQ] Count cards in that opponent’s hand only as this effect resolves. If you gain control of the target ally, it stays under your control regardless of any changes in that opponent’s hand size.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Some rogues like to disarm their opponents. I find it's much easier to totally rid them of their arms." - Ressa Shadshine
Program.FullCard.Name: Dead Weight
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Attach to target ally or equipment.
Ongoing: When attached card exhausts, destroy it.

Program.FullCard.Name: Deadliness
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Subtlety Hero Required
Choose one or more: Destroy target exhausted ally; destroy target exhausted equipment; destroy target exhausted resource.

Program.FullCard.Name: Deadly Brew
Program.FullCard.Rules: Choose a Poison attached to a hero or ally. Search your deck for a card with the same name and attach it to that character.

Program.FullCard.Name: Deadly Poison
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Attach to target hero or ally that was dealt combat damage by your hero this turn.
Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 2 nature damage to attached character.

Program.FullCard.Name: Deadly Sweep
Program.FullCard.Rules: For each raiding player, destroy up to one target ability, ally, or equipment he controls.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Try to run, I dare you." - Umbrage
Program.FullCard.Name: Deadly Throw
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Finishing Move (To play, remove X Combo cards in your graveyard from the game, where X is 5 or less.)
Your Daggers have Thrown and +X ATK this turn.

Program.FullCard.Name: Deafening Shout
Program.FullCard.Rules: Ongoing: Opposing allies have -3 ATK / -3 health.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "It's not hard to track a death knight, mon. Just follow the devastation." - The Longeye
Program.FullCard.Name: Death and Decay
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Ongoing: When your hero enters combat with a hero or ally, it deals 1 shadow damage to that character.
Death Rattle (When this ability enters your graveyard from anywhere): When your hero enters combat with a hero or ally this turn, it deals 1 shadow damage to that character.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Those who have shunned the Light are welcomed with open arms by the shadows.
Program.FullCard.Name: Death Coil
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Your hero deals 3 shadow damage to target hero or ally.
Ready a Ghoul in your party.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Death is not something you can run from when it comes for you.
Program.FullCard.Name: Death Coil
Program.FullCard.Rules: Remove target ally in an opponent's party from the game. At the start of your next turn, that opponent puts that ally into play under his control, and your hero deals 2 shadow damage to it.
Program.FullCard.Rulings: [FoO Rules FAQ] That ally enters play ready and with no damage, and then your hero deals 2 shadow damage to it before any player gets priority.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Only thos whoe walk the path of the dead may enter." - Saeryn Dusksorrow
Program.FullCard.Name: Death Gate
Program.FullCard.Rules: Destroy a resource you control. If you do, search your deck for a location and put it into play face up and exhausted.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "I find your excess of resistance disturbing." - Vanessa Fairgraves
Program.FullCard.Name: Death Grip
Program.FullCard.Rules: Ongoing: This turn, target opposing hero or ally must attack if able and can attack only your hero if able.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Your services are no longer required." - Drandus the Deathcaller
Program.FullCard.Name: Death Pact
Program.FullCard.Rules:
As an additional cost to play, destroy an ally you control.
Your hero heals damage from itself equal to that ally's [Health] and has +X ATK this turn, where X was that ally's ATK.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Feel my pain." - Ixamos the Corrupted
Program.FullCard.Name: Death Shock
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Traitor Hero Required
Your hero deals 1 nature damage to target ally for each damage on your hero.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Bring an end to the traitor king's reign. You will be doing a great service to both of our people." - Kilix the Unraveller
Program.FullCard.Name: Death to the Traitor King
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Nerubian Reputation
On your turn: Declare an opposing hero or ally the Traitor King this turn and pay 3 to complete this quest.
Reward: Draw a card. Heroes and allies you control have Assault 1 while attacking the Traitor King this turn.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "It's a trap!"
Program.FullCard.Name: Death Trap
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Traitor Hero Required
Trap (You may exhaust your defending hero rather than pay this card's cost.)
Destroy target attacking ally. If you do, your hero deals 1 nature damage to each hero and ally in that ally's party.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "I'd rather fight and die than spend the rest of my days stewing in my cowardice." - Boarguts the Impaler
Program.FullCard.Name: Death Wish
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Fury Hero Required
Ongoing: All heroes have +3 ATK this turn.

Program.FullCard.Name: Deathblow
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Finishing Move (To play, remove X Combo cards in your graveyard from the game, where X is 5 or less.)
Your hero deals 1 plus X melee damage to target hero or ally.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Most axes are forged to chop lumber. This one was forged to hack limbs.
Program.FullCard.Name: Deathbringer
Program.FullCard.Rules: When your hero deals combat damage with Deathbringer to an ally, your hero deals that amount of shadow damage to target hero in that ally's party.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Deathchargers will serve only those who have no remorse.
Program.FullCard.Name: Deathcharger
Program.FullCard.Rules:
You pay 1 less to complete quests.
When you place a resource face up, target opposing hero or ally has -3 [Health] this turn.
(Mounts can't attack or be attacked.)

Program.FullCard.Name: Deathchill Cloak
Program.FullCard.Notes: Available as part of Crafting Redemption Program (Wrathgate)
Program.FullCard.Rules: When this armor prevents damage that would be dealt by an attacking ally, that ally can't ready while this armor remains under your control.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: The business of death is like any other, and in Azeroth, demand is always high.
Program.FullCard.Name: Deathdealer Breastplate
Program.FullCard.Rules: Your weapons have +2 ATK.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "…it's time for the hammer to fall." - Blood Guard Gulmok
Program.FullCard.Name: Deathforge, The
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Remove three equipment cards in your graveyard from the game to complete this quest.
Reward: Draw a card.

Program.FullCard.Name: Deathlord Jones
Program.FullCard.Rules:
When this ally enters play, put a 3 [Melee] / 3 [Health] Unique Ghoul ally token named Brode into play exhausted with "This ally can't ready during its controller's ready step."
Once per turn, on your turn: 3 This ally deals 3 shadow damage to target hero or ally. Ready a Ghoul you control.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "This is a death's gaze orb. With it, we can observe the Scourge's actions and decide how best to strike." - Darkrider Arly
Program.FullCard.Name: Death's Gaze
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Pay 2 to complete this quest.
Reward: If you have fewer cards in your hand than in your graveyard, draw a card.

Program.FullCard.Name: Deathseer Zuk'raj
Program.FullCard.Rules: Flip Zuk'raj, remove a Scourge ally in your graveyard from the game The next time Zuk'raj would deal nature damage this turn, he deals that much +1 instead.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "The Deathstalkers do not take kindly to interlopers."
Program.FullCard.Name: Deathstalker Leanna
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Will of the Forsaken (This ally cant leave play unless it has fatal damage or 0 health.)
Leanna has +3 ATK while attacking an exhausted hero or ally.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "This will strike fear into their hearts, and keep it there long after we're gone." - Bloody Mary
Program.FullCard.Name: Debilitating Shout
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Ongoing: Opposing allies and weapons have -2 ATK.
Death Rattle (When this ability enters your graveyard from anywhere.): Target opposing ally or weapon has -4 ATK this turn.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: As the first daughter of Roza, Debros is blessed with her mother's energy.
Program.FullCard.Name: Debros Cousin-to-Moon
Program.FullCard.Rules: Debros Cousin-to-Moon has +1 ATK for each resource you have.

Program.FullCard.Name: Decapitator, The
Program.FullCard.Rules: 0 The Decapitator has thrown this turn. (When you strike with this weapon, your hero has long-range this combat. At the end of this turn, put this weapon into its owner's hand.)

Program.FullCard.Flavor: There was a sharp intake of breath from above, and then fire - nothing but fire all around.
Program.FullCard.Name: Deep Breath
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Stage 2 Only.
Onyxia deals X fire damage to each opposing hero and ally. Deep Breath can't be interrupted.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: When you're cold, you spend a lot of time shivering.
Program.FullCard.Name: Deep Freeze
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Attach to target ally, and your hero deals 2 frost damage to it.
Ongoing: Attached ally can't attack.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "If the information from those sources were to fall into enemy hands, Fleet Master Seahorn would force us down the plank." - First Mate Nilzlix
Program.FullCard.Name: Deep Sea Salvage
Program.FullCard.Rules:
During your turn, pay 4 to complete this quest.
Reward: Put a card from your graveyard on top of your deck.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "If you want it, come and claim it"
Program.FullCard.Name: Defender Kaniya
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Protector
Nature Resistance (Prevent all nature or [Nature] damage that this ally would be dealt.)

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Be patient. Let the fight come to you."
Program.FullCard.Name: Defender Nagalaas
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Protector
Nagalaas has +2 ATK during each opponent's turn.

Program.FullCard.Name: Defender's Vigil
Program.FullCard.Rules: This turn, target hero or ally must attack if able, can attack only your hero if able, and has -3 ATK while attacking your hero.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Your arrival at Grom'gol is timely, indeed." - Commander Aggro'gosh
Program.FullCard.Name: Defense of Grom'gol, The
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Pay 3 to complete this quest.
Reward: Reveal the top two cards of your deck. Put all revealed allies into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Destroy an enemy's defenses, and he is helpless before you.
Program.FullCard.Name: Defensive Breach
Program.FullCard.Rules: Destroy target equipment.

Program.FullCard.Name: Defensive Stance
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Ongoing: Your hero has protector.
If your hero would deal damage, prevent 1 of that damage.
If your hero would be dealt damage, prevent 1 of that damage.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "They stand no chance in single combat with me!" - Warrax
Program.FullCard.Name: Defiance
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Protection Hero Required
Ongoing: Only one character can attack on each opponent's turn.
Program.FullCard.Rulings: [BoG Rules FAQ] Once any character has become an attacker (normal or sabotage) on an opponent's turn, no other character can be proposed as an attacker (neither normal nor sabotage) that turn. That character can attack multiple times that turn if it somehow readies. If an opponent’s hero attacks, and then that opponent plays a Master hero, that Master hero continues to be the one character who can attack that turn (if it somehow readies).

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "There is but one task left for you to complete. Edwin VanCleef must be assassinated." - Gryan Stoutmantle
Program.FullCard.Name: Defias Brotherhood, The
Program.FullCard.Rules:
While there are four or more allies in your party, pay 1 to complete this quest.
Reward: Draw two cards.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Destroy the runes. . .stamp them out and ensure that the Cult will not have access to whatever power that they've accumulated there." - Serinar
Program.FullCard.Name: Defiling the Defilers
Program.FullCard.Rules:
If allies you controlled dealt 5 or more damage this turn, pay 4 to complete this quest.
Reward: Draw three cards.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: You have to watch your step when invading enemy territory.
Program.FullCard.Name: Defusing the Threat
Program.FullCard.Rules:
If an opponent completed a quest this turn, pay 1 to complete this quest.
Reward: Draw a card.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Some may call it hesitation; I call it patience. - Thoros the Savior
Program.FullCard.Name: Deliberate Heal
Program.FullCard.Rules: Ongoing: At the start of your turn, destroy this ability. If you do, your hero heals 5 damage from target hero or ally, and draw a card.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Rushing headlong into battle isn't always the best policy. - Graccus
Program.FullCard.Name: Deliberate Vengeance
Program.FullCard.Rules: Ongoing: At the start of your turn, destroy this ability. If you do, your hero deals 2 unpreventable holy damage to each opposing hero and ally.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "I sense great power in you. I will enjoy taking it."
Program.FullCard.Name: Delrach the Vile
Program.FullCard.Rules: When Delrach attacks, destroy any number of allies with an attachment.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Let me readjust your perception of reality." - Emerson Zantides
Program.FullCard.Name: Delusions of Grandeur
Program.FullCard.Rules: Target opponent puts an ability, ally, and equipment he controls into their owner's hands.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Maintain your composure against the Scourge, or you will quickly descend into madness." - Deacon Markus Hallow
Program.FullCard.Name: Dementia
Program.FullCard.Rules: Target player puts the top two cards of his deck into his graveyard. If they're both abilities, both allies, or both equipment, that player discards two cards.

Program.FullCard.Name: Demolish
Program.FullCard.Rules: Destroy target equipment.

Program.FullCard.Name: Demon Armor
Program.FullCard.Rules: Ongoing: 1, Remove an ability card in your graveyard from the game Your hero heals 2 damage from itself.

Program.FullCard.Name: Demon Hide Spaulders
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Each of your weapons has +1 ATK this turn.
Each of your armor has +1 DEF this turn.
Program.FullCard.Rulings: [MoL Rules FAQ] Each time you activate Demon Hide Spaulders, you must specify which power you’re using. You can’t use both powers with the same activation.

Program.FullCard.Name: Demonblood Eviscerator
Program.FullCard.Rules: Your hero has dual wield. (Can have a second one-handed Melee weapon instead of an Off-Hand equipment. Can strike with a second Melee weapon during the same combat.)

Program.FullCard.Name: Demonfang Ritual Helm
Program.FullCard.Rules: When an ally in your party is destroyed, each other player destroys an ally in his party.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Power often requires a small sacrifice at the very least. - Kristoff Manchester
Program.FullCard.Name: Demonic Accord
Program.FullCard.Rules: Ongoing: On your turn: 1, Target ally has +1 / -1 this turn.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "While many creatures here have already undergone radical changes, they continue to mutate." - Thiah Redmane
Program.FullCard.Name: Demonic Contamination
Program.FullCard.Rules:
During your turn, put 1 damage on each of three different allies in your party and pay 1 to complete this quest.
Reward: Draw two cards.

Program.FullCard.Name: Demonic Fury
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Demonic Fury enters play exhausted.
Ongoing: You pay 2 less to play your next card this turn.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Everything has a cost. Everything." - Plague Fleshbane
Program.FullCard.Name: Demonic Knowledge
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Demonology Hero Required
Ongoing: , Destroy a Demon in your party Draw two cards.

Program.FullCard.Name: Demonic Reclamation
Program.FullCard.Rules:
As an additional cost to play this ability, destroy an ally you control. Draw two cards.
Stash (As this enters your resource row, you may have it enter face up. Immediately turn it face down.): Shuffle target ally in your graveyard into your deck.

Program.FullCard.Name: Demonic Soulstone
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Attach to target ally you control.
Ongoing: When attached ally is destroyed, put it from its owner's graveyard into his hand.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Look at me wrong, fool, and my minions will tear a hole in your soul!" - Gladiator Kileana
Program.FullCard.Name: Demonologist's Pact
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Preparation (On your first turn, you may play this card without paying its cost.)
Ongoing: You pay 1 less to play pets.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: A weapon isn't born with a name, it earns it.
Program.FullCard.Name: Demonslayer
Program.FullCard.Rules: When you strike with Demonslayer, you may destroy target Demon ally.

Program.FullCard.Name: Demoralizing Roar
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Ongoing: Opposing allies have -2 ATK.
Your hero is in bear form. (Has protector. Destroy this card when you strike with a weapon or play a non-Feral ability.)

Program.FullCard.Flavor: The orc's mighty bellow could unnerve even the bravest of foes.
Program.FullCard.Name: Demoralizing Shout
Program.FullCard.Rules: Ongoing: Opposing allies have -1 ATK

Program.FullCard.Name: Depths of Shadows, The
Program.FullCard.Rules: Your hero deals 1 melee damage to target hero or ally. Its controller destroys one of his resources for each damage dealt this way.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "The Earth Mother has forsaken us."
Program.FullCard.Name: Desecrator Stormclaw
Program.FullCard.Rules:
2, Flip Stormclaw, destroy a friendly ally Put target Form card from your graveyard into hand.
Druids of the Fang

Program.FullCard.Name: Desperate Block
Program.FullCard.Rules: Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to target hero or ally this turn.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: If this is to be my last breath, then I will make it one worth remembering. - Joren the Martyr
Program.FullCard.Name: Desperate Condemnation
Program.FullCard.Rules: If your hero has 15 or more damage, it deals 5 unpreventable holy damage to target ally.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: If you can buy me just a moment, I will be as good as new. - Marta Spires
Program.FullCard.Name: Desperate Plea
Program.FullCard.Rules: If your hero has 15 or more damage, it heals 10 damage from itself.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Engraved on the hilt are the words, "Fate and fortune guide you."
Program.FullCard.Name: Destiny
Program.FullCard.Rules:
When your hero deals combat damage with Destiny, put a strength counter on Destiny.
Destiny has +1 ATK for each strength counter on it.

Program.FullCard.Name: Detect Prey
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Allies you control have Long-Range while in combat with target hero or ally this turn.
Stash (As this enters your resource row, you may have it enter face up. Immediately turn it face down.): Your hero has Long-Range this turn.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "No surprises here."
Program.FullCard.Name: Detect Traps
Program.FullCard.Rules: Choose "ability," "ally," or "equipment," and then target player reveals his hand and discards all cards of that kind.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "You have grossly miscalculated and it will be your undoing."
Program.FullCard.Name: Dethvir the Malignant
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Undead Hero Required
Will of the Forsaken
If another hero or ally in your party would be dealt damage, you may have it be dealt to Dethvir instead.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Remember to share this with your friends. They are sure to enjoy it, too." - Felbender Lara
Program.FullCard.Name: Detonate Soul
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Attach to target opposing ally.
Ongoing: At the start of your turn, remove attached ally and all other opposing allies from the game.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Sometimes nature decides that two heads are better than one." - Kassandra Flameheart
Program.FullCard.Name: Deuce
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Beast Mastery Hero Required
While this ally is in your graveyard, you can control an additional Pet.

Program.FullCard.Name: Devastate
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Protection Hero Required
Your hero deals melee damage to target hero or ally equal to the ATK of one of your Melee weapons. This turn, that character must attack if able and can attack only your hero if able.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "All will soon be laid to waste." - Kileana the Inferno
Program.FullCard.Name: Devastation
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Destruction Hero Required
As an additional cost to play, choose "ability," "ally," or "equipment" and destroy a card you control of that kind.
Destroy all opposing cards of that kind.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Those seeking devilsaur leather often become devilsaur meals.
Program.FullCard.Name: Devilsaur Leggings
Program.FullCard.Notes: UDE Card Preview, Errata: Tag should be Legs(1), not Leggings(1)
Program.FullCard.Rules: When your hero deals combat damage to an ally, destroy that ally.

Program.FullCard.Name: Devil-Stiched Leggings
Program.FullCard.Rules: 3, Exhaust your hero Target hero or ally has -3 health this turn.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Look to me, and the Light will give us strength."
Program.FullCard.Name: Devona Berkshire
Program.FullCard.Rules:
While you control a Death Knight or Warrior, this ally has Protector.
While you control a Hunter or Shaman, this ally has Assault 2.
While you control a Priest or Druid, this ally has Mend 2.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "By safeguarding those around him, a paladin aids in his own defense." - Uther the Lightbringer
Program.FullCard.Name: Devotion Aura
Program.FullCard.Rules: Ongoing: If a hero or ally in your party would be dealt damage, prevent 1 of that damage.

Program.FullCard.Name: Devour
Program.FullCard.Rules: If Onyxia is defending, she deals 5 melee damage to target attacking hero or ally.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "When the shadows are through with you, there will be nothing left, not even your bones." - Deacon Markus Hallow
Program.FullCard.Name: Devouring Plague
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Attach to target hero.
Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 3 shadow damage to attached hero. Attached hero's controller discards a card for each damage dealt this way.

Program.FullCard.Name: Devout Aurastone Hammer
Program.FullCard.Rules:
You pay 1 less to play your next ally this turn and an additional 1 less for each heirloom counter on this equipment.
Stash (As this enters your resource row, you may have it enter face up. Immediately turn it face down.): Add an heirloom counter to target equipment you control.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Patience will always pay off in the end."
Program.FullCard.Name: Dhoros Ravestrike
Program.FullCard.Rules: 3 This ally has Assault 3 this turn.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Flexibility in your armor plays a crucial part in making your attacks even more devastating."
Program.FullCard.Name: Diane Cannings
Program.FullCard.Rules: This ally has Assault X, where X is the combined [Armor] of Leather and Mail armor you control.

Program.FullCard.Name: Dignified Headmaster's Charge
Program.FullCard.Rules:
2, Draw a card, then draw another card for each heirloom counter on this equipment.
Stash (As this enters your resource row, you may have it enter face up. Immediately turn it face down.): Add an heirloom counter to target equipment you control.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "The blood of my allies shall add fuel to our fire!"
Program.FullCard.Name: Dimzer the Prestidigitator
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Gnome Hero Required
Escape Artist
When you play Dimzer or another ally, you may put 1 damage on it as it enters play. If you do, draw a card.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Personality goes a long way.
Program.FullCard.Name: Diplomacy
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Human Hero Required
Ongoing: You pay 1 less to play allies, to a minimum of 1.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: The grizzly personification of Ursoc the Mighty
Program.FullCard.Name: Dire Bear Form
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Ongoing: Your hero has Bear Form. (Has Protector. Destroy this card when you strike with a weapon or play a non-Feral ability.)
You’re her has +5 [Health] for each ally you control.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: You never know what you'll get from a rogue. It's sort of their thing.
Program.FullCard.Name: Dirty Work
Program.FullCard.Rules: Ongoing: If your hero would deal non-combat damage, it deals combat damage instead.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Now you see me…"
Program.FullCard.Name: Disappear
Program.FullCard.Rules: Your hero is elusive this turn. (It can't be attacked.)

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "How about fisticuffs?"
Program.FullCard.Name: Disarm
Program.FullCard.Rules: Destroy all of target player's weapons.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "At least cover it with leaves or something, Azarak. It's like you're not even trying." - Dralor
Program.FullCard.Name: Disarm Trap
Program.FullCard.Rules: Interrupt target instant.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Well, at least you got to use it once." - Koth
Program.FullCard.Name: Disassemble
Program.FullCard.Rules: Destroy target exhausted equipment.

Program.FullCard.Name: Discerning Eye of the Beast
Program.FullCard.Rules:
2, Put this equipment into owner's hand Draw a card.
Stash (As this enters your resource row, you may have it enter face up. Immediately turn it face down.): Add an heirloom counter to target equipment you control.

Program.FullCard.Name: Disco Inferno!
Program.FullCard.Rules: Ongoing: At the end of your turn, ready all exhausted heroes and allies in your party, then exhaust all other heroes and allies in your party.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "With one well-timed strike, any opponent can be stripped of his defenses." - The Assassin's Creed, Chapter 2
Program.FullCard.Name: Dismantle
Program.FullCard.Rules: Destroy target equipment.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: A fool and her blessings are soon parted.
Program.FullCard.Name: Dispel Magic
Program.FullCard.Rules: Destroy target ability.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "I might need this later."
Program.FullCard.Name: Disperse Magic
Program.FullCard.Rules: Ongoing: Destroy Disperse Magic Destroy target ability.

Program.FullCard.Name: Dispersion
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Shadow Hero Required
Ongoing: This ability enters play with two incorporeal counters.
Prevent all damage that would be dealt to your hero.
At the start of your turn, remove an incorporeal counter. If none remain, destroy this ability.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Misdirection is the art of making someone see or hear what isn't there.
Program.FullCard.Name: Distract
Program.FullCard.Notes: From the Through the Dark Portal FAQ
Program.FullCard.Rules: Exhaust all allies in target player's party. Each of those allies can't ready during its controller's next ready step.
Program.FullCard.Rulings: [TDP Rules FAQ] Allies in that player’s party are flagged as Distract resolves. None of those allies can ready during that player’s next ready step, even if they were already exhausted.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "I don't care what you do. Jump up and down. Yell. Dance. Just get their attention." - Ressa Shadeshine
Program.FullCard.Name: Diversion
Program.FullCard.Rules: Ongoing: , Exhaust an ally in your party Your hero has +2 ATK and stealth this turn.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: I guess you shouldn't have gotten us in over our heads. - Sinthya Flabberghast
Program.FullCard.Name: Divert
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Attach to target ability, ally, or equipment you control.
Ongoing: Opposing cards and effects must target attached card if able.

Program.FullCard.Name: Divine Cleansing
Program.FullCard.Rules: Destroy any number of abilities attached to friendly cards.

Program.FullCard.Name: Divine Favor
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Holy Hero Required
Ongoing: , Remove the top X cards of your deck from the game Your hero heals X damage from target hero or ally.

Program.FullCard.Name: Divine Fury
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Holy Hero Required
Your hero deals 5 unpreventable holy damage to target hero or ally and heals 5 damage from target hero or ally.

Program.FullCard.Name: Divine Hymn
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero heals 2 damage from each hero and ally you control.
At the end of your turn, destroy this ability if you don't control an ally.

Program.FullCard.Name: Divine Illumination
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Holy Hero Required
You pay 1 less to play abilities this turn, to a minimum of 1.
Draw a card.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: The Light punishes all unbelievers.
Program.FullCard.Name: Divine Justice
Program.FullCard.Rules: Exhaust target ready opposing ally. If you do, you may have it deal melee damage equal to its ATK to a second target ally.
Program.FullCard.Rulings: [BoG Rules FAQ] This card requires two (different) targets. If the second becomes illegal in response, the first is still exhausted, but no damage is dealt. If the first becomes illegal in response, nothing happens.

Program.FullCard.Name: Divine Plea
Program.FullCard.Rules:
If you control an Aura, your hero deals 2 unpreventable holy damage to each opposing hero and ally.
If you control a Blessing, draw two cards.
If you control a Seal, ready your hero and all of your weapons.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Turn back now. There is no passage for you here." - Nimaasus the Implacable
Program.FullCard.Name: Divine Riposte
Program.FullCard.Rules: Ongoing: When damage that would be dealt to a hero or ally in your party is prevented, your hero deals that much unpreventable holy damage to its source.

Program.FullCard.Name: Divine Shield
Program.FullCard.Notes: UDE Card Preview, Errata: Talent should be Protection, not Holy
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Destroy any number of abilities attached to your hero.
Prevent all damage that would be dealt to your hero this turn.
Your hero can't be targeted by opponents this turn.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: When the Light offers gifts, they are all wonderful.
Program.FullCard.Name: Divine Spirit
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Discipline Hero Required
Ongoing: Draw a card, or ready up to three of your resources.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "The Light infuses me with righteous power! My cause is just!" - Justice Blindburn
Program.FullCard.Name: Divine Storm
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Retribution Hero Required
Your hero deals X unpreventable holy damage to each opposing hero and ally that dealt damage this turn, where X is the ATK of a weapon you control.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "That's a lot of trolls."
Program.FullCard.Name: Divino-matic Rod
Program.FullCard.Rules:
If an opponent has more resources than you, pay 3 to complete this quest.
Reward: Put the top card of your deck into your resource row face down and exhausted.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Who would believe fel magic could hide behind such a face?
Program.FullCard.Name: Dizdemona
Program.FullCard.Rules: 3, Flip Dizdemona, put X damage on her Dizdemona deals X shadow damage to target ally. Use only on your turn.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Whether you like it or not, you will sacrifice yourself for my greater good." - Andarius the Damned
Program.FullCard.Name: Dominate
Program.FullCard.Rules:
As an additional cost to play, destroy an ally in your party.
Your hero deals shadow damage equal to that ally's ATK to each opposing hero and ally.

Program.FullCard.Name: Domona the Ever-Watchful
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Domona deals 2 frost damage to target hero or ally.
When an opposing hero or ally attacks, ready Domona.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Its bottomless pockets have enough space for anything your heart desires." - Dralor
Program.FullCard.Name: Don Alejandro's Money Belt
Program.FullCard.Rules: You may reveal an equipment card from your hand. If you do, put it into your resource row face down and exhausted.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Mageweave is running low, and we could use your help to replenish our stocks!" - Raedon Duskstriker
Program.FullCard.Name: Donation of Mageweave, A
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Pay 3 to complete this quest.
Reward: Draw three cards, then discard three cards.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Wonderful! We thank you for your generous donation! - Ralston Famsley
Program.FullCard.Name: Donation of Silk, A
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Pay 2 to compete this quest.
Reward: Draw two cards, then discard two cards.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Wonderful! We thank you for your generous donation! - Clavicus Knavingham
Program.FullCard.Name: Donation of Wool, A
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Pay 1 to complete this quest.
Reward: Draw a card, then discard a card.

Program.FullCard.Name: Donna Calister
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Protector
When an opposing hero or ally attacks, ready Donna Calister.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: For a time, I considered sparing your wretched soul from oblivion, but now, you shall witness … its dismemberment!
Program.FullCard.Name: Doom
Program.FullCard.Rules: Assault 4 (This ally has +4 ATK on your turn.)

Program.FullCard.Name: Doom Blossom
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Traitor Hero Required
Attach to target hero or ally, and put three blossom counters on Doom Blossom.
Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 1 shadow damage to attached character for each blossom counter, and then you remove one. If none remain, destroy Doom Blossom.

Program.FullCard.Name: Doom Lord Kazzak
Program.FullCard.Rules: At the end of your turn, destroy all non-Demon allies

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Once they served Archimonde, now they serve any who can control them.
Program.FullCard.Name: Doomguard
Program.FullCard.Rules:
When Doomguard enters play, choose at random a friendly hero or ally other than Doomguard, then destroy that character.
At the end of your turn, destroy target opposing ally.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "I promise that you will break before it does." - Halavar
Program.FullCard.Name: Doomplate Chestguard
Program.FullCard.Rules: Your hero has protector while you have five or more equipment.

Program.FullCard.Name: Doomplate Legguards
Program.FullCard.Rules: Your weapons have +3 ATK while you have five or more equipment.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Sporeggar had much to fear…until the heroes of Azeroth arrived.
Program.FullCard.Name: Doomplate Shoulderguards
Program.FullCard.Rules: Each of your other equipment if untargetable while you have five or more equipment.

Program.FullCard.Name: Doomplate Warhelm
Program.FullCard.Rules: Each of your armor has +3 DEF while you have five or more equipment.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Allow me to do dat voodoo dat I do so well!"
Program.FullCard.Name: Doomsayer Din'ju
Program.FullCard.Rules: When Din'ju enters play, turn all opposing resources face down.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Do not proceed. You will be eliminated."
Program.FullCard.Name: Doomwalker
Program.FullCard.Rules: When an opposing ability, ally, or equipment becomes exhausted, destroy it.

Program.FullCard.Name: Dorladris Spellfire
Program.FullCard.Rules: 4 Draw a card.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "The Earth Mother smiles upon us this day."
Program.FullCard.Name: Dorn the Tranquil
Program.FullCard.Rules: 2, Flip Dorn Dorn heals 2 damage from each friendly hero and ally.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Although the act of sacrifice is not exclusive to the Knights of the Silver Hand, they consider it to be a staple of their creed.
Program.FullCard.Name: Dorric the Martyr
Program.FullCard.Rules: 1, Destroy Dorric Dorric heals all damage from target ally.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "When the best laid plans fail, be sure to have a plan B."
Program.FullCard.Name: Dorzok Shadowhand
Program.FullCard.Rules: When this ally deals combat damage, if you have no cards in your hand, draw a card.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "May the Earth Mother grant us her blessing and lend us the strength to protect her children."
Program.FullCard.Name: Doshura Risestrider
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Protector
When Doshura enters play, you may destroy target exhausted ally.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Sometimes you need a little extra firepower to get the job done.
Program.FullCard.Name: Double Barrel
Program.FullCard.Rules: Ongoing: Your hero has Ranged dual wield. (Can have a second Ranged weapon. Can strike with a second Ranged weapon during the same combat.)
Program.FullCard.Rulings:
[MoL Rules FAQ] The controller of a hero with Ranged dual wield can have two Ranged weapons without violating uniqueness, and can strike with two Ranged weapons per combat. If a player strikes with multiple weapons in the same combat, the combat damage is associated with all of those weapons.
The controller of a hero with (normal) dual wield can strike with two Melee weapons per combat. The controller of a hero with both powers can strike with two Melee or Ranged weapons per combat, but can’t strike with both a Melee weapon and a Ranged weapon during the same combat.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "His hands are much, much quicker than the eye." - Spellweaver Jihan
Program.FullCard.Name: Double Time
Program.FullCard.Rules: Ready target equipment.

Program.FullCard.Name: Dousing the Flames of Protection
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Pay 2 to complete this quest.
Reward: Choose a hero or ally in your party. Damage that character would deal is unpreventable this turn.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Kayleitha had never stabbed her way out of a dragon's mouth before. It seemed she was going to have a chance to do so now.
Program.FullCard.Name: Down the Gullet
Program.FullCard.Rules: You may destroy target ally.

Program.FullCard.Name: Dr. Boom!
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Pay 1 to complete this quest.
Reward: Reveal the top card of your deck, put damage on your hero equal to its cost, then put it into hand.

Program.FullCard.Name: Draconian Deflector
Program.FullCard.Rules: Your hero has protector.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Excellent. You all should make a fine snack."
Program.FullCard.Name: Draconic Might
Program.FullCard.Rules: Onyxia has +X ATK while attacking this turn, where X is the number of opposing heroes.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "You dare challenge the daughter of Deathwing?"
Program.FullCard.Name: Draconic Rage
Program.FullCard.Rules: Ongoing: Onyxia has +X ATK while attacking, where X is the current stage.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Your flesh tears much more easily than mine."
Program.FullCard.Name: Dragon Hide
Program.FullCard.Rules: Ongoing: Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to Onyxia this turn.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "It was locked awat in the cache of Ley-Guardian Eregos for a reason." - Telrander
Program.FullCard.Name: Dragonflight Great-Ring
Program.FullCard.Rules: At the start of your turn, destroy target hero.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Succeed, and perhaps we can talk of other things." - Helendis Riverhorn
Program.FullCard.Name: Dragonkin Menace
Program.FullCard.Rules:
During an opponent's turn, pay 3 to complete this quest.
Reward: Ready a hero or ally in your party.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Seared to imperfection.
Program.FullCard.Name: Dragon's Breath
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Fire Hero Required
Your hero deals 3 fire damage divided as you choose to any number of target heroes and/or allies. A character dealt damage this way loses all powers this turn.
Program.FullCard.Rulings: [FoO Rules FAQ] You can’t target a character unless you allocate at least 1 of the 3 fire damage to it. A card’s powers are the text in its text box, as well as any keywords or quoted text added to it by modifiers. If a character loses all powers, it effectively has a blank text box, but it can later gain powers from cards like Face Smash.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Kill the dragon, take her treasure, and live to tell the tale - even a curmudgeon like Boris couldn't argue with that plan.
Program.FullCard.Name: Dragonslayers
Program.FullCard.Rules: Opposing allies have ferocity until your next turn.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Those who fell the brood mother and return with her head are granted great rewards.
Program.FullCard.Name: Dragonslayer's Signet
Program.FullCard.Rules: If a friendly hero or ally would deal damage to a Dragon or Dragonkin, it deals that amount of damage plus 1 instead.

Program.FullCard.Name: Dragonstalker's Helm
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Target Pet has +1 ATK this turn.
When you play a hunter ability, ready Dragonstalker's Helm.

Program.FullCard.Name: Dragonstalker's Legguards
Program.FullCard.Rules:
When you play a Hunter ability, you may pay 1.
If you do, target Ranged weapon has +2 ATK this turn.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "I will give you but a moment to make your peace with this life." - Kristoff Manchester
Program.FullCard.Name: Drain Essence
Program.FullCard.Rules: Your hero deals 3 shadow damage to target hero or ally and heals 1 damage from itself for each damage dealt this way.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Tremendous power comes from a warlock's ability to sustain complex rituals.
Program.FullCard.Name: Drain Mana
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Ongoing: At the start of your turn, destroy Drain Mana unless you pay 4.
At the end of your turn, target opponent discards a card and you draw draw a card

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "It's hard to think about anything else when they're tearing at your thoughts." - Deacon Markus Hallow
Program.FullCard.Name: Drain Will
Program.FullCard.Rules: Target player discards a card and you draw a card.

Program.FullCard.Name: Draining Poison
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Attach to target hero or ally that was dealt combat damage by your hero this turn.
Ongoing: At the start of your turn, attached character's controller discards a card.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Fewer witnesses. I like that."
Program.FullCard.Name: Dralor
Program.FullCard.Rules: 4, Flip Dralor Look at target player's hand and choose an ally card. He discards that card. Use only on your turn.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: The Forsaken will never rest until they have their revenge on Arthas Menethil.
Program.FullCard.Name: Dramla Lifebender
Program.FullCard.Notes: From the Through the Dark Portal FAQ
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Undead Hero Required
You can play ally cards from your graveyard.
If an ally would be put into your graveyard from play, remove it from the game instead.
Program.FullCard.Rulings:
[TDP Rules FAQ] The first power allows you to play ally cards from your graveyard if otherwise legal. It’s active only while Dramla is in play. You can still play ally cards from your hand.
The second power doesn’t stop you from playing destroy costs. If a cost involves putting a card into a graveyard from play, and Dramla replaces that action, that part of the cost is still satisfied. Similarly, if a card says, “destroy [a card]. If you do,” and Dramla replaces the action of putting that [card] into a graveyard from play, the “if you do” is still satisfied.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Obey the word of your master, or I will return you to the grave myself."
Program.FullCard.Name: Drandus the Deathcaller
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Protector
Ghouls you control have Assault 2.

Program.FullCard.Name: Dread Doomguard
Program.FullCard.Rules:
At the start of your turn, choose at random "ability," "equipment," or "resource."
When this ally deals damage while attacking, you may destroy target card of the kind chosen this turn.

Program.FullCard.Name: Dread Infernal
Program.FullCard.Rules: When Dread Infernal enters of leaves play, he deals 1 fire damage to each opposing hero and ally.

Program.FullCard.Name: Dread Pirate Ring
Program.FullCard.Rules:
On your turn: 2, Put this equipment into its owner's hand Put a 1 [Melee] / 1 [Health] Dread Pirate ally token named Bob into play.
Stash (As this enters your resource row, you may have it enter face up. Immediately turn it face down.): Add an heirloom counter to target equipment you control.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "The subjugation of a Xorothian Dreadsteed is a true measure of power." - Mor'zul Bloodbringer
Program.FullCard.Name: Dreadstead
Program.FullCard.Rules:
You pay 1 less to complete quests.
When you place a resource face up, your hero may deal 2 shadow damage to target hero or ally.
(Mounts can't attack or be attacked.)

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "This quest will be perilous, but a warlock of your stature does not stray from danger!" - Mor'zul Bloodbringer
Program.FullCard.Name: Dreadsteed of Xoroth
Program.FullCard.Rules:
On your turn: Pay 4 to complete this quest.
Reward: Put target Demon ally from your graveyard into play if its cost is less than or equal to the number of resources you control.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Those who walk the Emerald Dream see the waking world more clearly.
Program.FullCard.Name: Dreamstate
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Balance Hero Required
Ongoing: When you play a Balance ability, draw a card.
Program.FullCard.Rulings: [MoL Rules FAQ] Playing Dreamstate doesn’t trigger its own power.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Stormpike filth in my keep?! Slay them all!"
Program.FullCard.Name: Drek'Thar
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Protector
You pay 1 less to play Drek'Thar for each honor counter on cards you control.
1, Remove an honor counter from a card you control Put a Wolf ally token into play with 1 [Melee] ATK / 1 health and ferocity.

Program.FullCard.Name: Drillborer Disk
Program.FullCard.Rules: When Drillborer Disk prevents damage, your hero deals 1 arcane damage to the source of that damage.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Such shoddy craftsmanship! Clearly gnomish in nature."
Program.FullCard.Name: Drizzie Steelslam
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Protector (This ally may exhaust to become the defender when an opposing hero or ally attacks.)
When this ally enters play, you may put target equipment into its owner's hand.

Program.FullCard.Name: Druid Training
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Attach to target friendly ally.
Ongoing: Attached ally has " Exhaust target ally."

Program.FullCard.Name: Drusenna the Vigilant
Program.FullCard.Rules: Protector

Program.FullCard.Flavor: The prized possession of the dryads of Ashenvale.
Program.FullCard.Name: Dryad's Wrist Bindings
Program.FullCard.Rules: , Destroy one of your resources Draw a card.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: ...but two swords are even mightier than the pen.
Program.FullCard.Name: Dual Wield
Program.FullCard.Rules: Ongoing: Your hero has dual wield. (Can have a second one-handed Melee weapon instead of an Off-Hand equipment. Can strike with a second Melee weapon during the same combat.)

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "That's not a pet…THIS is a pet!" - Grumpherys
Program.FullCard.Name: Dundee
Program.FullCard.Rules: As each turn starts, prevent the next damage that Dundee would be dealt this turn.

Program.FullCard.Name: Durae Crystalshield
Program.FullCard.Rules: Durae can protect friendly allies.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Come now - we can still work this out, can't we? Let me buy you an ale."
Program.FullCard.Name: Durdin Hammerhand
Program.FullCard.Rules: Destroy Durdin Hammerhand Exhaust target hero or ally.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Our family has always had a disturbing penchant for irony."
Program.FullCard.Name: Durga Gravestone
Program.FullCard.Rules: 1, Flip Durga, remove up to five Combo cards in your graveyard from the game Destroy target ally if its cost is less than or equal to the number of cards removed this way.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Keep pushing the front!"
Program.FullCard.Name: Durgle Wizzledab
Program.FullCard.Rules: Remove an ability card in your graveyard from the game Durgle heals 2 damage from himself.

Program.FullCard.Name: Durgrin Ironedge
Program.FullCard.Rules: When Durgrin enters play, you may exhaust target equipment. That Equipment can't ready during its controller's ready step while Durgrin remains in your party.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Pray for those who willingly gave all they had to combat this great evil."
Program.FullCard.Name: Durzion, Champion of A'dal
Program.FullCard.Rules: Flip Durzion, discard a Priest Durzion heals 2 damage from each friendly hero and ally.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Warriors fight best when they have someone to fight for.
Program.FullCard.Name: Duty Bound
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Ongoing: Your hero is a protector.
When your hero protects, ready it.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: It isn't accurate because it doesn't need to be.
Program.FullCard.Name: Dwarven Hand Cannon
Program.FullCard.Rules:
When you strike with Dwarven Hand Cannon, your hero has long-range this combat. (Defenders deal no combat damage to it.)
2 Dwarven Hand Cannon has +1 ATK this turn.

Program.FullCard.Name: Dying Balance, The
Program.FullCard.Notes: From the Through the Dark Portal FAQ
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Pay 2 to complete this quest.
Reward: Reveal the top two cards of your deck. If they have different card types, put one into your hand and the other on the bottom of your deck. Otherwise, put both on the bottom of your deck.
Program.FullCard.Rulings: [TDP Rules FAQ] The different card types are ability, ally, armor, hero, item, quest, and weapon.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Brazenly you have disregarded powers beyond your understanding." - Gothik the Harvester
Program.FullCard.Name: Dying Curse
Program.FullCard.Rules: 1, Destroy target attachment. If you do, its controller draws a card.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: We must all be strong in the presence of the Scourge; may our faith in the Light grant us that strength.
Program.FullCard.Name: Eadric the Pure
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Argent Crusade Reputation
Flip Eadric, remove a Paladin in your graveyard from the game Target friendly ally has Untargetable this turn.

Program.FullCard.Name: Eagle Eye
Program.FullCard.Rules: Look at the top four cards of your deck. Put one into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.

Program.FullCard.Name: Eagle Sight
Program.FullCard.Rules: Look at the top two cards of your deck. Put one into hand and the other on the bottom of your deck.

Program.FullCard.Name: Earth and Moon
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Balance Hero Required
Ongoing: If a hero or ally you control would deal arcane ([Arcane]) or nature ([Nature]) damage, it deals that much +2 instead.

Program.FullCard.Name: Earth and Sky
Program.FullCard.Rules: Choose one: Your hero deals 4 nature damage to target hero or ally; or your hero deals 2 arcane damage to target hero or ally and you draw a card.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "I have conscripted the very land to fight."
Program.FullCard.Name: Earth Elemental Totem
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Totem (Can be attacked or targeted like an ally.)
Put an Earth Elemental ally token with 2 ATK, 2 health, and protector into play.
Ongoing

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "From nature comes everything. Those who appreciate that may partake of its bounty." - Archdruid Hamuul Runetotem
Program.FullCard.Name: Earth Mother's Blessing
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Attach to target ally.
Ongoing: Attached ally had +3 ATK / +3 health.
When attached ally is destroyed, draw a card.

Program.FullCard.Name: Earth Shield
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Restoration Hero Required
Earth Shield enters play with four shield counters.
Ongoing: When your hero is dealt combat damage, remove a shield counter, and your hero heals 3 damage from itself. When the last counter is removed, destroy Earth Shield.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Concussion beats concentration.
Program.FullCard.Name: Earth Shock
Program.FullCard.Rules: Your hero deals 4 nature damage to target hero or ally. If you targeted a hero, you may interrupt an ability card played by its controller.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Amusing, that those who do not embrace the land will be themselves embraced by it."
Program.FullCard.Name: Earthbind Totem
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Totem (Can be attacked or targeted like an ally.)
Ongoing: Opposing allies can't ready during their controller's ready step.

Program.FullCard.Name: Earthen Blast
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Your hero deals 4 nature damage to target ally.
Stash (As this enters your resource row, you may have it enter face up. Immediately turn it face down.): Your hero deals 2 nature damage to target hero.

Program.FullCard.Name: Earthen Embrace
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Attach to target ally, and your hero heals all damage from it.
Ongoing: Attached ally has +2 ATK.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "I brought enough for everyone." - Cromarius Blackfist
Program.FullCard.Name: Earthen Flurry
Program.FullCard.Rules: Target a hero or ally, and you may target an additional character for each Totem you control. Your hero deals 4 melee damage to each target.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "The elements have been weakened by the presence of the Scourge, but I promise you that it will not hinder my abilities."
Program.FullCard.Name: Earthmender Vaaki
Program.FullCard.Rules: Flip Vaaki, discard a Shaman Target up to three heroes and/or allies. Vaaki heals 3, 2, and 1 damage from them, respectively.

Program.FullCard.Name: Earthrend Weapon
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Attach to one of your Melee weapons.
Ongoing: Attached weapon has +7 ATK.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "The earth speaks to me. It will grant me what I need."
Program.FullCard.Name: Earth's Bounty
Program.FullCard.Rules: Put target card from your graveyard into your hand.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "The earth has just as much reason to repel the shadows as the Light does."
Program.FullCard.Name: Earthshaper Javuun
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Shadow Resistance (Prevent all shadow ([Shadow]) damage that this ally would be dealt.)
Mend 2 (At the start of your turn, this ally may heal 2 damage from target hero or ally.)

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "When you dictate the enemy's strategy, it's much easier to form an effective defense." - Emerson Zantides
Program.FullCard.Name: Ebonweave Robe
Program.FullCard.Notes: Available as part of Crafting Redemption Program (Scourgewar) - requires 8 Ebonweave, 6 Bolt of Imbued Frostweave, 1 Frozen Orb
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Allies you control have Shadow Resistance.
If an opposing ally would deal any type of damage, it deals shadow damage instead.

Program.FullCard.Name: Echo of the Elements
Program.FullCard.Rules: Ongoing: When your hero heals damage, it also deals that much nature damage to target opposing ally.

Program.FullCard.Name: Echo Totem
Program.FullCard.Rules: Ongoing: At the start of your turn, you may remove a non-ongoing ability card in your graveyard from the game. If you do, you can play that card without paying its cost this turn.
Program.FullCard.Rulings: [BoG Rules FAQ] Playing that card without paying its cost is an alternate cost, so you can’t choose any other alternate cost it might have (nor can you choose to pay its resource cost). Playing a card from your RFG zone is otherwise the same as doing so from your hand. For example, any additional costs must still be paid and any restrictions must still be observed. If you don't play that card this turn, it stays in your RFG zone.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: The combined armies of the Alliance and the Horde stood ready at the Scarab Wall, awaiting the ringing of the gong that would free the evils sealed behind it.
Program.FullCard.Name: Echoes of the Shifting Sands
Program.FullCard.Rules: Each player reveals his deck, puts all revealed ally cards into play, and then shuffles his deck.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "I will eclipse the Holy Light with the shadow of fear." - Remba, Abbess of Ash
Program.FullCard.Name: Eclipse
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Traitor Hero Required
Ongoing: When damage is healed from an opposing hero or ally, your hero deals double that much shadow damage to that character.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Death is at your doorway, and it's coming inside whether you like it or not." - Victoria Jaton
Program.FullCard.Name: Edge of Oblivion
Program.FullCard.Rules:
This weapon enters play with five +1 ATK counters.
At the start of your turn, remove a +1 ATK counter. If none remain, destroy this weapon.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "These invaluable handguards steady even the most unskilled of hands."
Program.FullCard.Name: Edgemaster's Handguards
Program.FullCard.Rules: You pay 1 less to strike with weapons.
Program.FullCard.Rulings: [Mike Hummel 8/19/2006] Costs cannot be reduced below zero. So you do not 'gain' a resource by striking with Arcanite Reaper if you control Edgemaster's Handguards.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Looks like it's down to us."
Program.FullCard.Name: Edward "Hack" Robinson
Program.FullCard.Rules: Remove an ally card in your graveyard from the game Edward is a protector this turn.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "WILL anyone give me a HAND?"
Program.FullCard.Name: Edward the Odd
Program.FullCard.Rules: Cards in opposing hand lose and can't have instant.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "We are bound by blood and honor, brother. I will not forget you."
Program.FullCard.Name: Eitrigg
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Argent Crusade Reputation
Protector
Cards everywhere are Unique.

Program.FullCard.Name: El Pollo Grande
Program.FullCard.Rules: When El Pollo Grande deals combat damage, you may put a Chicken ally token into play with 0 [Melee] ATK / 1 health.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "The Light is the only truth."
Program.FullCard.Name: Elaar
Program.FullCard.Rules: 2, Gain control of target ally.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Your strength strengthens us all, comrade!"
Program.FullCard.Name: Elder Achillia
Program.FullCard.Rules: Inspiring Presence (If a hero or ally in your party would deal non-combat damage, it deals that much +1 instead)

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Give me an unbreakable bow and a bottomless quiver, and I will die happy."
Program.FullCard.Name: Elder Huntsman Swiftshot
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Long-Range
When Swiftshot or another [Ranged] ally enters your party, it may deal 1 ranged damage to target hero or ally.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "May the eternal sun shine upon thee."
Program.FullCard.Name: Elder Moorf
Program.FullCard.Rules: 1 Target ally has +2 ATK this turn. Use only once per turn.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "I'm ready for another round."
Program.FullCard.Name: Elder Narando
Program.FullCard.Rules: When Narando readies, he has +2 ATK this turn.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Believe in yourself."
Program.FullCard.Name: Elder Tomas
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Inspiring Presence (If a hero or ally in your party would deal non-combat damage, it deals that much +1 instead.)
Ready another target ally.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "You shall win this day! Onward!"
