Program.FullCard.Name: Illusionary Rod
Program.FullCard.Rules: 1, , Exhaust your hero Remove your hand from the game. At end of turn, put the removed cards into your hand.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "I cannot make it on my own, but with your help, I may yet live to fight the Scourge once more." - Father Kamaros
Program.FullCard.Name: I'm Not Dead Yet!
Program.FullCard.Rules:
On your turn: Pay 3 to complete this quest.
Reward: Put a 1 [Holy] / 1 [Health] Unique Priest ally token named Father Kamaros into play with Mend 4.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Stay!"
Program.FullCard.Name: Immobilize
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Attach to target abililty, ally, equipment, or resource and exhaust it.
Ongoing: Attached card can't ready during its controller's ready step.

Program.FullCard.Name: Immolate
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Attach to target hero or ally, and your hero deals 1 fire damage to it.
Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 1 fire damage to attached character.

Program.FullCard.Name: Immolation Trap
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Trap (You may exhaust your defending hero rather than play this card's cost.)
Attach to target attacking hero or ally.
Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 2 fire damage to attached character.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Oh, that's what happens."
Program.FullCard.Name: Immovable Object, The
Program.FullCard.Rules: Destroy The Immovable Object Destroy all weapons named The Unstoppable Force.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "No. You don't summon me."
Program.FullCard.Name: Imp Lord Pinprik
Program.FullCard.Rules:
FRONT: Elusive
BACK: Elusive
Deckbuilding: You can include only neutral quests, any abilities that deal fire damage, and any [Fire] allies. You can't include cards with reputation or text restrictions (like Fire Hero Required).

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "I command you, my minions! Wash over the enemy like a sea of fire and burn them from this plane!"
Program.FullCard.Name: Imp Mistress Noali
Program.FullCard.Rules: Your face-down resources are also Imp Demon allies with 1 ATK / 1 health.
Program.FullCard.Rulings:
[MoL Rules FAQ] The Imp Demon allies are still resources. They don’t leave play as resources or enter play as allies. They have ATK, health, type, and tags as specified, but no name. They have damage type melee. Each one can attack immediately unless it was placed during the current turn.
If another player without Noali in his party gains control of one of your Imp Demon resources, it stops being an ally and enters that player’s resource row as a face-down resource. If Noali leaves play, any counters (including damage) remain on your face-down resources, but each card attached to them is put into its owner’s graveyard by pre-priority processing.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "You are truly weak if you put all your stake in a flimsy staff." - Halavar
Program.FullCard.Name: Impede
Program.FullCard.Rules: Put target [Shadow], [Holy], or [Fire] ally or weapon on top of its owner's deck.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Boris gazed up at the huge beast looming before him. Even warded from fear, he could not help but tremble.
Program.FullCard.Name: Imposing Presence
Program.FullCard.Rules: Put the top X cards of the event deck into your resource row face down, where X is the current stage.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Take this torch and travel to the field of battle, directly east of here. Burn every corpse you see!" - Commander Ra'vaj
Program.FullCard.Name: Improper Burial, An
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Remove any number of ally cards in your graveyard from the game and pay 2 to complete this quest.
Reward: Draw a card for each three ally cards removed this way.

Program.FullCard.Name: Improvised Weaponry
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Attach to target Melee weapon.
Ongoing: Attached weapon loses Melee(1), has Ranged(1), becomes a [Ranged] weapon, and has "When you strike with this weapon, your hero has long-range this combat."
Program.FullCard.Rulings: [BoG Rules FAQ] Attached weapon loses any other damage types as this card attaches. A weapon's ATK and damage type are added to a hero as its strike effect resolves. You can’t strike with both a Melee weapon and a Ranged weapon during the same combat, even if they’re the same weapon.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "The bad news is that the 'spare' parts got scattered from here to the Valley of Bones to the east." - Screed Luckheed
Program.FullCard.Name: In Case of Emergency…
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Pay 10 to complete this quest.
Reward: Draw a card for each other quest you have.

Program.FullCard.Name: In Defense of Halaa
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Pay 3 to complete this quest.
Reward: Draw a card. You may choose a counter on target card in play and add another of those counters to it.
Program.FullCard.Rulings: [DoW Rules FAQ] You can’t add damage (even if damage is being represented by counters).

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "I want not to dream anymore." - Taelan Fordring
Program.FullCard.Name: In Dreams
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Pay 8 to complete this quest.
Reward: Draw three cards.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Let's just say that things in the Emerald Dream are not as we thought…" - Mathrengyl Bearwalker
Program.FullCard.Name: In Nightmares
Program.FullCard.Rules:
On your turn, pay 8 to complete this quest.
Reward: Target opponent discards three card.

Program.FullCard.Name: Incapacitate
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Attach to target resource.
Ongoing: Attached resource can't ready.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "What be da quickest way to make da Scourge afraid? Light dem on fire, mon." - Kil'zin of the Darkspear
Program.FullCard.Name: Incendiary Totem
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Ongoing: At the start of your turn, this ability deals 3 fire damage to target hero or ally.
Death Rattle (When this ability enters your graveyard from anywhere): Your hero deals 3 fire damage to target hero or ally.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: If at first you don't succeed, fry and fry again.
Program.FullCard.Name: Incinerate
Program.FullCard.Rules: Your hero deals 2 fire damage to target hero or ally, 4 damage if your hero has dealt fire damage with an ability to that character this turn.

Program.FullCard.Name: Incursion Vestments
Program.FullCard.Rules:
If an opposing ally was destroyed this turn:
[Mage] Hero: 1, Draw a card.
[Priest] Hero: 1, Your hero heals 5 damage from target hero or ally.
[Warlock] Hero: 1, Target opponent discards a card.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "I bring da pain!"
Program.FullCard.Name: Indalamar
Program.FullCard.Rules: 3, Flip Indalamar Heroes and allies in your party have protector this turn.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Precision is a luxury we can no longer afford.
Program.FullCard.Name: Indauma Bloodfire

Program.FullCard.Flavor: The master of every infernal worries not about its death, but that it might survive too long.
Program.FullCard.Name: Infernal
Program.FullCard.Rules:
At the start of your turn, discard a card, or target opponent gains control of Infernal.
At the end of your turn, Infernal deals 1 fire damage to each opposing hero and ally.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "I've prepared a uniform with the pieces you obtained." Caledis Brightdawn
Program.FullCard.Name: Information Gathering
Program.FullCard.Rules:
During your turn, pay 3 to complete this quest.
Reward: Look at the top three cards of your deck. Put one into hand, one on top of your deck, and the other on the bottom.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Pain fuels the rage of the murderous soul.
Program.FullCard.Name: Infuriate
Program.FullCard.Rules: Ongoing: When your hero is dealt combat damage, ready up to that many of your resources.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "The earth need only grant you a fraction of its strength for you to see overwhelming results." - Ringleader Kuma
Program.FullCard.Name: Infusion of Earth
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Attach to target ally or weapon you control.
Ongoing: Attached card has Assault 3.

Program.FullCard.Name: Infusion of Fortitude
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Attach to target ally.
Ongoing: Attached ally has +3 health.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "May you continue to bring light to the darkness."
Program.FullCard.Name: Infusion of Light
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Your hero heals 3 damage from target hero or ally.
Draw a card.

Program.FullCard.Name: Ingrid Shadowstorm
Program.FullCard.Rules: Opposing heroes lose and can't have flip powers.
Program.FullCard.Rulings: [MoL Rules FAQ] Flip powers are hero payment powers that involve flipping that hero. Opponents may use flip powers while Ingrid is on the chain, but not “in response to her entering play.”

Program.FullCard.Name: Inner Fire
Program.FullCard.Notes: From the Through the Dark Portal FAQ
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Inner Fire enters play with three charge counters on it.
Ongoing: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to your hero. When damage is prevented this way, remove a charge counter from Inner Fire. If you removed the last one, destroy Inner Fire.
Program.FullCard.Rulings: [TDP Rules FAQ] You must remove one charge counter for each packet prevented this way, regardless of the size of that packet.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Great magics are possible with sufficient faith and will.
Program.FullCard.Name: Inner Focus
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Discipline Hero Required
Ongoing: Destroy Inner Focus When you play your next ability this turn, ready up to X of your resources, where X is that ability's cost.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "The moment right before you crash into your enemy's defenses - that's the moment I want to live in forever." - Kaniya the Steadfast
Program.FullCard.Name: Inner Rage
Program.FullCard.Rules: Your hero has Assault X this turn, where X is the cost of target non-hero Druid or Warrior you control.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Energy surged through her body like a raging river.
Program.FullCard.Name: Innervate
Program.FullCard.Rules: Target player draws three cards.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "The more we can do to clear up Nestlewood, the faster Zhanaa can get back to work." - Vindicator Aldar
Program.FullCard.Name: Inoculation
Program.FullCard.Rules:
During your turn, pay 3 to complete this quest.
Reward: Choose one: Put an ally from your party into its owner's hand; or draw a card. If your hero is a Draenei, you may choose both.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Annoying at first, deadly at last.
Program.FullCard.Name: Insect Swarm
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Balance Hero Required
Attach to target hero or ally, and your hero deals 2 nature damage to it.
Ongoing: Attached character has -2 ATK.

Program.FullCard.Name: Inspire
Program.FullCard.Rules:
You may flip your hero.
If your hero is Sulfuron Harbinger, you may ready him.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: A burst of the Light so you may continue the fight.
Program.FullCard.Name: Inspiring Light
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Your hero heals 8 damage from target hero or ally.
Draw a card.

Program.FullCard.Name: Instant Poison
Program.FullCard.Rules:
You may play this ability without paying its cost if your hero dealt combat damage to an opposing hero this turn.
Attach to target opposing hero.
Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 1 nature damage to attached hero.

Program.FullCard.Name: Instructor Antheol
Program.FullCard.Rules: 1 This turn, target ally can't attack or protect, loses and can't have powers, and is a Boar. Use only once per turn.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Learn from the Light and encourage others."
Program.FullCard.Name: Instructor Giralo
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Aldor Reputation
Inspire: Ally (You may ready one of your allies during each other player's ready step.)
When Giralo inspires an ally, that ally is a protector this turn.

Program.FullCard.Name: Intensify Rage
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Attach to target ally.
Ongoing: Attached ally has +3 ATK / +3 health.
At the start of your turn, put 2 damage on attached ally.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Just when you thought you'd gotten away…
Program.FullCard.Name: Intercept
Program.FullCard.Notes: From the Through the Dark Portal FAQ
Program.FullCard.Rules: Exhaust target hero or ally, and your hero deals 1 melee damage to it.
Program.FullCard.Rulings: [TDP Rules FAQ] You can target an already-exhausted character.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "I don't have a drinking problem. I drink; I get drunk; I fall down - no problem!"
Program.FullCard.Name: Interest You in a Pint?
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Attach to target ally.
Ongoing: Attached ally can't attack.

Program.FullCard.Name: Intervene
Program.FullCard.Rules: The next time damage would be dealt to target friendly hero or ally this turn, it's dealt to your hero instead.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Even the most innocent pets have their moments of viciousness.
Program.FullCard.Name: Intimidation
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Beast Mastery Hero Required
Ongoing: Each opposing hero and ally can't ready during its controller's ready step while you have a Pet.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Charge!
Program.FullCard.Name: Into the Fray
Program.FullCard.Rules: Target ally in your party has ferocity this turn. (It can attack immediately.)

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "I need you to venture into Hive Regal and find what became of my dearest Natalia" - Commander Mar'alith
Program.FullCard.Name: Into the Maw of Madness
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Destroy Into the Maw of Madness to complete this quest.
Reward: Draw a card.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Call it a gut feeling." - Gladiator Meganna
Program.FullCard.Name: Intuition
Program.FullCard.Rules: Remove target attacker from combat. You may ready it.

Program.FullCard.Name: Inventor Dorbin Callus
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Elusive
Target player draws four cards.

Program.FullCard.Name: Inventor's Focal Sword
Program.FullCard.Rules: 2, If target ability is attached to a hero or ally, attach it to another hero or ally.

Program.FullCard.Name: Invigorating Touch
Program.FullCard.Rules: Your hero heals 6 damage from target hero.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: They'll never see it coming.
Program.FullCard.Name: Invisibility
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Your hero is elusive and untargetable this turn.
Ongoing: Opposing heroes and allies lose and can't have elusive or untargetable.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Allow me a moment to catch my breath" - Obora the Wise
Program.FullCard.Name: Invocation
Program.FullCard.Rules: Ongoing: 2, Destroy Invocation This turn, your resources have " Draw a card."

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "It all ends here." - Forang Deathrattle
Program.FullCard.Name: Invoke the Nether
Program.FullCard.Rules: Remove all allies from the game.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: It is imbued by a magical forge with the power to turn aside any physical blow.
Program.FullCard.Name: Invulnerable Mail

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "The Light shall reward those bound by honor."
Program.FullCard.Name: Iravar
Program.FullCard.Rules: Pay 2 or remove an honor counter from a card you control Iravar deals 1 holy damage to each opposing ally.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Ruled by King Magni Bronzebeard, Ironforge is the dwarven seat of power.
Program.FullCard.Name: Ironforge
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Dwarf Hero Required
Put target armor or weapon card from your graveyard into hand if its cost is less than the number of Dwarves in your party.

Program.FullCard.Name: Ironforge Guards

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "The Light cleanses all."
Program.FullCard.Name: Ishanah, High Priestess of the Aldor
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Aldor Reputation (Can't put Scryer cards in your deck.)
At the start of each opponent's turn, he chooses an ally in his party. Gain control of that ally.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Some secrets are best hidden in plain sight.
Program.FullCard.Name: It's a Secret to Everybody
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Pay 1 to complete this quest.
Reward: Look at the top three cards of your deck. Put one on the top of your deck and the rest on the bottom.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: His unbridled rage continued for what seemed like an eternity, as corpse upon corpse fell before the mighty Ivan's blades.
Program.FullCard.Name: Ivan, Bladewind Brute
Program.FullCard.Rules: If you control another Warrior: Flip Ivan Ivan deals 2 melee damage to target damaged hero or ally.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "The forest weeps. The elements recoil at the destruction. Ivus must purge you from this world!"
Program.FullCard.Name: Ivus the Forest Lord
Program.FullCard.Rules:
You pay 1 less to play Ivus for each non-token Alliance ally in your party.
Each opposing ability, ally, and equipment can't ready during its controller's ready step.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "The Auchenai accept that Outland is a dying world. Those who seek to restore it are mere fools!"
Program.FullCard.Name: Ixamos the Corrupted
Program.FullCard.Rules:
2, Flip Ixamos, destroy a friendly Totem Ready Ixamos and all of your weapons.
Auchenai

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "I have seen the error of my ways. I will give my life to destroy the Legion!"
Program.FullCard.Name: Ixamos the Redeemed
Program.FullCard.Rules: 3, Flip Ixamos, exhaust one of your Totems Ready target ally.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Through me, the elements will achieve balance."
Program.FullCard.Name: Ixiya the Attuned
Program.FullCard.Rules: Protector, Mend 1

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Inside every soul there is a fire, begging for release.

Elusive
At the start of each turn, Izza Spindleflame deals 1 fire damage to each hero.

Program.FullCard.Name: Jack Coor

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Two blades for the strike of one.
Program.FullCard.Name: Jackknife
Program.FullCard.Rules: Target up to two heroes and/or allies. Your hero deals 3 melee damage to the first target. If you have a Dagger, your hero deals 3 melee damage to the second target.

Program.FullCard.Name: Jaedan Sunshot
Program.FullCard.Rules: When you play an ability, Jaedan has long-range this turn. (Defenders deal no combat damage to her.)

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "One threat falls, and another rises; the work of the Light is without pause."
Program.FullCard.Name: Jaenel
Program.FullCard.Rules: FRONT: 4 Flip Jaenel. BACK: Assault 1 (Jaenel has +1 ATK on your turn.)

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "This battle has just begun."

Protector
Exhaust a hero or ally in your party Ready Jae'va. Use only once per turn.

Program.FullCard.Name: Jai Dawnsteel
Program.FullCard.Rules: FRONT: 3 Flip Jai. BACK: Weapons you control have +1 ATK.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "The longer you insist upon confronting me, the more agonizing you will find defeat."
Program.FullCard.Name: Jaina, Lady of Theramore
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Frost Resistance
Each opponent pays 1 more to play cards that share a card type with a card in his graveyard. You pay 1 less to play cards that share a card type with a card in your graveyard, to a minimum of 1.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: What's in it for me?
Program.FullCard.Name: Jaktip
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Elusive (This ally can't be attacked.)
This ally deals 1 fire damage to target hero or ally.
1, Exhaust a Warlock you control Ready this ally.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: It does not reflect the face of the viewer, but rather the face of the soul trapped within.
Program.FullCard.Name: Jar Soul
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Remove target ally from the game.
Ongoing: Destroy Jar Soul You pay 2 less to play your next Pet this turn.

Protector
Mend 1 (At the start of your turn, this ally may heal 1 damage from target hero or ally.)

Protector (This ally may exhaust to become the defender when an opposing hero or ally attacks.)
2 Ready this ally,

Program.FullCard.Name: Jav Stonewall

Protector

Ferocity (Can attack immediately.)
Protector

Ferocity (Can attack immediately.)
Berserking (+1 ATK for each damage.)

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Um, I think we need to change our strategy." - Emerson Zantides

Protector, Shadow Resistance (Prevent all shadow ([Shadow]) damage that this ally would be dealt.)

Program.FullCard.Name: Jewelcrafter Zanaz
Jezbella of Karabor

Long-Range (Defenders deal no combat damage to this character.)
Exhaust an ally in your party Jezbella has +1 ATK this turn.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Sure, we can work something out. What do you think your life is worth?"

Time is Money (This ally can use powers immediately.)

Protector This ally has +1 / +1 for each resource you control.

Berserking (+1 ATK for each damage.)
1 Jil'ti has long-range this turn. (Defenders deal no combat damage to her.)

Each player's maximum hand size is reduced by four.
At the start of each player's turn, that player draws cards until he reaches his maximum hand size.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Even when it is hidden away, I can feel its gaze upon me."
Program.FullCard.Name: Jin'do's Evil Eye
Program.FullCard.Notes: From the Through the Dark Portal FAQ
Program.FullCard.Rules: At the start of each player's turn, the first opponent to that player's left names a card. That card can't be played this turn.
Program.FullCard.Rulings: [TDP Rules FAQ] That player names a card as this triggered effect resolves. Players can respond before that card is named. Once a card is named, cards with that name can’t be played this turn by any player. Placing a resource is different than playing a card.

Program.FullCard.Name: Jin'do's Judgement
Program.FullCard.Rules: When a player draws a card, put 1 damage on that player's hero.

Program.FullCard.Name: Jinie Swizzleshade
Program.FullCard.Rules: Elusive (This ally can't be attacked.)

Program.FullCard.Name: Jin'lak Nightfang

Program.FullCard.Flavor: It is the beginning of the end.
Program.FullCard.Name: Jin'rohk, The Great Apocalypse
Program.FullCard.Rules: When a hero is dealt damage with Jin'rohk, destroy up to that many target non-hero cards controlled by that hero's controller.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Are you satisfied now? Because I can keep busting you up all night if you like."
Program.FullCard.Name: Johnny Rotten

When Johnny enters play, he may deal 3 melee damage to target exhausted hero or ally.
Shadow Resistance (Prevent all shadow or [Shadow] damage that this ally would be dealt.)

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "My strength comes from de earth, mon."
Program.FullCard.Name: Joja'bee

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "No mercy for the weak."

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "This is how the Burning Blade operated."

2, Flip Jonas When target friendly ally deals combat damage to an ally this turn, destroy both.
Burning Blade

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Let me show you how it's done…"
Program.FullCard.Name: Jonas White

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Judge me not by my bones. My soul has a strength you cannot fathom."
Program.FullCard.Name: Joren the Martyr
Program.FullCard.Rules: 2, Flip Joren The next time target hero or ally would be dealt damage this turn, prevent it.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Magic is tied to the fabric of being, so much so that unleashing it is unleashing one's very life force.

Pay 3 to complete this quest.

Pay 5 to complete this quest.

[Hunter] Hero: 1, , Destroy a resource you control Hunters you control have Assault 2 and Long-Range this turn.

Untargetable
When Jubilee Arcspark is revealed from your deck by a quest, draw a card.

1, Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target ally this turn.
When you play a Paladin ability, ready Judgement Crown.

When you play a Paladin ability, you may pay 1.
If you do, prevent all damage that would be dealt to and dealt by target friendly ally this turn.

Attach to target opposing hero or ally.

Program.FullCard.Name: Judgement of Wisdom

Attach to target opposing hero or ally.
Ongoing: When a friendly hero or ally deals combat damage to attached character, that friendly character's controller draws a card.

Program.FullCard.Name: Jumo'zin

Program.FullCard.Name: Junkboxes Needed

On your turn: Choose "ability," "ally," or "equipment," and pay 2 to complete this quest.

This ally can protect against Death Knights.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "I've been burned before...it won't happen again."
Program.FullCard.Name: Justicar Andra Goldblast

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "When are you foolish warriors ever going to learn?"
Program.FullCard.Name: Justicar Broxlo Frostnuggle

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Enough hiding; I only require a moment of time with your mind."

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Is the world prepared for what we are about to invoke? I do not know…"
Program.FullCard.Name: Keeper Remulos

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "We must punish those who dare to stand against the might of the Horde!"

Program.FullCard.Rules: Pay 2 or remove an honor counter from a card you control Interrupt target ally card. If you do, remove it from the game, and its owner puts it into his party at the start of his next turn.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "The Warsong Outriders will not back down!"
Program.FullCard.Name: Kelm Hargunth
Program.FullCard.Rules: When Kelm attacks, each opponent destroys an [Alliance] card he controls.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Minions, servants, soldiers of the cold dark. . .obey the call of Kel'Thuzad!"

[Hunter], [Mage], [Rogue], [Warlock], or [Warrior] Hero Required
When your hero becomes Kel'Thuzad, target an opponent. Gain control of an ally he controls. Search his zones for one ally each and put any number of them into play.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "I will use the Scourge's own weapons against them and watch as they fall before me." - Savitir Skullsmasher
Program.FullCard.Name: Kel'Thuzad's Reach
Program.FullCard.Rules: When your hero deals combat damage with this weapon to a hero, you may destroy this weapon. If you do, put target ally in an opponent's graveyard into play under your control.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Power is never deserved; it is taken by those who want it."
Program.FullCard.Name: Kelvor Valorshine

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Warlocks have the ability to convert their own life force into rewards - both material and evanescent.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "True masters aren't born, they're made."

Long-Range

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "He's gonna boar you to death." - Iva, Bladewind Brute

Pay 2 to complete this quest.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Sharp reflexes are good, but a sharp mind is better." - Cerripha Sunstreak
Program.FullCard.Name: Kick Thinking
Program.FullCard.Rules: Interrupt target ability with cost less than or equal to the number of Mages and Rogues you control.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "I punch you so hard, your kidney fall out!"

Finishing Move (To play, remove X Combo cards in your graveyard from the game, where X is 5 or less.)
Choose X of the following: "ability," "ally," "equipment," "hero," and "resource." Exhaust all opposing cards of the chosen kinds.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Need a light?"
Program.FullCard.Name: Kiki Sparkbottom

Elusive (Can't be attacked.)
Long-Range (Defenders deal no combat damage to this character.)

Nerubian Reputation, Protector

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "In truth, she needs no order to kill. I only tell her whom to spare."

Pay 1 to complete this quest.

Protector

Program.FullCard.Rules: 3 This turn, Koringar has all the payment powers of all other allies.
Program.FullCard.Rulings: [TDP Rules FAQ] Koringar's modifier continuously checks all other allies in play this turn. As a result, he gains the payment powers of all other allies whether or not those powers or those allies existed as his payment effect resolved. If a copied power refers to the original ally’s name, use Koringar’s name in its place.

Target [Horde] hero or ally you control has Assault 1 this turn.

Program.FullCard.Name: Korthas Greybeard

Protector
Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target hero or ally this turn..
Program.FullCard.Rulings: [Paul Ross 4/16/2007] Korthas was playtested with a duration of "this turn". The printed card differs from this intent, and so has received errata.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Hunt him down like the dog he is!"
Program.FullCard.Name: Koth, Caller of the Hunt

Program.FullCard.Name: Kulan Earthguard

Protector

Program.FullCard.Name: Landon Dunavin
Program.FullCard.Rules: Long-Range

Program.FullCard.Flavor: There are rumors - some sinister, some benign - that Landro's influence extends far beyond the arena of gambling.
Program.FullCard.Name: Landro Longshot
Program.FullCard.Rules: 1, , Discard a card Flip a coin. If you win the flip, draw two cards. If you lose the flip, you may pay 2 to reflip.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Roll the dice and see if you get lucky!" - Landro Longshot
Program.FullCard.Name: Landro's Gift
Program.FullCard.Rules: Search your deck for a Loot card, reveal it, and put it on top of your deck. Then, if an opponent controls more resources than you, draw a card.

Program.FullCard.Name: Landro's Lil' XT
Program.FullCard.Rules:
When this ally enters play, you may destroy target item.
At the start of your turn, this ally deals 1 nature damage to each hero and ally.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: In Ashenvale, the trees aren't used just to hide from the rain.
Program.FullCard.Name: Lanthus of the Forest
Program.FullCard.Rules: Exhaust target ally.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Rest now, and let the power of nature mend your wounds."
Program.FullCard.Name: Lanthus the Restorer
Program.FullCard.Rules: 2, Flip Lanthus Exhaust target ally.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "In death, I will find rebirth."
Program.FullCard.Name: Larrington Zarus
Program.FullCard.Rules: When Larrington is destroyed while not an Undead, target opponent puts him into his party, and Larrington is also an Undead.

Program.FullCard.Name: Last Barov, The
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Pay 3 to complete this quest.
Reward: Draw a card, or two cards if two or more allies have the same name.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Bwahahahahahahaha!" - Randolphe Mortimer
Program.FullCard.Name: Last Laugh
Program.FullCard.Rules: When this weapon enters play, target opponent gains control of it until the start of your next turn.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Shoot them out of the sky! If they destroy the walls and towers of this base, we're done for! - Siegemaster Fezzik
Program.FullCard.Name: Last Line of Defense, The
Program.FullCard.Rules:
On your turn: Destroy a resource you control to complete this quest.
Reward: Draw a card.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Though battered and bloody, Warrax simply refused to fall.
Program.FullCard.Name: Last Stand
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Protection Hero Required
Ongoing: Your hero has +20 health.
At the start of your turn, discard two cards or destroy Last Stand.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "I am morally certain you have made a critical error in judgment, orc."
Program.FullCard.Name: Latro Abiectus
Program.FullCard.Rules: Elusive (Can't be Attacked)

Program.FullCard.Name: Latro's Shifting Sword
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Your hero has dual wield.
You pay 2 less to strike with other Swords.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "They don't respond well to taunts. Believe me, I've tried." - Victoria Jaton
Program.FullCard.Name: Lava Annihilator
Program.FullCard.Rules: When Lava Annihilator enters play, you may destroy target ally.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: May the winds carry their charred remains to a more peaceful place. - Kinivus the Focused
Program.FullCard.Name: Lava Burst
Program.FullCard.Rules: You may destroy an ability you control. Your hero deals 2 fire damage to target ally, or 6 if you destroyed an ability this way.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Madness, terror, and falling rubble; flames burn and lava bubbles.
Program.FullCard.Name: Lava Cracks
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Stage 3 Only.
Choose an opposing hero or ally and roll a die. Onyxia deals that amount of fire damage to it. Repeat this process for each other opposing character.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "The only thing worse than a ball of living flame is four of them." - Grumpherys
Program.FullCard.Name: Lava Pack
Program.FullCard.Rules: When Lava Pack enters play, put the top card of the Minion deck into play as an ally.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Someone always falls into the lava.
Program.FullCard.Name: Lava Pool
Program.FullCard.Rules: Destroy target ability, ally, or equipment.

Program.FullCard.Name: Lava Spawn
Program.FullCard.Rules: At the start of your turn, put a Lava Spawn into play.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: When a dog drools molten rock, slobbering is deadly.
Program.FullCard.Name: Lava Spit
Program.FullCard.Rules: Your hero deals 2 fire damage to target opposing ally. If your hero is Magmadar, he also deals 2 fire damage to each other hero and ally in that ally's party.

Program.FullCard.Name: Lava Splash
Program.FullCard.Rules: Ragnaros deals 1 fire damage to each hero and ally in target player's party for each rune you have.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: These elementals surge about randomly, knocking around those unfortunate enough to stand in their path.
Program.FullCard.Name: Lava Surger
Program.FullCard.Rules: When Lava Surger deals combat damage to a hero, ready Lava Surger. It can't attack that hero this turn.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Take all my strength into you and be whole once more!"
Program.FullCard.Name: Lay on Hands
Program.FullCard.Notes: From the Through the Dark Portal FAQ
Program.FullCard.Rules: Your hero heals all damage from target hero or ally. Exhaust all of your resources. Skip your next turn.
Program.FullCard.Rulings: [TDP Rules FAQ] To skip a turn is to replace that turn with nothing. If two modifiers each tell a player to skip his or her next turn, that player skips his or her next two turns, and so on.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Stop poking me!"
Program.FullCard.Name: Lazy Peons
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Orc Hero Required
Lazy Peons enters play exhausted.
Exhaust Lazy Peons to complete this quest.
Reward: Draw a card.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Use the correct technique, and you won't even break a sweat." - Garona: A Study on Stealth and Treachery
Program.FullCard.Name: Lead Astray
Program.FullCard.Rules: Exhaust target hero or ally. It can't ready during its controller's next ready step. Its controller discards a card.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Most who look into the face of death are overcome by fear. For Warrax, with the dragon bearing down upon him, fear was not an option.
Program.FullCard.Name: Lead from the Front
Program.FullCard.Rules: Opposing heroes have protector this turn.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "A bounty is hereby declared by the Cenarion Expedition on Rajis Fyashe, leader of the Bloodscale naga."
Program.FullCard.Name: Leader of the Bloodscale
Program.FullCard.Rules:
While an ally with cost 5 or more is in your party, pay 1 to complete this quest.
Reward: Draw a card.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "The Darkcrest have been linked to numerous attacks against the Cenarion Expedition, and their leader is considered extemely dangerous." - Wanted Poster
Program.FullCard.Name: Leader of the Darkcrest
Program.FullCard.Rules:
If an ally with cost 5 or more is in your party, pay 5 to complete this quest.
Reward: Draw three cards.

Program.FullCard.Name: Leader of the Pack
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Worgen Hero Required
On your turn: Pay 6 to complete this quest.
Reward: Put four 1 [Melee] / 1 [Health] Mastiff ally tokens into play with Ferocity.

Program.FullCard.Name: Learn Your Place, Mortal!
Program.FullCard.Rules: Draw cards until you reach your maximum hand size.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Let's do this!"
Program.FullCard.Name: Leeroy Jenkins
Program.FullCard.Rules:
When Leeroy Jenkins enters play, exhaust all other allies in your party. They can't ready during your next ready step.
Say "Leeeerooooy Jenkins!" Leeroy has ferocity this turn.
Program.FullCard.Rulings: [Brian Kibler 8/14/2006] allies with activated powers - that is, powers that require them to exhaust as part of the cost - cannot use those powers the turn they come into play. payment powers that do not require the character to exhaust - like leeroy's - can be used the turn you play them.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "The dead have no need for their riches...but I do."
Program.FullCard.Name: Leeza, Tomb Robber
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Stealth (Can't protect against this character.)
When Leeza deals combat damage, you may remove target card in a graveyard from the game.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Thousands of ancestral spirits made the ultimate sacrifice to end Archimonde's assault upon Mount Hyjal and the Well of Eternity.
Program.FullCard.Name: Legend of Mount Hyjal
Program.FullCard.Rules: Destroy all allies.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "When you enter the fray, you become the beacon of hope for our forces." - Lieutenant Haggersin
Program.FullCard.Name: Legendary Heroes
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Pay 1 to complete this quest.
Reward: Draw a card unless target opponent turns his hero or one of his resources face down.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Diane Cannings, Proprietor
Program.FullCard.Name: Legendary Leathers, Dalaran
Program.FullCard.Rules: You pay 2 less to play your next Leather or Mail armor this turn for each Leatherworking hero and ally you control.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "In time, you shall be remembered for your past deeds." - Lanthus the Restorer
Program.FullCard.Name: Leggings of the Honored
Program.FullCard.Rules: This armor has +4 [Defense] if an ally entered a graveyard this turn.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "War provides little time for rest and relaxation." - Thaka Deadeye
Program.FullCard.Name: Leggings of the Tireless Sentry
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Opposing heroes and allies enter play exhausted.
At the end of each opponent's turn, exhaust all heroes and allies he controls.

Program.FullCard.Name: Leggings of Transcendence
Program.FullCard.Rules:
When you play a Priest ability, you may pay 1.
If you do, your hero heals 2 damage from each friendly ally.

Program.FullCard.Name: Legguards of the Shattered Hand
Program.FullCard.Rules: Destroy target ally with damage on it.

Program.FullCard.Name: Legplates of Ten Storms
Program.FullCard.Rules:
When you play a Shaman ability, you may pay 1.
If you do, your hero deals 2 nature damage divided as you choose to up to two target heroes and/or allies.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "There are more similarities between the Nether and death than I had originally thought." - Randolphe Mortimer
Program.FullCard.Name: Legplates of the Endless Void
Program.FullCard.Rules:
, Put 3 damage on your hero Draw a card.
Death Rattle: Put 3 damage on your hero and draw a card.

Program.FullCard.Name: Legplates of Wrath
Program.FullCard.Rules:
When you play a Warrior ability, you may pay 1.
If you do, ready target armor.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: This garland is reputed to possess extraordinary magical powers.
Program.FullCard.Name: Lei of Lilies
Program.FullCard.RequireClass: Druid, Mage, Paladin, Priest, Shaman, Warlock
Program.FullCard.Rules:
At the start of your turn, if you have four or more cards in your hand, your hero heals 1 damage from itself.
1, Destroy Lei of Lilies Your hero heals 1 damage from itself for each card in your hand.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Do you seek to test my mastery of the Light?"
Program.FullCard.Name: Lelora Sunlancer
Program.FullCard.Rules: 3, Flip Lelora Prevent all damage that would be dealt to and dealt by target friendly ally this turn.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Lord Kael'thas shall lead us into a new age of power."
Program.FullCard.Name: Lelora the Dawnslayer
Program.FullCard.Rules:
1, Flip Lelora If combat damage would be dealt to or dealt by target opposing ally this turn, double it instead.
Crimson Hand

Program.FullCard.Flavor:
"So, you come from the world beyond the Portal? And you know of Rexxar."
"Oh yes, I am quite familiar with him. You see, he is my son."
Program.FullCard.Name: Leoroxx
Program.FullCard.Rules: When Leoroxx attacks, destroy all opposing allies.

Program.FullCard.Name: Lessa the Awakener
Program.FullCard.Rules: When Lessa enters play, you may put an ally card with cost 2 or less from your graveyard into play.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: A priest can always find the Light.
Program.FullCard.Name: Lesser Heal
Program.FullCard.Rules: Your hero heals 3 damage from target hero or ally.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Gorebelly swung one axe with two hands. He swung one axe in each hand. They yielded the same result: Onyxia ignored him and killed his friends.
Program.FullCard.Name: Lesser of Two Evils
Program.FullCard.Rules: Reveal the top two cards of the Onyxia raid deck. Opponents choose one. Put that card into your hand and the other one on the bottom of your deck.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Oops, try again." - Ruby Gemsparkle
Program.FullCard.Name: Lesson of the Arcane
Program.FullCard.Rules:
You may exhaust a non-hero Mage you control rather than pay this ability's cost.
If a Mage you control is defending, remove it from combat and draw a card.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Tear that thing to pieces!" - Kassandra Flameheart
Program.FullCard.Name: Lesson of the Beast
Program.FullCard.Rules:
You may exhaust a non-hero Hunter you control rather than pay this ability's cost.
Target Pet you control deals melee damage equal to its ATK to a second target ally.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Leave the fighting to the big boys. I wouldn't want you to get hurt." - Lord Benjamin Tremendouson
Program.FullCard.Name: Lesson of the Call
Program.FullCard.Rules:
You may exhaust a non-hero Warrior you control rather than pay this ability's cost.
Put target ally on top of its owner's deck.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "This new technique is quite stunning." - Zophos the Vengeful
Program.FullCard.Name: Lesson of the Divine
Program.FullCard.Rules:
You may exhaust a non-hero Paladin you control rather than pay this ability's cost.
Exhaust target hero or ally. It can't ready during its controller's next ready step. Draw a card.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Living or dead, flesh and bone are equally conducive to the elements' fury." - Urrth
Program.FullCard.Name: Lesson of the Elements
Program.FullCard.Rules:
You may exhaust a non-hero Shaman you control rather than pay this ability's cost.
Your hero deals 3 nature damage divided as you choose to any number of target heroes and/or allies.

Program.FullCard.Name: Lesson of the Grave
Program.FullCard.Rules:
You may exhaust a non-hero Death Knight you control rather than pay this ability's cost.
Remove target ally in a graveyard from the game. If you do, put a 3 [Melee] / 3 [Health] Ghoul ally token into play.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "No one can escape their sins." - Sister Remba
Program.FullCard.Name: Lesson of the Light
Program.FullCard.Rules:
You may exhaust a non-hero Priest you control rather than pay this ability's cost.
Your hero deals 2 unpreventable holy damage to target hero or ally.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "You can't hide from me!" - Plague Fleshbane
Program.FullCard.Name: Lesson of the Nether
Program.FullCard.Rules:
You may exhaust a non-hero Warlock you control rather than pay this ability's cost.
Look at target opponent's hand and choose a card. Remove that card from the game.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Don't try to follow unless you think you are up to the challenge." - Meganna the Stalker
Program.FullCard.Name: Lesson of the Shadow
Program.FullCard.Rules:
You may exhaust a non-hero Rogue you control rather than play this ability's cost.
Target hero has Assault 3 and Stealth this turn.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Even the most threatening beasts look peaceful in their slumber.
Program.FullCard.Name: Lesson of the Wild
Program.FullCard.Rules:
You may exhaust a non-hero Druid you control rather than play this ability's cost.
Put target non-token ally into its owner's resource row face down, then exhaust it.

Program.FullCard.Name: Lessons in Lurking
Program.FullCard.Notes: From the Through the Dark Portal FAQ
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Attach to target ally.
Ongoing: Attached ally has stealth. (Can't protect against it.)

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Practice always makes perfect."
Program.FullCard.Name: Levander of the Sanguine Shot
Program.FullCard.Rules: If you control another Hunter: Flip Levander Ready target Ranged weapon.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Ye come back down heare and fight like a dwarf!" - Warrax
Program.FullCard.Name: Levitate
Program.FullCard.Rules: Ongoing: At the start of each opponent's turn, that opponent chooses an ally in his party. That ally can't attack this turn.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "You will find Levixus on the uppermost ruins of Auchindoun. He stands amidst a storm of souls…" - Nitrin the Learned
Program.FullCard.Name: Levixus the Soul Caller
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Pay 3 to complete this quest.
Reward: Put a random card from your graveyard into your hand.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "There is enough demonic power about in the world without this text out in the open." - David Wayne
Program.FullCard.Name: Lexicon Demonica, The
Program.FullCard.Rules:
During your turn, pay 3 to complete this quest.
Reward: Turn all quests face down.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Let me give you something to help you rest better, lad."
Program.FullCard.Name: Lhurg Venomblade
Program.FullCard.Rules: Destroy target exhausted ally.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "The Betrayer was once one of us, but his current appearance is more reflective of his true nature."
Program.FullCard.Name: Liandra Rustshadow
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Elusive
Destroy target armor or item.

Program.FullCard.Name: Liar's Tongue Gloves
Program.FullCard.Rules: 1, Name a card type and remove a card in your hand from the game face down. Target opponent guesses whether that card has that type, then reveals it. If he's right, put it into your graveyard. Otherwise, put it into your hand and draw two cards.

Program.FullCard.Name: Liba Wobblebonk
Program.FullCard.Rules: When Liba Wobblebonk enters play, draw a card.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Bask in the glory of A'dal and the naaru!" - Vakeron
Program.FullCard.Name: Libram of Radiance
Program.FullCard.Rules:
1, Your hero deals 1 unpreventable holy damage to target hero or ally.
When you play a [Paladin] armor, ready this item.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "I will show you the justice of the grave...and the meaning of fear."
Program.FullCard.Name: Lich King, The
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Scourge or [Death Knight] Hero Required
At the start of each player's turn, put target ally from that player's graveyard into play under your control.
Allies you control are also Scourge allies.

Program.FullCard.Name: Lie In Wait
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Target ally has +1 ATK this turn.
Target ally has -1 ATK this turn.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Your fate rests in my hands." - Jeremiah Karvok
Program.FullCard.Name: Life and Death
Program.FullCard.Rules:
When you play an ally, you may draw a card.
When an ally you control leaves play, discard a card.

Program.FullCard.Name: Life Arc
Program.FullCard.Rules: Your hero heals all damage from target friendly ally, then deals that much nature damage to target opposing ally.
Program.FullCard.Rulings: [FoO Rules FAQ] You can’t play this card unless you target both an opposing ally and a friendly ally.

Program.FullCard.Name: Life Cycle
Program.FullCard.Rules: Your hero heals 2 damage from each hero and ally in your party, then deals 1 nature damage to target hero or ally for each damage healed this way.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: With great power comes the responsibility to use it sparingly.
Program.FullCard.Name: Life of the Land
Program.FullCard.Rules: Ongoing: , Destroy one of your resources Your hero heals 5 damage from target hero or ally.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: When the dark arts cal for flesh, you can only trust your own.
Program.FullCard.Name: Life Tap
Program.FullCard.Rules:
As an additional cost to play Life Tap, put 2 damage on your hero.
Draw two cards.

Program.FullCard.Name: Life-Binder's Locket
Program.FullCard.Rules:
[Paladin] Hero: , Discard a card If a friendly hero or ally would be dealt damage this turn, prevent 1 of it.
[Priest] Hero: , Discard a card The next time target hero or ally would be dealt damage this turn, prevent it.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "The red dragonflight will do whatever it can to help end this conflict with Malygos." - Belgaristrasz
Program.FullCard.Name: Lifeblade of Belgaristrasz
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Finishing Move: Rogue (To play, remove X Rogues in your graveyard from the game, where X is 5 or less.)
When this weapon enters play, your hero deals X damage to target hero or ally and heals X damage from itself.

Program.FullCard.Name: Lifebloom
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Attach to target hero or ally.
Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero heals 1 damage from attached character.
1, Destroy Lifebloom Your hero heals 4 damage from attached character.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Compared to the tauren, nature is a fragile creature. For us to live among it, we must practice restraint."
Program.FullCard.Name: Lifemender Dorn
Program.FullCard.Rules: Once per turn: 1 Dorn heals 1 damage from target hero or ally.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "My fury is a terrible sight to behold!"
Program.FullCard.Name: Lifemistress Tanagra
Program.FullCard.Rules: Nature allies in your party have +1 ATK for each other Nature ally in your party.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "If Azjol-Nerub is to be freed from the Scourge, you must first eradicate Hadronox." - Kilix the Unraveler
Program.FullCard.Name: Life-Staff of the Web Lair
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Nerubian Reputation
Nerubian allies you control have +1 / +1.
Your hero deals nature damage to target hero or ally equal to the number of Nerubian allies you control.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Tirion will desire this last remnant of the great crusader.
Program.FullCard.Name: Light Within the Darkness
Program.FullCard.Rules:
If a hero or ally you controlled dealt holy ([Holy]) damage this turn: Pay 1 to complete this quest.
Reward: Draw a card.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Stand together and face me!" - Zaritha
Program.FullCard.Name: Lightning Arc
Program.FullCard.Rules: Your hero deals 3 nature damage divided as you choose to any number of target heroes and/or allies.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Shamans know that lightning can strike twice in the same place.
Program.FullCard.Name: Lightning Bolt
Program.FullCard.Rules: Your hero deals 4 nature damage to target hero or ally.

Program.FullCard.Name: Lightning Bolt
Program.FullCard.Rules: Your hero deals 4 nature damage to target hero or ally.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Twice as nice.
Program.FullCard.Name: Lightning Overload
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Elemental Hero Required
Ongoing: When you play a non-ongoing ability, destroy Lightning Overload. If you do, copy that ability. (You may choose new targets for the copy.)

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Sometimes, simply being quick isn't fast enough.
Program.FullCard.Name: Lightning Reflexes
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Survival Hero Required
Ongoing: Opposing heroes and allies have -1 ATK while in combat with your hero.

Program.FullCard.Name: Lightning Shield
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Lightning Shield enters play with three lightning counters on it.
Ongoing: When your hero is dealt damage by a hero or ally, remove a lightning counter from Lightning Shield. If you do, your hero deals 2 nature damage to that character. If you removed the last counter, destroy Lightning Shield.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Dark clouds formed above their heads. It was at that moment that they knew they were in trouble.
Program.FullCard.Name: Lightning Storm
Program.FullCard.Rules: Your hero deals X nature damage divided as you choose to any number of target allies.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Light makes right!
Program.FullCard.Name: Light's Justice
Program.FullCard.Rules: When a [Holy] ally in your party deals damage, it also heals that much from your hero.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "The Light is mine to command when I need it." - Hekto Starspire
Program.FullCard.Name: Light's Largess, The
Program.FullCard.Rules: Ongoing: Destroy The Light's Largess Your hero heals 6 damage from target hero or ally.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "We are keepers of the Light." - Ishanah, High Priestess of the Aldor
Program.FullCard.Name: Lightwarden's Band
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Aldor Reputation
Your hero has "Inspire: Ability, ally, equipment, hero, or resource."

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Each well is a physical manifestation of the Light.
Program.FullCard.Name: Lightwell
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Holy Hero Required
Ongoing: Friendly heroes and allies have " This character heals 2 damage from itselt."

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "An unwilling sacrifice will serve my purposes as well as any other."
Program.FullCard.Name: Lilith Smythe
Program.FullCard.Rules: When Lillith readies, you may remove an ally card in your graveyard from the game. If you do, destroy target ability.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Open your heart to the Light."
Program.FullCard.Name: Lilnas the Calm
Program.FullCard.Rules: 3, , Destroy Lilnas Destroy all abilities.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Thrall is a fool! I follow the true warchief!"
Program.FullCard.Name: Lionar the Blood Cursed
Program.FullCard.Rules:
2, Flip Lionar Destroy target ally with protector. Use only on your turn.
Shattered Hand

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "WE ARE HORDE!"
Program.FullCard.Name: Lionar, Unbound
Program.FullCard.Rules: 3, Flip Lionar Protectors in your party have +2 ATK this turn.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: The helm grants the ability to strike blows as pure and true as a rich thorium vein.
Program.FullCard.Name: Lionheart Helm
Program.FullCard.Rules: Damage dealt by your hero can't be prevented.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: You can only resist the shadows for so long before they consume you.
Program.FullCard.Name: Lissie Spizfrat
Program.FullCard.Rules: On your turn: This ally deals 3 shadow damage to each hero and ally.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Her touch is as cold as her heart.
Program.FullCard.Name: Litori Frostburn
Program.FullCard.Rules: 2, Flip Litori Frostburn Target hero or ally can't attack this turn.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Pop quiz! You've got a bomb attached to your soul. What do you do?" - Riley Sizzleswitch
Program.FullCard.Name: Living Bomb
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Fire Hero Required
Attach to target hero.
Ongoing: At the start of your turn, add a fuse counter. Then, if there are ten or more, your hero deals 50 fire damage to attached hero, and destroy this ability.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "RUN!"
Program.FullCard.Name: Living Bomb
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Attach to target opposing ally.
Ongoing: At the start of your turn, destroy attached ally. If your hero is Baron Geddon, that ally deals fire damage equal to ist cost to each other hero and ally in ist party.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Ember glows; fire grows; death sows.
Program.FullCard.Name: Living Pyre
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Attach to target hero or ally.
Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 1 fire damage to attached character for each ability named Living Pyre attached to it.

Program.FullCard.Name: Llyras Keeneye
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Elusive (Can't be attacked.)
Llyras has +1 ATK/ +1 health for each ally in your party with cost 3 or more.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Joo gonna put up a fight dis time?
Program.FullCard.Name: Loate Grimtusk
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Long-Range (While this ally is attacking, the defender can't deal combat damage to it.)
When this ally attacks, put him into his owner's hand at the end of this turn.

Program.FullCard.Name: Lobotomize
Program.FullCard.Rules: Destroy target resource. If your hero is stealthed, put the top card of your deck into your resource row face down and exhausted.

Program.FullCard.Name: Lobotomizer, The
Program.FullCard.Rules: When The Lobotomizer enters play, each player destroys one of his resources.

Program.FullCard.Name: Locked Away
Program.FullCard.Rules:
You pay 4 less to complete this quest if you control a quest named The Key to Freedom.
Pay 5 to complete this quest.
Reward: Draw a card.

Program.FullCard.Name: Lockjaw
Program.FullCard.Rules: Once per turn: 2 Your hero heals 2 damage from target hero or ally.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Your gluttony will be the end of you."
Program.FullCard.Name: Logor Blackfist
Program.FullCard.Rules: When Logor enters play, target opponent discards two cards if he has more cards in hand than you.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Broll! Get Valeera out of here before she bleeds to death."
Program.FullCard.Name: Lo'Gosh
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Protector
Opposing heroes and allies have -1 ATK / -1 health while in combat with Lo'Gosh for each Arena ally in your party.
Program.FullCard.Rulings: [BoG Rules FAQ] Lo’Gosh counts himself. For example, if Lo’Gosh is the only Arena ally in your party and attacks an ally with 5 ATK / 5 health, both allies are destroyed by fatal damage as that combat concludes.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: A gift from a forgotten friend…
Program.FullCard.Name: Lohn'goron, Bow of the Torn-heart
Program.FullCard.Rules:
When you strike with Lohn'goron, your hero has long-range this combat.
Exhaust an ally in your party It deals 1 ranged damage to target hero.
Program.FullCard.Rulings: [DoW Rules FAQ] Allies can be exhausted to use this power regardless of how long they’ve been in your party.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: This mighty stave is bestowed only upon those hunters who have proven their worth to the Ancients.
Program.FullCard.Name: Lok'delar, Stave of the Ancient Keepers
Program.FullCard.Rules: When you play a hunter ability, your Ranged weapons have +1 ATK this turn.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "I drink in your suffering, mortal. Let your essence congeal with Lokholar!"
Program.FullCard.Name: Lokholar the Ice Lord
Program.FullCard.Rules:
You pay 1 less to play Lokholar for each non-token Horde ally in your party.
At the start of each opponent's turn, Lokholar deals 2 frost damage to each hero and ally in that player's party. A character dealt damage this way can't attack this turn.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "What was that?"
Program.FullCard.Name: Lolly the Unsuspecting
Program.FullCard.Rules: All targets are chosen at random.
Program.FullCard.Rulings: [DoW Rules FAQ] For each target description a link has, first identify the set of legal targets (for example, by excluding untargetable cards), and then randomly choose from that set. If that set contains one or more magnets (cards that must be targeted if able), randomly choose from among only those magnets unless all of those magnets have already been chosen for that link.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Bigger is not always better, mon."
Program.FullCard.Name: Longeye, The
Program.FullCard.Rules: On your turn: 5, Flip The Longeye Destroy target opposing ally if it has or shares the highest cost among opposing allies.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Fear isn't part of da Troll language, mon'. I be ready to take on da biggest and baddest dat da Scourge can throw at me."
Program.FullCard.Name: Longeye, The
Program.FullCard.Rules: On your turn: 5, Flip The Longeye Destroy target opposing ally if it has or shares the highest cost among opposing allies.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "I do only one thing - but I do it so well."
Program.FullCard.Name: Loraala
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Loraala can't attack.
Loraala deals 3 fire damage to target hero.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Feel the piercing touch of ice penetrate every fiber of your being!"
Program.FullCard.Name: Loraala the Frigid
Program.FullCard.Rules: 2, Flip Loraala Loraala deals 3 frost damage to target hero. A hero dealt damage this way can't attack this turn.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Kel'Thuzad thinks that his command over the power of frost is that masterful? He will long for the warmth of the frozen north once I'm through with him!"
Program.FullCard.Name: Loraala the Frigid
Program.FullCard.Rules: 2, Flip Loraala Loraala deals 3 frost damage to target hero. A hero dealt damage this way can't attack this turn.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Well, it used to be Lord Alexander's Battle Axe."
Program.FullCard.Name: Lord Alexander's Battle Axe
Lord Anton Lightbane
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Anton and Ghouls in your party are protectors.
3 Remove target ally card in any graveyard from the game and put a Ghoul ally token into play with 1 [Melee] ATK / 1 health.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Aye…I am wondrous, fabulous, and marvelous all rolled into one! Huzzah!"
Program.FullCard.Name: Lord Benjamin Tremendouson
Program.FullCard.Rules: On your turn: 4, Flip Benjamin Opposing allies have -1 health this turn.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Kor, get yer worthless beard over here!"
Program.FullCard.Name: Lord Cindervein
Program.FullCard.Rules: At the end of your turn, you may put target ability into its owner's hand.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Although our kind have no place in your world, we will fight to bring an end to the Lich King. This I vow."
Program.FullCard.Name: Lord Darion Mograine
Program.FullCard.Rules: 1, Destroy a Death Knight you control Put a 3 [Melee] / 3 [Health] Ghoul ally token into play.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: On his tombstone will be engraved three words: respect, tenacity, and compassion.
Program.FullCard.Name: Lord Grayson Shadowbreaker
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Protector
When Lord Grayson Shadowbreaker becomes exhausted, he heals 2 damage from target hero or ally.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "All who wish to hone their skills as assassins and thieves are welcome in Ravenholdt Manor."
Program.FullCard.Name: Lord Jorach Ravenholdt
Program.FullCard.Rules: 1, Exhaust a Rogue you control Exhaust target hero or ally.

Program.FullCard.Name: Lorekeeper Darian
Program.FullCard.Rules: X, Target player puts the top X cards of his deck into his graveyard.

Program.FullCard.Name: Loriam Argos
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Aberration (Prevent all non-combat damage that would be dealt to this ally.)
Stealth (This ally can't be protected against.)

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "The blood elves will endure any hardship, overcome any obstacle, and emerge stronger than before."
Program.FullCard.Name: Lor'themar Theron
Program.FullCard.Rules: Exhaust a Blood Elf in your party Interrupt target ability card.
Program.FullCard.Rulings: [FoO Rules FAQ] You can exhaust Theron to pay the cost of his own power, and because it’s not an activated () power, you can do so as soon as he enters your party.

Program.FullCard.Name: Lose Control
Program.FullCard.Rules: Target player discards a random card.

Program.FullCard.Name: Lost Isles
Program.FullCard.Rules: 1, Target Goblin you control has Assault 1 this turn for each equipment you control.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "My friend, Ringo, left earlier to explore the volcano to the south of here, and he has been gone way too long." - Spraggle Frock
Program.FullCard.Name: Lost!
Program.FullCard.Rules:
During your turn, pay 3 to complete this quest.
Reward: Put a unique Goblin ally token named Ringo into play with 0 ATK, 1 health, and "At the start of your turn, draw a card."

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Oh, the pains of love!" - Mistress Nagmara
Program.FullCard.Name: Love Potion, The
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Exhaust two allies in your party and pay 1 to complete this quest.
Reward: Draw a card.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "It's rare that I don't spend a night killing Horde. They're filthy animals."
Program.FullCard.Name: Lt. Commander Dudefella
Program.FullCard.Rules: 1, Dudefella deals 1 frost damage to target hero or ally. A character dealt damage this way can't attack this turn.

Program.FullCard.Name: Lucifron
Program.FullCard.Rules:
FRONT: Lucifron has +2 ATK while attacking and can attack only heroes.
At the start of your third turn, flip Lucifron.
BACK: Lucifron has +2 ATK while attacking and can attack only heroes.
At the end of your turn, Lucifron deals 6 shadow damage to each opposing hero.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: The curse so sapped his strength that it took all of his will just to swing his sword.
Program.FullCard.Name: Lucifron's Curse
Program.FullCard.Rules: Choose one: Destroy target ability; or interrupt target ability card. If your hero is Lucifron, you may choose both.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Are you willing to leave it all to chance?
Program.FullCard.Name: Lucky Strike Axe
Program.FullCard.Rules: Lucky Strike Axe enters play with three +1 ATK counters if an opponent went first this game.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Oh? Joo and what army, mon?"
Program.FullCard.Name: Lu'ka de Wall
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Protector
When Lu'ka is dealt damage, you may exhaust target hero or ally.

Program.FullCard.Name: Lunen the Moon Baron
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Elusive
Arcane allies in your party have " Draw a card."

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "We must push the Scourge back into Icecrown, or the land itself may never recover."
Program.FullCard.Name: Lunira Swiftbreath
Program.FullCard.Rules: Flip Lunira, discard a Druid You pay 1 less to play your next ally this turn.

Program.FullCard.Name: Lust for Battle
Program.FullCard.Rules: Ongoing: All allies have ferocity.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "All darkness will be overwhelmed by the Light of the naaru."
Program.FullCard.Name: Luumon
Program.FullCard.Rules: Shadow Resistance (Prevent all shadow [Shadow] damage that this ally would be dealt.)

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "May your blade strike true."
Program.FullCard.Name: Lynda Steele
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Protector
1 Target ally must attack this turn if able.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "As the master wishes."
Program.FullCard.Name: Lynxia
Program.FullCard.Rules: At the start of each turn, you may exhaust target ally.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Staying alive is as simple as keeping your distance."
Program.FullCard.Name: Lyshala Ravenshot
Program.FullCard.Rules: This ally has Long-Range while an opponent controls an ally with cost 4 or more.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "The fragile bonds of life are begging to be…adjusted."
Program.FullCard.Name: Madison Alters
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Untargetable
Madison has +1 ATK / +1 health for each hero in play.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: I can see that you really aren't that much of a threat.
Program.FullCard.Name: Madrea Bluntbrew
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Frost Resistance (Prevent all frost ([Frost]) damage that would be dealt to this ally.)
When this ally enters play, look at target opponent's hand and choose an ability or equipment. He discards that card.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "When joo hear de thunder, de lightning's gonna strike ya, mon." - Gladiator Sepirion
Program.FullCard.Name: Maelstrom of Steel
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Preparation (On your first turn, you may play this card without paying its cost.)
Ongoing: You pay 1 less to strike with weapons.

Program.FullCard.Name: Maelstrom Weapon
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Your hero deals 2 nature damage to target hero or ally.
Attach to one of your Melee weapons.
Ongoing: When you strike with attached weapon, your hero deals 1 nature damage to target hero or ally.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "I will do my best to keep them occupied."
Program.FullCard.Name: Maeryl Leafstrike
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Protector
Maeryl has -2 ATK while exhausted.

Program.FullCard.Name: Magdeline Prideheart
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Protector
When Magdeline defends, she heals 1 damage from target hero or ally.

Program.FullCard.Name: Mage Armor
Program.FullCard.Rules: Ongoing: 1, Remove an ability card in your graveyard from the game Prevent the next 2 damage that your hero would be dealt this turn.

Program.FullCard.Name: Mage Training
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Attach to target friendly ally.
Ongoing: Attached ally has " This ally deals 1 arcane damage to each opposing hero and ally."

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "And next on the docket: perfect for slaying abominations or a night of dining on the town..."
Program.FullCard.Name: Magiskull Cuffs
Program.FullCard.Rules: You pay 1 less to play your next ability this turn.

Program.FullCard.Name: Magister Ashi
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Scryer Reputation (Can't put Aldor cards in your deck.)
Stealth: (Can't protect against this character.)
When Ashi enters play, look at the top card of your deck. You may put it on the bottom of your deck.

Program.FullCard.Name: Magister Lashan
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Scryer Reputation (Can't put Aldor cards in your deck.)
Sabotage: Resource (This ally can attack opposing resources.)
When Lashan sabotages a resource, destroy it.

Program.FullCard.Name: Magistrix Dianas
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Scryer Reputation (Can't put Aldor cards in your deck.)
When Dianas enters play, look at the top card of your deck. Either draw it or put it on the bottom. If you draw it, put Dianas from play into her owner's hand.

Program.FullCard.Name: Magistrix Fyalenn
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Scryer Reputation (Can't put Aldor cards in your deck.)
You can't discard cards.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "The tactical advantage here is too high to pass up."
Program.FullCard.Name: Magistrix Larynna
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Scryer Reputation
Sabotage: Graveyard
When Larynna sabotages a graveyard, she deals 1 fire damage to target hero or ally for each card in it.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Blood elf magic comes at a high price.
Program.FullCard.Name: Magistrix Maelnerana
Program.FullCard.Rules: You may destroy two of your resources rather than pay Magistrix Maelnerana's cost.

Program.FullCard.Name: Magistrix Oleinas
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Scryer Reputation (Can't put Aldor cards in your deck.)
Ally cards in your hand are instant.

Program.FullCard.Name: Magistrix Tibrana
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Scryer Reputation (Can't put Aldor cards in your deck.)
Sabotage: Attached Ability (This ally can attack opposing attached abilities.)
When Tibrana sabotages an ability, gain control of it. You may attach it to another hero or ally.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Why do you throw away such treasures?"
Program.FullCard.Name: Magistrix Valthin
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Scryer Reputation
When an ability enters play, you may have target player gain control of it. If it's attached, that player may reattach it.

Program.FullCard.Name: Magma Blast
Program.FullCard.Rules: Ongoing: At the end of each opponent's turn, if Ragnaros isn't Submerged and was dealt no damage this turn, Ragnaros deals 1 fire damage to that player's hero for each rune you have.

Program.FullCard.Name: Magma Shackles
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Attach to target ally and exhaust it.
Ongoing: Attached ally can't ready during its controller's ready step. While your hero is Garr, each ally in that ally's party can't ready during its controller's ready step.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Closer! Come closer…and burn!" - Keli'dan the Breaker
Program.FullCard.Name: Magma Spike
Program.FullCard.Rules: Your hero deals 5 fire damage to target hero or ally.

Program.FullCard.Name: Magma Totem
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Ongoing: At the start of your turn, Magma Totem deals 1 fire damage to each opposing hero and ally.
(Totems can be attacked or targeted like allies.)

Program.FullCard.Name: Magmadar
Program.FullCard.Rules:
FRONT: Magmadar has +5 ATK while attacking and can attack only heroes.
At the end of your turn, flip Magmadar.
BACK: Magmadar has +10 ATK while attacking and can attack only heroes.
1, Exhaust a Hunter in your party Flip Magmadar. Any player may use this power during that player's turn.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Feel the fury of the mountain!"
Program.FullCard.Name: Magni, Lord of Ironforge
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Protector
When this ally is dealt combat damage by an attacking ally, you may put an [Alliance] ally with cost less than or equal to that attacking ally's cost from your hand into play.

Program.FullCard.Name: Magni, the Mountain King
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Protector
Dwarf heroes and allies you control have additional [Health] equal to the combined [Defense] of armor you control.
Stash: Put a 1 [Melee] / 1 [Health] [Alliance] Dwarf Warrior ally token into play.

Program.FullCard.Name: Magnificent Flying Carpet
Program.FullCard.Notes: Available as part of Crafting Redemption Program (Wrathgate)
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Tailoring Hero Required
You can control any number of locations.
When you place a resource face up, you may ready all locations you control.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "I've got ye in me sight, ya filthy horde animal…"
Program.FullCard.Name: Magnus Longbarrel
Program.FullCard.Rules: 1, Destroy Magnus Turn target resource face down.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "You weren't going to use that, were you? I didn't think so!"
Program.FullCard.Name: Magnus the Depriver
Program.FullCard.Rules: On your turn: 2, Flip Magnus Target player turns one of his face-up resources face down.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Laddie, the best way to avoid an enemy's attack is to be outside its reach."
Program.FullCard.Name: Magraff "Sparroweye" Ironhammer
Program.FullCard.Rules: 1 Magraff "Sparroweye" Ironhammer has long-range this turn. (Defenders deal no combat damage to him.)

Program.FullCard.Name: Magran Proudstep
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Ferocity
Long-range (Defenders deal no combat damage to this character.)

Program.FullCard.Name: Magtheridon
Program.FullCard.Rules:
FRONT: Magtheridon has +1 ATK while attacking for each Blood in play.
When the tenth Blood enters play, flip Magtheridon.
BACK: Magtheridon has +2 ATK while attacking for each Blood in play.

Program.FullCard.Name: Magtheridon
Program.FullCard.Rules:
FRONT: Untargetable
Magtheridon can't attack or be dealt damage.
When the last Channeler leaves your party or you place your fifth resource, flip Magtheridon.
BACK: When Magtheridon flips to this side, put five cubes into play, gain a Blood, and say, "I am UNLEASHED!" Put Magtheridon's Lair into play on the Coolsown side and swap this card with Unleashed Magtheridon.

Program.FullCard.Name: Magtheridon's Lair
Program.FullCard.Rules:
FRONT: When Magtheridon's Lair flips to this side, put 2 damage on each hero and ally with an attached Cube, then detach all Cubes.
At the end of your turn, flip Magtheridon's Lair.
BACK: At the start of your turn, if one or more Cubes are unattached, Magtheridon deals 10 fire damage to each opposing hero and ally.
At the end of your turn, flip Magtheridon's Lair.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: He conquered a world of orcs. Why did you think you would be a challenge?
Program.FullCard.Name: Magtheridon's Rage
Program.FullCard.Rules: Target an ally. You may target an additional ally for each Blood in play. Magtheridon deals X melee damage to each of those allies.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Our ancestors make sure that we stay grounded first and foremost."
Program.FullCard.Name: Mahna Lightsky
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Protector
This ally has Nature Resistance on opposing turns.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "My long hunt is finally over. Today, justice will be done!"
Program.FullCard.Name: Maiev Shadowsong
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Loyal Hero Required
Elusive, Ferocity, Long-Range, Protector, Stealth, Untargetable

Program.FullCard.Flavor: It does a body good.
Program.FullCard.Name: Major Healing Potion
Program.FullCard.Rules: 1, Destroy Major Healing Potion Your hero heals 5 damage from itself.

Program.FullCard.Name: Majordomo Executus
Program.FullCard.Rules:
FRONT: At the start of your turn, flip a coin. If it's heads, prevent all damage that would be dealt by opposing allies until your next turn. If it's tails, destroy all abilities attached to your allies and prevent all damage that would be dealt with opposing abilities until your next turn.
At the end of each turn, if you have no allies, flip Majordomo Executus.
BACK: When Majordomo Executus flips to this side, say, "Behold Ragnaros-the Firelord! He who was ancient when this world was young! Bow before him, mortals! Bow before your ending!" Ragnaros awakens.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "When I'm through with you, people will think you were run over by a stampede."
Program.FullCard.Name: Makta the Rumbler
Program.FullCard.Rules: While you control a Shout, allies you control have +1 / +1, and opposing allies have -1 / -1.

Program.FullCard.Name: Malaxia Wizwhirl
Program.FullCard.Rules: FRONT: 2 Flip Malaxia. BACK: When an opposing ally is dealt nature ([Nature]) damage, Malaxia may deal 1 nature damage to target hero.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Pull yourselves together.
Program.FullCard.Name: Malefic Necromancer
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Scourge Hero Required
When this ally enters play, you may put target ally in your graveyard on top of your deck.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Beware of cat.
Program.FullCard.Name: Maleo the Blur
Program.FullCard.Rules: 2, Flip Maleo This turn, Maleo is in cat form and has Form(1) until you strike with a weapon or play a non-Feral ability. (+1 ATK while attacking in cat form.)
Program.FullCard.Rulings: [DoW Rules FAQ] If you control another Form while your hero has Form (1), you must immediately destroy that Form (or your hero) to repair the uniqueness violation. Maleo loses both cat form and Form (1) if you strike with a weapon or play a non-Feral ability.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "No, you fool! The gyrochronatom goes over here!"
Program.FullCard.Name: Malfunction
Program.FullCard.Rules: Target player destroys one of his equipment.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Why would you ever go into combat without knowing what your opponent's plans are beforehand?"
Program.FullCard.Name: Malicious Mallina
Program.FullCard.Rules:
As Mallina enters play, choose arcane, fire, frost, nature, or shadow.
Mallina has the chosen resistance.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: A strong mistress can give pets a reason to kill, and a fear of coming back in failure.
Program.FullCard.Name: Malistra the Demonmistress
Program.FullCard.Rules: Friendly Pets have +2 ATK.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Nothin' gonna stop the Horde from takin' down the Lich King. Not frost wyrms, not vyrkulNOTHIN'!"
Program.FullCard.Name: Maloduri
Program.FullCard.Rules: If you control another Warrior: Flip Maloduri Target hero or ally has -2 ATK this turn.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Magi are unique in their ability to store mana for future use without alchemical aid.
Program.FullCard.Name: Mana Agate
Program.FullCard.Rules: Ongoing: 1, Destroy Mana Agate Draw 2 cards.

Program.FullCard.Name: Mana Burn
Program.FullCard.Rules: Exhaust all of target player’s ready resources. Your hero deals 1 shadow damage to that player's hero for each resource exhausted this way.

Program.FullCard.Name: Mana Burst
Program.FullCard.Rules: Ready all of target opponent's exhausted resources. Your hero deals 1 shadow damage to his hero for each resource readied this way.

Program.FullCard.Name: Mana Diamond
Program.FullCard.Rules: Ongoing: At the start of your turn, add a mana counter to this ability. Then, you may destroy this ability. If you do, draw a card for each mana counter.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Typical magecraft, to conjure a thing of such beauty only to sacrifice it." - Raesa Morningstar
Program.FullCard.Name: Mana Jade
Program.FullCard.Rules: Ongoing: 2, Destroy Mana Jade Draw three cards.

Program.FullCard.Name: Mana Ruby
Program.FullCard.Rules: Ongoing: 2, Destroy Mana Ruby Draw cards until you reach your maximum hand size.
Program.FullCard.Rulings: [BoG Rules FAQ] As this effect resolves, if your hand size is already at or above its maximum, nothing happens.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: If you look close enough, you can see the pure essence of mana swirling beneath the surface.
Program.FullCard.Name: Mana Sapphire
Program.FullCard.Rules: Ongoing: X, Destroy this ability If X is 5 or less, draw X cards.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: A mage can manipulate mana for defense as well as offense.
Program.FullCard.Name: Mana Shield
Program.FullCard.Rules: Ongoing: X, Prevent the next X combat damage that would be dealt to your hero by allies this turn.

Program.FullCard.Name: Mana Shift
Program.FullCard.Rules: Gain control of any number of opposing abilities with combined cost less than or equal to the number of resources you control. For each of those abilities that's attached, you may reattach it.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Water is the element of life and energy.
Program.FullCard.Name: Mana Spring Totem
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Ongoing: At the start of your turn, draw a card.
(Totems can be attacked or targeted like allies.)

Program.FullCard.Flavor: As the energy flowed into him, Phadalus heard the faint crashing of waves against the shore.
Program.FullCard.Name: Mana Tide Totem
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Restoration Hero Required
