You pay 3 less to strike with this weapon while your hero is in combat with an ally with cost 4 or more.
When you strike with this weapon, your hero has Long-Range this combat.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Hunters pride themselves on felling the most dangerous beasts.
Program.FullCard.Name: Trophy Kill
Program.FullCard.Rules: Destroy target ally with cost 4 or more.

Program.FullCard.Name: Trueshot Aura
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Marksmanship Hero Required
Ongoing: Ranged allies in your party have +2 ATK while attacking.
Your Ranged weapons have +2 ATK while your hero is attacking.
If your hero would deal ranged damage with an ability, it deals that much +2 instead.

Program.FullCard.Name: Truesilver Breastplate
Program.FullCard.Rules: When your hero defends, it heals 1 damage from itself.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: The bright blade sings a chorus of honor and triumph.
Program.FullCard.Name: Truesilver Champion
Program.FullCard.Rules: When you strike with Truesilver Champion, prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to your hero this combat.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "I don't trust a source of energy until I've sampled it for myself."
Program.FullCard.Name: Trytha Darksun
Program.FullCard.Rules: At the start of each player's turn, he exhausts one of his resources.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "How did I get myself into this situation?"
Program.FullCard.Name: Tully Fiddlewit
Program.FullCard.Rules: When Tully defends against an ally, discard a card.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Old Icebeard isn't always home, but he always comes back.
Program.FullCard.Name: Tundra MacGrann's Stolen Stash
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Dwarf Hero Required
Pay 3 to complete this quest.
Reward: If your hero dealt combat damage to an opposing hero this turn, draw two cards.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Sacrifice is a small price to pay for victory. Especially when someone else pays."
Program.FullCard.Name: Turane Soulpact
Program.FullCard.Rules: On your turn: 3, Flip Turane, destroy X allies in your party Turane deals X shadow damage to target hero or ally.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Do I feel lucky?"
Program.FullCard.Name: Turn Aside
Program.FullCard.Rules: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt by target ally this turn.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "You can fo more with a bow than just fire it." - The Greatest Race of Hunters
Program.FullCard.Name: Turn the Blade
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Attach to target ally or weapon.
Ongoing: Attached card has -3 ATK.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Your shallow victory will not turn the tide against the Lich King!" - Kel'Thuzad
Program.FullCard.Name: Turning Tide, The
Program.FullCard.Rules: You pay 2 less to play allies while you control fewer allies than an opponent.

Program.FullCard.Name: Turov the Risen
Program.FullCard.Rules: On your turn: Flip Turov, remove a Scourge ally in your graveyard from the game Turov deals 2 frost damage to target exhausted ally.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Once I see joo, mon, joo might as well get on your knees."
Program.FullCard.Name: Tusk
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Ferocity
When Tusk deals combat damage to a hero or ally, other heroes and allies in your party have long-range while attacking that character this turn.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: A popular pastime in Tuskarr culture is the creation of intricate and decorative kites.
Program.FullCard.Name: Tuskarr Kite
Program.FullCard.Rules: Ongoing: , Exhaust an ally you control Put the card tenth from the top of your deck in your hand.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Ya gonna have to hit harder den dat, mon!"
Program.FullCard.Name: Tuskmender Jan'zu
Program.FullCard.Rules: This ally has Mend 2 while she's damaged.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Great power pulses and hums beneath the bark of such a simple branch.
Program.FullCard.Name: Twig of the World Tree
Program.FullCard.Rules: Destroy one of your resources You pay 3 less the next time you strike with Twig of the World Tree this turn.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Indubitably!"
Program.FullCard.Name: Twilight Vanquisher Knolan
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Shadow Resistance
You may play this ally without paying his cost if a hero or ally you controled dealt shadow ([Shadow]) damage to an opposing hero this turn.

Program.FullCard.Name: Twin Spire Ruins
Program.FullCard.Rules:
When an opposing ally is destroyed, add a capture counter.
On your turn: 2, , Remove two capture counters Put an ally card with cost 2 or less from your graveyard into play.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: The blade will rise again, but its victims never will.
Program.FullCard.Name: Twinblade of the Phoenix
Program.FullCard.Rules: You can play Twinblade of the Phoenix from your graveyard.
Program.FullCard.Rulings: [BoG Rules FAQ] This card’s power is active while it’s in your graveyard; you don't need a second one in play. Playing a card from your graveyard is otherwise the same as doing so from your hand. For example, any costs must still be paid and any restrictions must still be observed.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Your will is weak. Your mind is mine.
Program.FullCard.Name: Twist of Faith
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Attach to target ally.
Ongoing: You control attached ally.

Program.FullCard.Name: Two-Handed Weapon Specialization
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Arms Hero Required
Ongoing: Your Two-Handed weapons have +5 ATK.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Every good rogue leaves his mark upon the world.
Program.FullCard.Name: Tyler Falconbridge
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Stealth (Can't protect against this character.)
Tyler Falconbridge is a Combo card while in a graveyard.
Program.FullCard.Rulings: [FoO Rules FAQ] While Tyler is in a graveyard, he has the Combo tag on his type line in addition to any others, so you can remove him from the game to pay the additional cost of a Finishing Move.

Program.FullCard.Name: Typhoon
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Ongoing: Typhoon enters play with two wind counters.
Opposing heroes and allies can't attack or protect.
At the start of your turn, remove a wind counter. If none remain, destroy Typhoon.

Program.FullCard.Name: Tyrennius Scatheblade
Program.FullCard.Rules: Protector

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Patience is not weakness."
Program.FullCard.Name: Tyrus Lionheart
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Protector
Tyrus has +4 ATK while defending.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Blood elves can sense the ebb and flow of arcane magic, and they often manipulate that magic to serve their needs.
Program.FullCard.Name: Tyrus Sheynathren
Program.FullCard.Rules: 3, Destroy Tyrus Sheynathren Interrupt target ability card.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "You should have spent your time more wisely, for I am here to inform you that you have none left."
Program.FullCard.Name: Tysandri Duskstrike
Program.FullCard.Rules: On your turn: Flip Tysandri, discard a Rogue Tysandri deals 3 melee damage to target exhausted hero or ally.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "There's no harm in looking after number one, provided ya don't abandon those that need ya."
Program.FullCard.Name: Ubel Sternbrow
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Protector
Ubel Sternbrow can protect himself.
Program.FullCard.Rulings: [FoO Rules FAQ] You can exhaust Ubel to protect, even if he is the proposed defender. Why? Well, that’s another question . . .

Program.FullCard.Name: Uglund Duskrider
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Stealth (Can’t protect against this character.)
When Uglund Duskrider attacks, target hero or ally has stealth this turn.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Feel da wind flow through joo, mon."
Program.FullCard.Name: Uh'gali the Elementalist
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Protector (This ally may exhaust to become the defender when an opposing hero or ally attacks.)
Exhaust a Totem you control Ready this ally.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Mortals die, but demons are forever!"
Program.FullCard.Name: Ulrac Bloodshadow
Program.FullCard.Rules: Ferocity. When Ulrac attacks, put a Demon ally card from your graveyard into hand.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "The queen of all that dwell in Nagrand is known as Tusker. She's a giant elekk the likes of which you won't see anywhere else!" - Hemet Nesingwary
Program.FullCard.Name: Ultimate Bloodsport, The
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Pay 2 to complete this quest.
Reward: If you have no other quests, draw a card.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: In a battle to the death, it’s the last blow-not the first-that matters.
Program.FullCard.Name: Ultimate Triumph
Program.FullCard.Rules: Destroy target ally.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "You'll only see me when I want you to…and I won't."
Program.FullCard.Name: Umbrage
Program.FullCard.Rules: 1, Flip Umbrage Remove target attacker from combat.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "No, really - don't get up." - Ressa Shadeshine
Program.FullCard.Name: Unbalance
Program.FullCard.Rules: Exhaust all opposing heroes and allies. If you have an equipment, each of them can't ready during its controller's next ready step.

Program.FullCard.Name: Unbridled Wrath
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Fury Hero Required
Ongoing: 1 Target weapon you control has +1 ATK this turn.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "A new species! Are you sure?" - Lauranna Thar'well
Program.FullCard.Name: Uncatalogued Species
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Pay 1 to complete this quest.
Reward: Name a standard race, then reveal the top four cards of your deck. Put a revealed ally card of that race into hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.
Program.FullCard.Rulings: [BoG Rules FAQ] There are ten standard races. The Alliance races are: draenei, dwarf, gnome, human, and night elf. The Horde races are: blood elf, orc, tauren, troll, and undead. No other tag is a race.

Program.FullCard.Name: Undaunted Defense
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Ongoing: Your hero has protector.
Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to your hero while protecting.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Soon. . .the world will tremble." - Heigan the Unclean
Program.FullCard.Name: Undeath Carrier, The
Program.FullCard.Rules: When a non-Undead ally you control is destroyed, put it into play, and it's also an Undead.

Program.FullCard.Name: Under the Shadow
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Pay 1 and name a damage type to complete this quest.
Reward: Reveal the top three cards of your deck. Put a revealed card with ATK of that type into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Beneath the ruins of Lordaeron, the armies of the Forsaken plot and scheme.
Program.FullCard.Name: Undercity
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Undead Hero Required
You may remove target ally card in a graveyard from the game. If you do, an Undead in your party heals 2 damage from itself.

Program.FullCard.Name: Underking Talonox
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Scourge Hero Required
This ally has -1 / -1 while there is an ability in an opposing graveyard.
This ally has -1 / -1 while there is an ally in an opposing graveyard.
This ally has -1 / -1 while there is an equipment in an opposing graveyard.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "I'm pretty sure he won't be using this again." - Randolphe Mortimer
Program.FullCard.Name: Unearthed Broadsword
Program.FullCard.Rules: At the start of your turn, if this weapon is in your graveyard, you may pay 1. If you do, put it into your hand.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "I cannot defeat them, but I can buy you time. Do not waste it."
Program.FullCard.Name: Unen Rataan
Program.FullCard.Rules: 2, Destroy Unen Rataan Ready your hero and all of your weapons.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "You take my breath away - literally." - Umbrage
Program.FullCard.Name: Unending Breath
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Ongoing: Play with the top card of your deck revealed.
You may complete quest cards from the top of your deck. As you do, remove them from the game as an additional cost.
Program.FullCard.Rulings: [DoW Rules FAQ] All costs (other than turning the quest face down) must still be paid, and any other restrictions on completing it must still be observed. A cost of "destroy this quest" can't be paid from a non-play zone. Corki's Ransom has received errata to clarify that its cost can be paid only from play.

Program.FullCard.Name: Unending Invasion, The
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Pay 4 to complete this quest.
Reward: Draw a card, then draw another one for each 10 damage on your hero.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "I told you to move out of the imp cave!"
Program.FullCard.Name: Unexpected Distraction
Program.FullCard.Rules: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to target hero or ally this turn.

Program.FullCard.Name: Unfair Advantage
Program.FullCard.Rules:
As an additional cost to play Unfair Advantage, remove up to five Combo cards in your graveyard from the game.
Target player discards that many cards.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Watch as the hunters are caught in their own deadly traps!" - Zaza
Program.FullCard.Name: Unfit for Death
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Pay 3 to complete this quest.
Reward: Draw a card and remove target card in a graveyard from the game.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "You had better double your efforts." - Haedis
Program.FullCard.Name: Unholy Ground
Program.FullCard.Rules: Ongoing: When a non-token ally you control is destroyed, put a 3 [Melee] / 3 [Health] Ghoul ally token into play.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "It is a tricky task to give a minion your power without relinquishing your soul in the process." - Pidge Filthfinder
Program.FullCard.Name: Unholy Power
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Demonology Hero Required
Demons in your party have +3 ATK / +3 health.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Embrace death, and the heavy burden of life will be lessened." - Ahkara
Program.FullCard.Name: Unholy Presence
Program.FullCard.Rules: Ongoing: You pay 1 less to play and strike with weapons.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "The dead are not bound by the limitations of the living." - Vanessa Fairgraves
Program.FullCard.Name: Unholy Rune
Program.FullCard.Rules:
As an additional cost to play, remove an ally in your graveyard from the game.
Ongoing: You pay 1 less to play your next card this turn.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Stay close to me! The Light is with us this day!"
Program.FullCard.Name: United Front
Program.FullCard.Rules: Target a friendly hero and a friendly ally. The next time each of them would be dealt damage this turn, prevent it.

Program.FullCard.Name: Unraveled Plans
Program.FullCard.Rules: Target player destroys one of his abilities.

Program.FullCard.Name: Unrelenting Assault
Program.FullCard.Rules:
You can’t play other cards this turn.
If you’ve played no other cards this turn, when your hero attacks this turn, you may pay 1. If you do, ready your hero and all of your Melee weapons.
Program.FullCard.Rulings: [MoL Rules FAQ] You can still use powers, complete quests, and place resources as usual this turn. This card checks whether you’ve played any other cards this turn as it resolves. If you have, it does nothing except stop you from playing other cards this turn. Otherwise, you may pay (1) every time your hero attacks this turn.

Program.FullCard.Name: Unstable Affliction
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Affliction Hero Required
Attach to target hero or ally.
Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 2 shadow damage to attached character.
When Unstable Affliction is destroyed, your hero deals 4 shadow damage to attached character.

Program.FullCard.Name: Unstable Infusion
Program.FullCard.Rules: Your hero deals arcane damage to target hero or ally equal to the cost of an equipment in that character's party.

Program.FullCard.Name: Unstoppable Flame
Program.FullCard.Rules: This turn, Ragnaros has +X ATK, is untargetable, and can't be protected against.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "What happens when...?"
Program.FullCard.Name: Unstoppable Force, The
Program.FullCard.Rules: Destroy The Unstoppable Force Destroy all armor named The Immovable Object.

Program.FullCard.Name: Unwelcome Visitor
Program.FullCard.Rules: Target player destroys an ally in his party.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "With each passing day, my faith grows stronger - and with good reason." - Sarina the Immaculate
Program.FullCard.Name: Unyielding Faith
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Holy Hero Required
Prevent all damage that would be dealt this turn.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Your contribution to this battle will be rewarded by the Holy Light." - Thoros the Savior
Program.FullCard.Name: Uplifting Prayer
Program.FullCard.Rules: Ongoing: At the start of your turn, you may put target ally card from your graveyard into play if its cost is less than or equal to the number of resources you control.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Against the Scourge, it takes great energy to remain incorruptible." - Grennan Stormspeaker
Program.FullCard.Name: Upstanding Spaulders
Program.FullCard.Rules: Each player can't ready more than three resources during his ready step.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "The long-forgotten memories of the Four Horsemen are contained within." - Andarius the Damned
Program.FullCard.Name: Urn of Lost Memories
Program.FullCard.RequireClass: Druid, Mage, Paladin, Priest, Shaman, Warlock
Program.FullCard.Rules: On your turn: , Destroy an ability or equipment you control with cost X Put target ally with cost X or less from your graveyard into play.

Program.FullCard.Name: Urrth
Program.FullCard.Rules: 3, Flip Urrth Draw a card for each Totem you have.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "The bear, once riled, is a force to be reckoned with." - Thangal
Program.FullCard.Name: Ursoc's Fury
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Ongoing: 1, Ready your hero.
Your hero has Bear Form. (Has Protector. Destroy this card when you strike with a weapon or play a non-Feral ability.)

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "The secret is out, mon."
Program.FullCard.Name: Uruka the Cutthroat
Program.FullCard.Rules:
When this ally is dealt damage, target opponent reveals his hand.
Death Rattle: You may choose "ability," "ally," or "equipment." If you do, target opponent reveals his hand, and this ally deals 1 melee damage to his hero for each revealed card of that kind.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "It is unwise to upset the Earth Mother." - Brahu Starsear
Program.FullCard.Name: Utopia
Program.FullCard.Rules: Destroy all tokens. Put each other ability, ally, and equipment into its owner's resource row face down, then exhaust them.
Program.FullCard.Rulings: [BoG Rules FAQ]This also affects friendly cards. No abilities, allies, or equipment leave play or become exhausted – they’re already face-down resources by the time they become exhausted. A card in play that enters a resource row becomes a different card. Any modifiers previously affecting it no longer do so unless they specify that they do. Any counters or damage are removed as part of it changing rows, and its attachments are destroyed.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "I fight for Velen, the naaru, and the Light. What hope do you have?"
Program.FullCard.Name: Vakeron
Program.FullCard.Rules: 7, Flip Vakeron Vakeron deals 2 unpreventable holy damage to each opposing hero and ally.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Kodo and stag? HA! Try hunting clefthoof and talbuk."
Program.FullCard.Name: Valanos

Program.FullCard.Flavor: The power of creation courses through this mighty weapon.
Program.FullCard.Name: Val'anyr, Hammer of Ancient Kings
Program.FullCard.Rules: At the end of your turn, your hero heals all damage from allies you control. Then, it heals that much damage from itself.

Program.FullCard.Flavor:
"I Take my anger out on our enemies!
Unlike some grouches…"
Program.FullCard.Name: Valeera Sanguinar
Program.FullCard.Rules: You may discard an Arena card rather than pay Valeera's cost.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "The cold touch of death has signaled your end."
Program.FullCard.Name: Valeos Chillheart
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Protector
Each ally in combat with Valeos has -1 ATK for each damage on that ally.

Program.FullCard.Name: Valerie Worfield
Program.FullCard.Rules: FRONT: 3 Flip Valerie. BACK: Prevent the first 1 damage that would be dealt to Valerie each turn.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "If I were you, I would pay attention to me."
Program.FullCard.Name: Valterus
Program.FullCard.Rules: 3, Flip Valterus Target friendly hero or ally is untargetable this turn.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: “You shall face me in the end. Fools always do.”
Program.FullCard.Name: Valthak Spiritdrinker
Program.FullCard.Rules: Your hero can't be destroyed.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Sometimes the line between pain and pleasure can be blurry.
Program.FullCard.Name: Vambraces of the Sadist
Program.FullCard.Rules: When an ally is destroyed, your hero deals melee damage equal to that ally's cost to target hero in that ally's party.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "The shadows can offer more than just protection." - Spiritualist Sunshroud
Program.FullCard.Name: Vampiric Dominance
Program.FullCard.Rules: Ongoing: When an opponent plays a card, your hero deals 1 shadow damage to his hero and heals 1 damage from itself.

Program.FullCard.Name: Vampiric Tendrils
Program.FullCard.Rules: Target player discards two cards. Your hero heals damage from itself equal to the combined cost of those cards.

Program.FullCard.Name: Vampiric Touch
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Shadow Hero Required
Attach to target hero or ally.
Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 1 shadow damage to attached character.
When you play a Shadow ability, ready one of your resources.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Nature isn't just around you. It's above you as well."
Program.FullCard.Name: Vanda Skydaughter

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "You may kill me first, but I promise I will kill you last."
Program.FullCard.Name: Vanessa Fairgraves
Program.FullCard.Rules: When Vanessa is destroyed, put a Ghoul ally token into play with 3 [Melee] ATK / 3 health.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Now you see him…
Program.FullCard.Name: Vanish
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Your hero is elusive this turn. If it's defending, remove all attackers from combat.
Ongoing: Your hero has stealth.
When your hero deals damage, destroy Vanish.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Your attacks are weak! Go practice on some rabbits and come back when you're stronger."
Program.FullCard.Name: Vanndar Stormpike
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Protector
You pay 1 less to play Vanndar for each honor counter on cards you control.
1, Remove an honor counter from a card you control Each player destroys one of his resources.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Now is not the time to be conservative in our approach.
Program.FullCard.Name: Vanora Moonshot
Program.FullCard.Rules: At the start of your turn, target ally has Assault 3 this turn. (It has +3 ATK on your turn.)

Program.FullCard.Name: Vanquish
Program.FullCard.Rules: Destroy target ally.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "It is at night when our people shine brightest."
Program.FullCard.Name: Varah, Fury of the Stars
Program.FullCard.Rules: Assault 2 (+2 ATK on your turn)

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "It will take all we have to drive the Firelord back from Nordrassil."
Program.FullCard.Name: Varandas Silverleaf
Program.FullCard.Rules: When this ally enters play, you may turn a quest you control face down. If you do, this ally deals 3 nature damage to target ally.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "The Scourge invaded Quel'Thalas and slaughtered many of our people. We will have vengeance. Join us, or get out of our way."
Program.FullCard.Name: Varanis Bitterstar
Program.FullCard.Rules: 4, Flip Varanis Bitterstar Varanis deals 2 arcane damage to target hero or ally. Draw a card. Use only on your turn.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Show the Legion that the Scryers are not to be trifled with."
Program.FullCard.Name: Varen the Reclaimer
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Scryer Reputation
Sabotage: Game
When Varen sabotages a game, the winner of this game also wins the next game.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "I'm always on the winning side."
Program.FullCard.Name: Varimathras
Program.FullCard.Rules: At the end of your turn, Varimathras deals 5 shadow damage to target opposing hero or ally. When that character is destroyed this turn, its controller discards a card.

Program.FullCard.Name: Veil of Night
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Your hero can't be targeted by opponents this turn.
Ongoing: Your hero has stealth.
When your hero deals damage, destroy Veil of Night.
Program.FullCard.Rulings: [Ragnok 11/2/2006] Veil of Night will not protect your Hero from being attacked by opposing Heroes or Allies. It will, however, make you unable to be targetted (keep in mind that AE's like Frost Nova and Flamestrike do not target). If you respond to the activation of an ability like Pyroblast or Fireball and play Veil of Night, it would resolve making your Hero unable to be the target of opposing abilities so when Fireball or Pyroblast go to resolve, the ability would fizzle as it would now have no legal target.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Speak your mind, Alliance fool; I would hear your last words."
Program.FullCard.Name: Velindra Sepulchre
Program.FullCard.Rules: 1, Flip Velindra This turn, target ally can't attack or protect, loses and can't have powers, and is also a Sheep.

Program.FullCard.Name: Veline Bladestar
Program.FullCard.Rules: Protector (This ally may exhaust to become the defender when an opposing hero or ally attacks.)

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "I don't like this place."
Program.FullCard.Name: Velnoth
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Velnoth can protect your hero.
2 Velnoth heals all damage from himself.

Program.FullCard.Name: Venerable Mass of McGowan
Program.FullCard.Rules:
While your hero is attacking an ally, this equipment has +2 ATK for each heriloom counter on it.
Stash (As this enters your resource row, you may have it enter face up. Immediately turn it face down.): Add an heirloom counter to target equipment you control.

Program.FullCard.Name: Vengeance of the Illidari
Program.FullCard.RequireClass: Druid, Mage, Paladin, Priest, Shaman, Warlock
Program.FullCard.Rules: When you play an ability, ready your hero.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "I will undo the mistake that was made when the Lich King brought you back." - Savin Lightguard
Program.FullCard.Name: Vengeance of the Light
Program.FullCard.Rules: Destroy target Death Knight, Ghoul, or Undead ally.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Once you have been marked, you will never have a moment's rest." - Kassandra Flameheart
Program.FullCard.Name: Vengeance Wrap
Program.FullCard.RequireClass: Death Knight, Druid, Hunter, Paladin, Rogue, Shaman, Warrior
Program.FullCard.Rules:
When this armor enters play, you may remove an ally in a graveyard from the game.
Your hero deals 1 melee damage to target hero or ally that shares a class or race with that ally.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Some arena contests last too long, which makes the crowd upset. We don't want an unhappy crowd." - Vixton Pinchwhistle
Program.FullCard.Name: Vengeful Gladiator's Bonecracker
Program.FullCard.Rules: When a resource enters play under your control, put a +1 ATK counter on Vengeful Gladiator's Bonecracker.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Some say strength comes from within…the cleaver begs to differ." - Chloe Mithrilbolt
Program.FullCard.Name: Vengeful Gladiator's Cleaver
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Your hero has dual wield.
You can strike with Vengeful Gladiator's Cleaver while an ally in your party is in combat. (If you do, that ally gains this card's ATK and damage type this combat.)

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "You will know when I am coming, for the earth itself will tremble beneath me." - Tribemother Torra
Program.FullCard.Name: Vengeful Gladiator's Earthshaker
Program.FullCard.Rules:
When combat damage is dealt with one or more of your weapons, ready all of your weapons.
Your hero deals 2 frost damage to target hero or ally. A character dealt damage this way can't attack or protect this turn.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Having power is not enough. You must wield it…publicly." - Kristoff Manchester
Program.FullCard.Name: Vengeful Gladiator's Felshroud
Program.FullCard.Rules:
On your turn, you can play ability cards that are removed from the game.
Put target opposing ally into its owner's hand.
Program.FullCard.Rulings: [BoG Rules FAQ] This includes opposing ability cards. Playing a card from an RFG zone is otherwise the same as doing so from your hand. For example, any costs must still be paid and any restrictions must still be observed.

Program.FullCard.Name: Vengeful Gladiator's Piercing Touch
Program.FullCard.Rules: 1, Remove an ability card in your graveyard from the game Vengeful Gladiator's Piercing Touch has +1 ATK this turn.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "A rogue in these vestments is as close to a sure bet as possible." - Ecton Brasstumbler
Program.FullCard.Name: Vengeful Gladiator's Vestments
Program.FullCard.Rules:
When you play a finishing move, you may interrupt target card.
Put the top card of your deck into your resource row face down and ready.
Program.FullCard.Rulings: [DoW Rules FAQ] Cards that have been placed on the chain can't be targeted for interruption. Each armor set is one card with five uniqueness tags: Chest (1), Hands (1), Head (1), Legs (1), and Shoulder (1). Controlling any other armor with one of these tags causes a uniqueness violation as normal.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: The venom of the scorpid burns the blood and scars the flesh.
Program.FullCard.Name: Venomstrike
Program.FullCard.Rules: At the end of each turn, Venomstrike deals 4 nature damage to each hero and ally it dealt damage to this turn.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Don't call me for anything less than a massacre."
Program.FullCard.Name: Verzuk Bloodfist
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Assault 3 (+3 ATK on your turn)
When this ally deals damage to an exhausted ally, you may destroy target equipment.

Program.FullCard.Name: Vesh'ral
Program.FullCard.Rules: Ferocity (Can attack immediately)

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Weaken the outliers first, and the others will cluster."
Program.FullCard.Name: Vesperia Silversong
Program.FullCard.Rules: This ally can't attack heroes.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "To underestimate me is to underestimate the power of Elune."
Program.FullCard.Name: Vestia Abiectus
Program.FullCard.Rules: When Vestia Abiectus deals combat damage, you may put an ability you control into its owner's hand.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Wear the tabard of the Argent Crusade with pride and honor!"
Program.FullCard.Name: Veteran Crusader Aliocha Segard
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Argent Crusade Reputation
Protector
This ally has +1 / +1 for each other Unique ally you control.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Untold power, and it will keep your pants up. What more could you ask for?" - Kayri
Program.FullCard.Name: Veteran's Dreadweave Belt
Program.FullCard.Rules: Players pay 2 more to play cards.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: History is written by the winners.
Program.FullCard.Name: Veteran's Pendant
Program.FullCard.Rules: If you win this game, you decide who goes first next game.
Program.FullCard.Rulings: [DoW Rules FAQ] In a two-player game, if your opponent concedes while Veteran’s Pendant is on the chain, or if your opponent loses after it leaves play, he or she decides who goes first next game as normal. In a tournament, this modifier applies only to the next game if it’s in the same match.

Program.FullCard.Name: Vexmaster Nar'jo
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Ferocity (Can attack immediately.)
Nar'jo has +2 ATK while attacking a ready ally.

Program.FullCard.Name: Vexra Darkfall
Program.FullCard.Rules: When Vexra Darkfall is destroyed, she deals 1 arcane damage to target hero for each card in its controller's hand.

Program.FullCard.Name: Vicious Circle
Program.FullCard.Rules: You may put an ally card from your hand into play. If you do, destroy a second target ally in your party, then put a third target ally card from your graveyard into hand.

Program.FullCard.Name: Viciousness
Program.FullCard.Rules: Ongoing: Target Worgen ally you control has Ferocity this turn.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Identify a victim, ruin him, then disappear." - Garona: A Study on Stealth and Treachery
Program.FullCard.Name: Victimize
Program.FullCard.Rules: Target player discards two cards and you draw two cards.
Program.FullCard.Rulings: [BoG Rules FAQ] The target need not have two or more cards in hand. You draw two cards even if no cards are discarded.

Program.FullCard.Name: Victor Baltus
Program.FullCard.Rules: FRONT: 2 Flip Victor. BACK: Demons you control have +1 / +1.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Since she was a small girl, Victoria has trained with all manner of weaponry.
Program.FullCard.Name: Victoria Jaton
Program.FullCard.Rules: 2, Flip Victoria Jaton Weapon cards in your hand are instant this turn.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Victory for one means agony for another.
Program.FullCard.Name: Victory Rush
Program.FullCard.Rules: If your hero has dealt fatal combat damage to an ally this turn, destroy another target ally.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "We put our faith in that which both sustains and restores." - Jaenel
Program.FullCard.Name: Vigil of the Light
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Put target ally from your graveyard into play. If you do, attach this ability to it.
Ongoing: At the start of each turn, your hero heals all damage from attached ally.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Never let down your guard - not for a hot meal, not for a kind word, not for an instant."
Program.FullCard.Name: Vigilance
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Ongoing: Your hero has protector.
Ready your hero. Use only on an opponent's turn.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Rogues are always behind you or a step ahead.
Program.FullCard.Name: Vigor
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Assassination Hero Required
Put Vigor into your resource row face down and ready.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Sturdy, simple, and solid - all you need in a mace.
Program.FullCard.Name: Viking Warhammer
Program.FullCard.Notes: From the Through the Dark Portal FAQ

Program.FullCard.Flavor: The sinister blade has outlived every assassin to wield it.
Program.FullCard.Name: Vileblade of the Betrayer
Program.FullCard.Rules: You may remove a Poison card in hand from the game rather than pay Vileblade of the Betrayer's cost.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "There will never again come a time when the Aldor cannot protect Shattrath from her enemies."
Program.FullCard.Name: Vindicator Agran
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Aldor Reputation (Can't put Scryer cards in your deck.)
Protector
Inspire: Protector (You may ready one of your protectors during each other player's ready step.)

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Glory to the naaru!"
Program.FullCard.Name: Vindicator Aluumen
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Aldor Reputation
Inspire: All friendly protectors

Program.FullCard.Name: Vindicator Belian
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Aldor Reputation (Can't put Scryer cards in your deck.)
If an ally in your party other than Belian would be dealt damage, it's dealt to Belian instead.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: His charge from Draenor was made headlong through enemy steel.
Program.FullCard.Name: Vindicator Borovon
Program.FullCard.Rules: At the start of your turn, you may destroy target equipment.

Program.FullCard.Name: Vindicator Dindro
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Aldor Reputation (Can't put Scryer cards in your deck.)
Inspire: Weapon (Ready one of your weapons during each other player's ready step.)

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Spirits of this land, hear my call!"
Program.FullCard.Name: Vindicator Enkallus
Program.FullCard.Rules: Protector

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Let us shout our defiance in the face of the defilers!"
Program.FullCard.Name: Vindicator Falaan
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Aldor Reputation
Inspire: All friendly heroes and allies with powers

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "The naaru are not gods. They are here with us, now."
Program.FullCard.Name: Vindicator Javlo
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Aldor Reputation (Can't put Scryer card in your deck.)
When an ally in your party is inspired, draw a card.

Program.FullCard.Name: Vindicator Kaldel
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Aldor Reputation (Can't put Scryer cards in your deck.)
Inspire: Ally (Ready one of your allies during each other player's ready step.)

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "I will give everthing for our cause."
Program.FullCard.Name: Vindicator Kentho
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Aldor Reputation
Destroy Kentho Interrupt target card or effect targeting a card in play you control.

Program.FullCard.Name: Vindicator Khorin
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Aldor Reputation (Can't put Scryer cards in your deck.)
If an ally in your party other than Khorin would be dealt damage, it's dealt to Khorin instead.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: When law and justice are at odds, the Vindicators settle things.
Program.FullCard.Name: Vindicator Lorin
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Aldor Reputation
Inspire: Armor and item

Program.FullCard.Name: Vindicator Melina
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Aldor Reputation (Can't put Scryer cards in your deck.)
Inspire: Equipment (Ready one of your equipment during each other player's ready step.)

Program.FullCard.Name: Vindicator Ostakron
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Aldor Reputation (Can't put Scryer cards in your deck.)
Protector
Inspire: Armor (You may ready one of your armor during each other player's ready step.)

Program.FullCard.Flavor: The Aldor and their naaru patrons actively work to be a beacon of hope in a broken world.
Program.FullCard.Name: Vindicator Trytan
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Aldor Reputation (Can't put Scryer cards in your deck.)
Protector
Inspire: Armor (Ready one of your armor during each other player's ready step.)

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "The Aldor way is the true way."
Program.FullCard.Name: Vindicator Vasha
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Aldor Reputation
Cards in play with reputation other than Aldor lose and can't have powers.

Program.FullCard.Name: Vindicator Zalreth
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Aldor Reputation, Protector
When Zalreth is destroyed, you may remove him from the game. If you do, put an ally card from your graveyard into play if its cost is less than or equal to the number of resources you have.
Program.FullCard.Rulings: [MoL Rules FAQ] You may remove Zalreth from the game only if he has remained in your graveyard continuously since his destruction. Opponents may remove ally cards from your graveyard in response to his effect, but you don’t choose an ally card until it resolves, at which time your opponents can no longer respond.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Their weapons are as relentless as their tactics
Program.FullCard.Name: Vindicator's Brand
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Aldor Reputation
When Vindicator's Brand is destroyed, you may destroy target ability or equipment.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "The Scourge will gain no sympathy from the Light." - Graccus
Program.FullCard.Name: Vindictive Strike
Program.FullCard.Rules: Your hero deals 2 unpreventable holy damage to target ally, or 6 if that ally dealt damage this turn.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "You really don't look well at all. Just the way I like it."
Program.FullCard.Name: Vindron the Impure
Program.FullCard.Rules: When this ally attacks, he may deal shadow damage to target hero or ally equal to the number of Curses you control.

Program.FullCard.Name: Violent Reflex
Program.FullCard.Rules: Ongoing: When Magtheridon is dealt damage, he deals 1 melee damage to the source of that damage.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Not all targets bleed blood.
Program.FullCard.Name: Viper Sting
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Attach to target hero.
Ongoing: At the start of attached hero's controller's turn, he exhausts one of his resources, or two if you have a Ranged weapon.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "I purge thee!"
Program.FullCard.Name: Virkaltor
Program.FullCard.Rules: 1, Destroy Virkaltor Destroy target ability.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: I will draw their fire so that you can thin the Scourge ranks unimpeded.
Program.FullCard.Name: Vishala
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Frost Resistance (Prevent all frost ([Frost]) damage that would be dealt to this ally.)
Target ally can't attack or protect this turn.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: It longs for the taste of blood.
Program.FullCard.Name: Vis'kag the Bloodletter
Program.FullCard.Rules: When your hero deals combat damage with Vis'kag the Bloodletter to an ally without damage on it, destroy that ally.

Program.FullCard.Name: Vitality
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Protection Hero Required
Ongoing: At the start of your turn, put a might counter on Vitality.
For each might counter, your hero has +1 ATK while attacking and +1 health.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "I got what you need."
Program.FullCard.Name: Vixton Pinchwhistle
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Reveal the top three cards of your deck.
Put a revealed Arena card into hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "You really shouldn't have done that." - Matthias Lehner
Program.FullCard.Name: Voice in the Dark, A
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Pay 2 to complete this quest.
Reward: An opponent chooses one: Put a random card from your graveyard into your hand; or draw a card.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Only the foolish think resoning is for the weak." - Justice Blindburn
Program.FullCard.Name: Voice of Reason
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Your hero has Mend 2 for each 5 damage on it.
Your hero has Protector while you control no damaged allies.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "The Nether has more than enough room to accommodate you." - Pagatha Soulbinder
Program.FullCard.Name: Void Pact
Program.FullCard.Rules: Draw a card for each opposing ally that left play this turn.

Program.FullCard.Name: Voidfire Wand
Program.FullCard.Rules: When combat damage is dealt with Voidfire Wand to a hero, the next time that hero's controller would draw a card, he skips drawing it instead.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Her pet rises to his fullest strength at midday.
Program.FullCard.Name: Voidmaven Christie Noone
Program.FullCard.Rules: On your turn: 3, Exhaust a Demon you control Target player discards a card.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "To the south of us is an area of broken land called the Warp Fields. It's full of rogue and uncontrolled voidwalkers, but I like to think of them as walking batteries." - Screed Luckheed
Program.FullCard.Name: Voidwalkers Gone Wild
Program.FullCard.Rules:
If your hero dealt combat damage to an ally this turn, pay 1 to complete this quest.
Reward: Draw a card.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Even the hardiest of adventurers can only spend so long in the fiery bowels of Blackrock Mountain.
Program.FullCard.Name: Volcanic Lair
Program.FullCard.Rules: Ongoing: At the start of your turn, if you have five or more resources, destroy target opposing hero.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Let's see how the Lich King's forces stand against such devastating power." - Ivan, Bladewing Brute
Program.FullCard.Name: Voldrethar, Dark Blade of Oblivion
Program.FullCard.Rules: You pay 5 less to strike with this weapon if you have a card with the same name as this weapon in your graveyard.

Program.FullCard.Name: Volin Netherburn
Program.FullCard.Rules: When you play an ability, Volin deals 2 shadow damage to target hero or ally and 2 shadow damage to himself.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "You make big mistake, mon."
Program.FullCard.Name: Vol'jin
Program.FullCard.Rules: Vol'jin has +X ATK, where X is the combined damage on Trolls in your party.

Program.FullCard.Name: Volley
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Ongoing: At the end of your turn, your hero deals 1 arcane damage to each of up to three target heroes and/or allies.
When your hero is dealt damage, destroy Volley.

Program.FullCard.Name: Voltrinnia
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Protector
Arcane Torrent
At the start of each opponent's turn, target ally in his party loses and can't have powers this turn.

Program.FullCard.Name: Vorden the Shadowbringer
Program.FullCard.Rules: When Vorden enters play, destroy any number of allies in your party, then destroy an opposing ally for each ally destroyed this way.
Program.FullCard.Rulings: [FoO Rules FAQ] You choose all allies to be destroyed. You can choose untargetable allies. You can choose Vorden himself. Once this triggered effect resolves and you choose the allies in your party to be destroyed, there’s no opportunity for your opponents to do anything before you destroy the opposing allies.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "We need to show our people who Kael'thas is really working for."
Program.FullCard.Name: Voren'thal the Seer
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Scryer Reputation (can't put Aldor cards in your deck)
If you would draw a card, draw two instead.
Program.FullCard.Rulings: [MoL Rules FAQ] Multiple cards are drawn one at a time, so if you would draw two cards, you draw four instead, and so on.

Program.FullCard.Name: Vorix Zorbuzz
Program.FullCard.Rules: FRONT: 3 Flip Vorix. BACK: If Vorix would deal melee damage, he deals that much nature damage +1 instead.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Our thirst for magic is ambition, not addiction.
Program.FullCard.Name: Vor'na the Disciplined
Program.FullCard.Rules: 3, Flip Vor'na Allies can't attack this turn.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Must…have…power."
Program.FullCard.Name: Vor'na the Wretched
Program.FullCard.Rules:
3, Flip Vor'na At the end of this turn, the player whose turn it is destroys each ally in his party that neither attacked nor entered play this turn.
Wretched

Program.FullCard.Name: Voss Treebender
Program.FullCard.Rules: When Voss Treebender attacks, you may exhaust target hero or ally.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: What greater power is there than to unmake whatever you desire?
Program.FullCard.Name: Vukora Netherflame
Program.FullCard.Rules: Opposing allies with Resistance have -1 [Health].

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "The ebb and flow of the elements will aid us in our struggle."
Program.FullCard.Name: Vurkeran
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Protector
Ready all abilities and equipment you control.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Stop interrupting me, mon. I'm trying to concentrate."
Program.FullCard.Name: Vuz'din
Program.FullCard.Rules: Opposing Ongoing abilities lose and can't have powers.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Sometimes the best defense is still a good defense.
Program.FullCard.Name: Vylar Whitepaw
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Protector (This ally may exhaust to become the defender when an opposing hero or ally attacks.)
When this ally defends, it heals 1 damage from itself.

Program.FullCard.Name: Waldo the Decoy
Program.FullCard.Rules: Exhaust your hero Exhaust target ally.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "What do you intend to do when the face of death stares at you? - Kel'Thuzad
Program.FullCard.Name: Wall of Terror
Program.FullCard.Rules: When this armor enters play, put each other ability, ally, and equipment into its owner's hand.

Program.FullCard.Name: Wall of the Dead
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Remove an ally card in your graveyard from the game Put a bone counter on Wall of the Dead
Wall of the Dead has +1 DEF for each bone counter on it.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Sooner or later, all who stand in my way must feel the icy touch of death." - "Black Ice" Fizzlefreeze
Program.FullCard.Name: Wand of Biting Cold
Program.FullCard.Rules: When Wand of Biting Cold enters play, target hero or ally can't attack this turn.

Program.FullCard.Name: Wand of Eternal Light
Program.FullCard.Rules: Damage that would be dealt with Wand of Eternal Light is unpreventable.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "It's got a little bit of everything." - Katianna
Program.FullCard.Name: Wand of Prismatic Focus
Program.FullCard.Rules: When Wand of Prismatic Focus enters play, your hero deals 1 arcane, 1 fire, 1 frost, 1 nature, and 1 shadow damage to target ally.

Program.FullCard.Name: Wand of Ruby Claret
Program.FullCard.Rules: When this equipment enters play, you may put target ability from your graveyard on top of your deck.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: It pulses with magic from realms long since forgotten.
Program.FullCard.Name: Wand of the Forgotten Star
Program.FullCard.Rules: When combat damage is dealt with Wand of the Forgotten Star to a hero, that hero's controller puts that many cards from the top of his deck into his graveyard.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: It bestows both power and foresight.
Program.FullCard.Name: Wand of the Seer
Program.FullCard.Rules: When your hero deals damage with an ability to a hero, it also deals that much nature damage divided as you choose to any number of target allies.

Program.FullCard.Name: Wand Specialization
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Arcane Hero Required
Ongoing: Your wands have +2 ATK
When you strike with a Wand, your hero has long-range this combat. (Defenders deal no combat damage to it.)

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Don't worry about me, I can take care of myself."
Program.FullCard.Name: Wanda Darkfizz
Program.FullCard.Rules: Wanda is elusive and untargetable while you have a weapon.

Program.FullCard.Name: Wanted: "Hogger"
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Human Hero Required
During your turn, pay 1 to complete this quest.
Reward: Target opponent puts a Gnoll ally token named Hogger with 2 ATK and 2 health into play. When Hogger leaves play, draw two cards.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Durn's murderous grip has been loosed! Nagrand has a brighter tomorrow because of you, hero. Well done!" - Warden Bullrok
Program.FullCard.Name: Wanted: Durn the Hungerer
Program.FullCard.Rules:
If an opposing ally was destroyed this turn, pay 2 to complete this quest.
Reward: Draw a card.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "When Grom'thar the Thunderbringer arrives, kill him and bring me his head." - Aurastrasza
Program.FullCard.Name: Wanton Warlord
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Exhaust four cards you control to complete this quest.
Reward: Draw a card.

Program.FullCard.Name: War of Attrition
Program.FullCard.Rules: Put any amount of damage divided as you choose on allies in your party. Each opponent divides that much damage among allies in his party. Players can't put more than fatal damage on an ally this way.
Program.FullCard.Rulings: [DoW Rules FAQ] Players _can_ put _exactly_ fatal damage on an ally (and opponents must do so if no alternative exists). All allies with fatal damage are destroyed simultaneously by the first PPP check after this card resolves.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: When the tauren put their foot down, people pay attention.
Program.FullCard.Name: War Stomp
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Tauren Hero Required
Exhaust all opposing heroes and allies.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "If they don't want to bring the fight to us, then we'll just have to take the fight to them." - "Bonewall" Simms
Program.FullCard.Name: Warbringer
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Protection Hero Required
Ongoing: [Warrior] abilities and equipment in your hand are instant this turn until you play a card.

Program.FullCard.Name: Warbringer Arix'amal
Program.FullCard.Rules: Other Demons have +2 ATK.

Program.FullCard.Name: Warcaller Zin'bawa
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Troll Hero Required
Protector
Warcaller Zin'bawa has +1 ATK for each damage on allies in your party.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Lok'Tar, friend. Have you come to serve the Horde?"
Program.FullCard.Name: Warchief Thrall
Program.FullCard.Rules: Other Horde allies in your party have +3 ATK and +3 health.

Program.FullCard.Name: Warchief's Revenge
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Goblin Hero Required
On your turn: For each ally you control, you may pay 1 to complete this quest.
Reward: Your hero deals 1 nature damage to target hero or ally for each 1 paid this way.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Though the target is in plain sight, the defenses are not.
Program.FullCard.Name: Warden Ravella
Program.FullCard.Rules: Protector, Untargetable

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "The Earth Mother provides all we need."
Program.FullCard.Name: Warden Stormclaw
Program.FullCard.Rules: 2, Flip Stormclaw, destroy a Form you control Destroy target ally. Use only on your turn.

Program.FullCard.Name: Warden Tonarin
Program.FullCard.Rules: Elusive, Protector

Program.FullCard.Name: Warglaive of Azzinoth, Left Hand of the Betrayer
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Your hero has dual wield while you have another Warglaive.
When Warglaive of Azzinoth leaves play, put a Demon ally token named Flame of Azzinoth into play with 3 [Fire] ATK / 3 health and ferocity.

Program.FullCard.Name: Warglaive of Azzinoth, Right Hand of the Betrayer
Program.FullCard.Rules:
When you strike with Warglaive of Azzinoth, ready another one of your Warglaives.
When Warglaive of Azzinoth leaves play, put a Demon ally token named Flame of Azzinoth into play with 3 [Fire] ATK / 3 health and protector.

Program.FullCard.Name: Warlock Training
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Attach to target friendly ally.
Ongoing: When attached ally attacks, you may put target opposing ally into its owner's hand.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Succeed and be honored. Fail and be forgotten."
Program.FullCard.Name: Warlord Goretooth
Program.FullCard.Rules: Orcs in your party have ferocity.

Program.FullCard.Name: Warlord Kalithresh
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Traitor Hero Required
At the end of your turn, put a Naga Distiller ally token with 0 Mele ATK / 1 health into play.
At the start of your turn, destroy a Naga Distiller in your party.
If you do, Kalithresh has +5 ATK this turn.

Program.FullCard.Name: Warm Welcome, A
Program.FullCard.Rules:
If your hero has dealt 5 or more damage this turn, pay 2 to complete this quest.
Reward: Draw two cards.

Program.FullCard.Name: Warmace of Menethil
Program.FullCard.Rules: When damage is dealt with this equipment, draw a card.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "I don't have no schedule, mon. I just make it up as I go!"
Program.FullCard.Name: Warmaster Bo'jo
Program.FullCard.Rules: 2, Flip Bo'jo Bo'jo has +2 ATK while attacking this turn.

Program.FullCard.Name: Warmaster Hork
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Orc Hero Required
Ferocity
2 Warmaster Hork has +1 ATK this turn.

Program.FullCard.Name: Warp Splinter's Thorn
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Your hero has dual wield.
1, Destroy on of your Daggers Your hero deals 2 damage to target ally.

Program.FullCard.Name: Warpwood Binding
Program.FullCard.Rules: You pay 1 less to strike with Ranged weapons.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "So long as I stand, you shall not pass."
Program.FullCard.Name: Warrax
Program.FullCard.Rules: 1, Flip Warrax Warrax has protector this turn.

Program.FullCard.Name: Warrior Training
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Attach to target friendly ally.
Ongoing: Opposing heroes and allies can attack only attached ally if able.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "He's got the flag. GET HIM!" - Kileana
Program.FullCard.Name: Warsong Gulch
Program.FullCard.Rules:
When you play a card, add an honor counter.
, Remove two honor counters Target ally is a protector this turn.

Program.FullCard.Name: Wastewalker Helm
Program.FullCard.Rules: When your hero deals damage to an exhausted ally, destroy it.

Program.FullCard.Name: Wastewalker Leggings
Program.FullCard.Rules: When an opposing hero or ally becomes exhausted, your hero deals 1 melee damage to it.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Only the most heroic strive to redeem the lost souls of Auchindoun.
Program.FullCard.Name: Wastewalker Shoulderpads
Program.FullCard.Rules: When your hero attacks, you may exhaust target hero or ally.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Give me your tired…
Program.FullCard.Name: Wastewalker Tunic
Program.FullCard.Rules: Wastewalker Tunic has +5 DEF while your hero is attacking an exhausted hero or ally.

Program.FullCard.Name: Watcher Mal'wi
Program.FullCard.Rules: When an opposing ally enters play, Watcher Mal'wi deals 1 ranged damage to it.

Program.FullCard.Name: Watchman Visi
Program.FullCard.Rules: This ally has Assault 2 while an opposing hero is face down. It has +2 ATK on your turn.)

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "There is no murloc that can hide from me."
Program.FullCard.Name: Water Breathing
Program.FullCard.Rules: Ongoing: You may complete quest cards from your hand. As you do, remove them from the game as an additional cost.
Program.FullCard.Rulings: [DoW Rules FAQ] All costs (other than turning the quest face down) must still be paid, and any other restrictions on completing it must still be observed. A cost of "destroy this quest" can't be paid from a non-play zone. Corki's Ransom has received errata to clarify that its cost can be paid only from play.

Program.FullCard.Name: Water Elemental
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Frost Hero Required
Water Elemental deals 1 frost damage to each opposing hero and ally. A character dealt damage this way can't attack this turn.

Program.FullCard.Name: Water Shield
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Ongoing: Water Shield enters play with three mana counters.
When an opposing hero or ally deals damage to your hero, ready up to three of your resources and remove a mana counter. If none remain, destroy Water Shield.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Neat trick." - Bulkas Wildhorn
Program.FullCard.Name: Water Walking
Program.FullCard.Rules: Ongoing: Put target location or quest from your graveyard into your hand.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "No matter how hard you try, the crashing tides will repel you." - Zorin of the Thunderhead
Program.FullCard.Name: Wavestorm Totem
Program.FullCard.Rules: Ongoing: When an opposing ability, ally, or equipment readies, put it into its owner's hand. (Totems can be attacked or targeted like allies.)

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Not especially glamorous, true; but it get the job done.
Program.FullCard.Name: Waylay
Program.FullCard.Notes: UDE Card Preview, Errata: Damage is Melee
Program.FullCard.Rules: Exhaust target ally. If your hero is stealthed, it deals melee damage to that ally equal to that ally's health.

Program.FullCard.Name: Wazix Blonktop
Program.FullCard.Rules: Untargetable

Program.FullCard.Flavor: He makes quite a first impression.
Program.FullCard.Name: Waz'luk
Program.FullCard.Rules: When Waz'luk enters play, he deals 1 fire damage to target hero.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Spirits be with you, mon."
Program.FullCard.Name: Wazzuli Wildmender
Program.FullCard.Rules: At the start of your turn, Wazzuli Wildmender heals 1 damage from each hero and ally in your party.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "How easily you let your guard down." - Savitir Skullsmasher
Program.FullCard.Name: Weakening Poison
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Attach to target hero or ally that was dealt combat damage by your hero this turn.
Ongoing: Attached character has -4 ATK.

Program.FullCard.Name: Weapon Mastery
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Fury Hero Required
Ongoing: When you play a Melee weapon, put a strength counter on Weapon Mastery.
Your Melee weapons have +1 ATK for each strength counter.

Program.FullCard.Name: Webster
Program.FullCard.Rules:
At the end of your turn, you may put a web counter on target ally.
Allies with a web counter can't attack.
When Webster leaves play, remove all web counters from opposing allies.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Many foes have fallen to Weeble's wrath.
Program.FullCard.Name: Weeble
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Protector
When Weeble enters play, draw two cards.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "As the last living Barov, I have rightful claim to all of my family's holdings!"
Program.FullCard.Name: Weldon Barov
Program.FullCard.Rules: At the end of your turn, put three Peasant ally tokens into play with 1 [Melee] ATK / 1 health and protector. At the end of the next turn, destroy them.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: You soften them up, and I'll finish them off.
Program.FullCard.Name: Wesley Shadowsworn

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "You're going to have to act your heart out." - Borok, Son of Oronok
Program.FullCard.Name: What Illidan Wants, Illidan Gets…
Program.FullCard.Rules:
If a Demon is in your party, pay 2 to complete this quest.
Reward: Draw a card.

Program.FullCard.Name: What's Haunting Witch Hill?
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Pay 2 and an additional 1 for each opposing face-up resource to complete this quest.
Reward: Draw a card.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "We haven't heard from the druids at the Cenarion Thicket of Terokkar Forest in quite some time." - Lethyn Moonfire
Program.FullCard.Name: What's Wrong at Cenarion Thicket?
Program.FullCard.Rules:
During your turn, pay 1 to complete this quest.
Reward: You and target opponent each draw a card.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Come, mortals, feed my babies."
Program.FullCard.Name: Whelp Pits, The
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Ongoing: At the start of your turn, if it's stage 2, roll a die and put that many Whelps into play.
Destroy The Whelp Pits Roll a die and put that many Whelps into play.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "I'm going to give you ten sticks of my special compound. You're going to take them over to Plaguewood and plant them inside the Scourge structures that I've had marked for detonation." - Smokey LaRue
Program.FullCard.Name: When Smokey Sings, I Get Violent
Program.FullCard.Rules:
During your turn, destroy When Smokey Sings, I Get Violent and pay 5 to complete this quest.
Reward: Target opponent destroys one of his resources.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: There is no safe haven from Magtheridon's rage.
Program.FullCard.Name: Whiplash
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Exhaust an opposing ally for each card above seven in your hand.
If Magtheridon is Unleashed, gain a Blood.

Program.FullCard.Name: Whirlwind
Program.FullCard.Rules: Your hero deals melee damage to each opposing ally equal the ATK of one of your Melee weapons.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "I have the whirlwind heart, and am ready to place it within your vessel of choice." - Bath'rah the Windwatcher
Program.FullCard.Name: Whirlwind Weapon
Program.FullCard.Rules:
On your turn: Pay 5 to complete this quest.
Reward: Your hero deals X melee damage to each opposing ally, where X is the ATK of a Melee weapon you control.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: The only sound you hear is the body hitting the ground.
Program.FullCard.Name: Whispering Blade of Slaying
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Your other daggers have +1 ATK.
Your hero has dual wield. (Can have a second one-handed Melee weapon instead of an Off-Hand equipment. Can strike with a second Melee weapon during the same combat.)

Program.FullCard.Name: Whitemane's Chapeau
Program.FullCard.Rules: When Whitemane's Chapeau enters play, you may put an ability card from your graveyard into your hand.

Program.FullCard.Name: Whiteout
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Your hero deals 3 frost damage to each opposing hero and ally.
Ongoing: Opposing heroes and allies can't attack unless their controller pays 1 for each attacker.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "If you are not careful, the blizzards of Alterac will punish your arrogance." - Captain Galvangar
Program.FullCard.Name: Whiteout Staff
Program.FullCard.Rules: When an [Alliance] ally is dealt frost or [Frost] damage, destroy it.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Come forth and quench your lust for battle once more!"
Program.FullCard.Name: Whitney Gravecaller
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Shadow Resistance
When this ally enters play, you may put target Death Knight or Undead ally from your graveyard into your hand.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "The greatest glory is to die in the master's service!" - Grand Widow Faerlina
Program.FullCard.Name: Widow's Fury
Program.FullCard.Rules: This weapon has +3 ATK if an ally you controlled was destroyed this turn.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Oh, she doesn't really eat them. She just drinks their blood. She loves blood."
Program.FullCard.Name: Wilba
Program.FullCard.Rules:
When a Spider in your party deals combat damage to an ally, destroy that ally.
3 Put a unique Spider ally token named Charlotte with 1 ATK and 1 health into play.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "What the Betrayer has done to this land is unforgivable."
Program.FullCard.Name: Wildwatcher Elandra
Program.FullCard.Rules: When Elandra enters play, target player shuffles his graveyard into his deck.

Program.FullCard.Name: Will of Arlokk
Program.FullCard.Rules:
When Will of Arlokk enters play, your hero heals 3 damage from target hero or ally.
1, Destroy Will of Arlokk Your hero heals 3 damage from target hero or ally.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Vermin! Leeches! Take my blood and choke on it!" - Magtheridon
Program.FullCard.Name: Will of the Legion
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Interrupt target ability, ally, or equipment card.
If Magtheridon is Unleashed, gain a Blood.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "I have planned for every eventuality!"
Program.FullCard.Name: Wimbly Tinkerton
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Protector
When Wimbly defends, draw a card.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "The unseen element can be either a soft breeze or a stiff punch in the gut." - Zagrun Wolfeye
Program.FullCard.Name: Wind Shear
Program.FullCard.Rules: Choose one or both: Interrupt target ability; or exhaust target hero or ally.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "The elements will bestow their energies on almost anything, provided the conduit is worthy enough." - Kinivus
Program.FullCard.Name: Windfury Infusion
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Attach to target ally or weapon.
Ongoing: Attached card has +3 ATK.
When attached card becomes exhausted for the first time each turn, you may ready it.

Program.FullCard.Name: Windfury Totem
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Totem (Can be attacked or targeted like an ally.)
Ongoing: When each hero or ally in your party attacks for the first time each turn, you may pay 1. If you do, ready that character.

Program.FullCard.Name: Windfury Weapon
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Attach to one of your Melee weapons.
Ongoing: When you strike with attached weapon for the first time each turn, you may pay 1. If you do, ready that weapon and your hero.

Program.FullCard.Name: Windseer Tarus
Program.FullCard.Rules: When Windseer Tarus attacks for the first time each turn, you may pay 1. If you do, ready him.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Let's see how you do in a fair fight."
Program.FullCard.Name: Windstriker Larun
Program.FullCard.Rules: Each ally has ATK equal to its printed ATK, has health equal to its printed health, and can't gain or lose ATK or health.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: When the wind begins to howl, take cover quickly.
Program.FullCard.Name: Windtalker's Wristguards
Program.FullCard.Rules: Reveal the top two cards of your deck, then put them on the bottom. If they have different card types, your hero deals 2 nature damage to target hero or ally.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Despite his strength, Gorebelly could not rise against the windstorm that pinned him to the cavern floor.
Program.FullCard.Name: Wing Buffet
Program.FullCard.Rules: Exhaust all opposing allies. They can't ready during their controllers' next ready step.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: The wound wasn't deep, but it was enough.
Program.FullCard.Name: Wing Clip
Program.FullCard.Rules: Target hero or ally can't attack your hero this turn. Your hero deals 1 melee damage to that character.

Program.FullCard.Name: Wing Clip
Program.FullCard.Rules: Target hero or ally can't attack your hero this turn. Your hero deals 1 melee damage to it.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Only his gnomish reflexes saved Timmo from the worst of it. Everyone else was flat on their backs in varying states of consciousness.
Program.FullCard.Name: Wing Storm
Program.FullCard.Rules: Exhaust all opposing allies.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "I already died once. I don't have any plans to do it again."
Program.FullCard.Name: Winston Duskhaven
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Shadow Resistance (Prevent all shadow ([Shadow]) damage that this ally would be dealt.)
2, Discard a card Target hero or ally has Shadow Resistance this turn.

Program.FullCard.Name: Winter's Grasp
Program.FullCard.Rules: Ongoing: Opposing allies can't attack heroes or allies in your party unless their controller pays 1 for each attacker.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: You have no choice but to adapt to these new surroundings. - Harona Proudmane
Program.FullCard.Name: Winter's Icy Embrace
Program.FullCard.Rules: Opposing heroes and allies lose and can't have Resistances.

Program.FullCard.Name: Winterstorm Totem
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Ongoing: At the start of each opponent's turn, Winterstorm Totem deals 1 frost damage to target hero or ally in that opponent's party. A character dealt damage this way can't attack this turn.
Totems can be attacked or targeted like allies.)

Program.FullCard.Name: Wipe or Snipe
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Choose one: Your hero deals 1 ranged damage to each of up to three target heroes and/or allies; or attach to target ally.
Ongoing: Attached ally has long-range.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Legends say that wisps are actually the disembodied spirits of deceased night elves.
Program.FullCard.Name: Wisp
Program.FullCard.Rules: At the start of your turn, if Wisp is in your graveyard, you may pay 1. If you do, put Wisp into your hand.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "It's best not to be messin' wit me."
Program.FullCard.Name: Witch Doctor Koo'zar
Program.FullCard.Rules: 1, Flip Koo'zar Ready up to three target resources.

Program.FullCard.Name: Witch's Bane, The
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Pay 3 to complete this quest.
Reward: Draw a card for each five opposing face-down resources.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "These new battle plans will surely snatch defeat from the jaws of victory."
Program.FullCard.Name: Withdraw
Program.FullCard.Rules: Put target ally into its owner's hand.

Program.FullCard.Name: Withering Decay
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Attach to target hero.
Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 1 shadow damage to attached hero.
On your turn, allies in attached hero's party have -1 [Health].

Program.FullCard.Name: Withering Shout
Program.FullCard.Rules: Ongoing: Opposing allies have -1 health.

Program.FullCard.Name: Woe or Grow
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Choese one: Your hero deals 2 unpreventable holy damage to target ally; or attach to target ally.
Ongoing: Attached ally has +2 health.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Begone! You have no place here."
Program.FullCard.Name: Woodsie Leafsong
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Shadowmeld (Elusive and untargetable while ready.)
When Woodsie deals combat damage to an opponent's defending hero, you may destroy target ability or equipment he controls.

Program.FullCard.Name: Wooly White Rhino
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Frost Resistance
You pay 1 less to complete quests. When you place a resource face up, choose one: Your hero can't be protected against this turn; or the next time your hero would deal damage this turn, it's unpreventable.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Don't worry, I will ensure that your death is not in vain." - Omedus the Punisher
Program.FullCard.Name: Word of Blight
Program.FullCard.Rules: Your hero deals shadow damage to target ally equal to the number of allies in your graveyard.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: One swing can turn any Azeroth into Draenor.
Program.FullCard.Name: World Breaker
Program.FullCard.Rules: On your turn: 6, , Destroy World Breaker Destroy all resources.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: The trail of the Burning Legion scorched Azeroth, leaving nothing but cinder and ash in the Legion's wake.
Program.FullCard.Name: World in Flames
Program.FullCard.Rules: Ongoing: If your hero would deal fire damage, it deals double that amount of damage instead.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "He seems to believe it will allow him to see into a "world of shadows" where the arakkoa's true leaders dwell." - Severin
Program.FullCard.Name: World of Shadows
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Pay 4 to complete this quest.
Reward: Draw a card, and target hero or ally you control has Shadow Resistance this turn. (Prevent all shadow ([Shadow]) damage that it would be dealt.)

Program.FullCard.Flavor: “You’re lucky; instilling terror is the kindest thing on my agenda.”
Program.FullCard.Name: Wormwood
Program.FullCard.Rules: 1, Put 1 damage on Wormwood Put target ally into its owner's hand.

Program.FullCard.Name: Wound Poison
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Attach to target hero or ally that was dealt combat damage by your hero this turn.
Ongoing: Attached character can't be healed.
At the start of your turn, your hero deals 1 nature damage to attached character.

Program.FullCard.Name: Wraith Scythe
Program.FullCard.Rules: When your hero deals combat damage, it heals that amount of damage from itself.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: I hope your plan is to hit him from far away…" - Umbrage
Program.FullCard.Name: Wraith Spear
Program.FullCard.Rules: When you strike with this weapon while your hero is defending, it heals 4 damage from itself.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Use these wraps with caution, for they contain otherworldly power." - Nuvon Dawnfury
Program.FullCard.Name: Wraps of the Astral Traveler
Program.FullCard.Rules: On your turn: 3, Remove target opposing ability, ally, or equipment from the game. Its owner puts it into play at the start of your next turn.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Nature's fury is awesome to behold.
Program.FullCard.Name: Wrath
Program.FullCard.Rules: Your hero deals 3 nature damage to target hero or ally.

Program.FullCard.Name: Wrath
Program.FullCard.Rules: Your hero deals 3 nature damage to target hero or ally.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: In truth, dragons do not seek out gold for their lairs. They simply horde what treasures remain from those they destroy.
Program.FullCard.Name: Wrath of Onyxia
Program.FullCard.Rules: Destroy all opposing allies.

Program.FullCard.Name: Wrath of Ragnaros
Program.FullCard.Rules: Destroy target ally. Ragnaros deals fire damage equal to that ally's cost to a hero in that ally's party.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Faith alone is not enough to stop the enemies of the Light." Prince Arthas Menethil
Program.FullCard.Name: Wrath of Turalyon
Program.FullCard.Rules: Destroy all allies that attacked this turn.

Program.FullCard.Name: Wrathtide Longbow
Program.FullCard.Rules:
When you strike with Wrathtide Longbow, your hero has long-range this combat.
When an opposing ally enters play, your hero deals 1 ranged damage to it.

Program.FullCard.Name: Wreck
Program.FullCard.Rules: Interrupt target equipment card.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "When Icecrown Citadel lies in ruins at our feet, then all of Azeroth can breath a sigh of relief." - Esonea
Program.FullCard.Name: Wrecking Crew
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Arms Hero Required
Interrupt target equipment. If you do, put three 0 [Melee] / 1 [Health] Warrior ally tokens into play with Assault 2.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: A steadied hand strikes true.
Program.FullCard.Name: Wristguards of True Flight
Program.FullCard.Rules: When you strike with a weapon, your hero has long-range this combat. (Defenders deal no combat damage to it.)

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Cursed by Hex Lord Malacrass himself.
Program.FullCard.Name: Wub's Cursed Hexblade
Program.FullCard.Rules: 2, Destroy Wub's Cursed Hexblade Destroy target ally. If an opponent went first this game, put a card with the same name as that ally from a graveyard into your party.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: The shadows conceal the real threat.
Program.FullCard.Name: Wyler Surestrike
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Shadowmeld (Elusive and untargetable while ready.)
When Wyler deals combat damage to a defending ally, destroy that ally.
Program.FullCard.Rulings: [DoW Rules FAQ] Destroy that ally even if Wyler was destroyed by the exchange of combat damage that triggered his power.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Stand back and watch me work."
Program.FullCard.Name: Wyndarr Shadefist
Program.FullCard.Rules: This ally has Stealth while an opponent controls an ally with cost 4 or less.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "As the Light shines, so shall we."
Program.FullCard.Name: Wyneth Harridan
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Protector
3, Destroy target Undead ally.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "I move as swiftly and softly as the breeze."
Program.FullCard.Name: Wynnd the Spry
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Elusive (Can't be attacked.)
Wynnd has +1 ATK for each exhausted opposing resource.

Program.FullCard.Name: Wyrmwing Treads
Program.FullCard.Rules: 1, Exhaust a Dragonkin you control Ready target exhausted ally.

Program.FullCard.Name: Wysko
Program.FullCard.Rules: Your weapons have +1 ATK while your hero is attacking.

Program.FullCard.Name: Wyvern Sting
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Survival Hero Required
Attach to target ally, or target hero or ally if you control a Ranged weapon.
Ongoing: Attached character can't attack or exhaust unless its controller pays 2.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "My advice? Hold on and don't let go." - Landro Longshot
Program.FullCard.Name: X-51 Nether-Rocket
Program.FullCard.Rules:
1, Target Horde ally in your party has ferocity this turn. At end of turn, destroy it.
1, Target Alliance ally in your party can use powers this turn. At end of turn, destroy it.

Program.FullCard.Name: Xanata the Lightsworn
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Aldor Reputation (Can't put Scryer cards in your deck.)
Protector
If Xanata would be dealt combat damage while defending, prevent 2 of it.

Program.FullCard.Name: Xavar the Resourceful
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Aldor Reputation (Can't put Scryer cards in your deck.)
Inspire: Resource (Ready one of your resources during each other player's ready step.)

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "It will not be I who fights you."
Program.FullCard.Name: Xela the Tormentor
Program.FullCard.Rules: When Xela enters play, you may put a Pet card from your graveyard into play if its cost is less than or equal to the number of resources you have.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "I bring with me the darkness from the depths of the abyss. Look for yourself."
Program.FullCard.Name: Xerandaal, Shade Servitor
Program.FullCard.Rules: If you control another Priest: Flip Xerandaal Xerandaal deals 3 shadow damage to target hero.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "You wish to enslave me? What an ignorant darling you are!"
Program.FullCard.Name: Xia, Queen of Suffering
Program.FullCard.Rules:
FRONT: Flip Xia Gain control of target ally. Use only on your turn.
BACK: Deckbuilding: You can include only neutral quests, any [Warlock] abilities, and any [Warlock] allies with ally type Warlock. You can’t include cards with reputation or text restrictions (like Fire Hero Required).

Program.FullCard.Flavor: (We've been expecting you.)
Program.FullCard.Name: Xi'ri
Program.FullCard.Rules: At the end of your turn, destroy all Demons.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "You wouldn't like me when I'm angry, mon."
Program.FullCard.Name: Ya'mon
Program.FullCard.Rules: Ya'mon has +1 ATK for each damage on him.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Nature has many allies. You shall not prevail against all of them."
Program.FullCard.Name: Yanna Dai'shalan
Program.FullCard.Rules: 3, Flip Yanna Dai'shalan Yanna deals 1 nature damage to target ally for each ally in your party. Use only on your turn.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Gimme somethin' to break."
Program.FullCard.Name: Ya'za the Vandal
Program.FullCard.Rules: When Ya'za enters play, you may destroy target armor or item.

Program.FullCard.Name: Yellowspine
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Long Range (Defenders deal no combat damage to this character.)
Other allies in your party can protect Yellowspine.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: We have been chosen by the Lich King to serve him in life and, upon our ascension, in death.
Program.FullCard.Name: Ymirheim Chosen Warrior
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Scourge Hero Required
Protector (This ally may exhaust to become the defender when an opposing hero or ally attacks.)
When this ally enters play, you may search your deck for an ally with the same name, reveal it, and put it into your hand.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Allow me to lighten your load."
Program.FullCard.Name: Yoink!
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Attach to target equipment.
Ongoing: You control attached equipment.
Program.FullCard.Rulings: [BoG Rules FAQ] Move that equipment to your hero row. It functions normally whether or not it shares any trait icons with your hero, and regardless of any other deck-building restrictions it has (such as Fire Hero Required).

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Should you defeat the Defiler, bring back his horn. It will become a symbol of hope for all that view it - proof that heroes do exist in this war-torn world." - Fallen Hero of the Horde
Program.FullCard.Name: You Are Rakh'likh, Demon
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Pay 4 to complete this quest.
Reward: Draw a card, or two cards if a Demon is in your party.

Program.FullCard.Name: You, Robot
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Pay 1 to complete this quest.
Reward: Equipment card in your hand are instant this turn.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Fortune favors the bold.
Program.FullCard.Name: Your Fortune Awaits You
