Program.FullCard.Rules:
Pay 3 to complete this quest.
Reward: Draw a card.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "I must seek answers from within the Emerald Dream."
Program.FullCard.Name: Ysera the Dreamer
Program.FullCard.Rules:
You pay 1 less to play Ysera for each face-down resource you control.
Mend 3
At the start of your turn, you may draw a card.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "The Eye of the Storm must be seized for the Horde!"
Program.FullCard.Name: Yula the Fair
Program.FullCard.Rules: Pay 2 or remove an honor counter from a card you control Prevent the next 1 damage that Yula would be dealt this turn.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "The Earthmother has taught me much, and now I look ti the Sun to teach me further."
Program.FullCard.Name: Yuna Sunridge
Program.FullCard.Rules: FRONT: 3 Flip Yuna. BACK: Mend 1 (At the start of your turn, Yuna may heal 1 damage from target hero or ally.)

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "If joo gonna hesitate, joo gonna fell da pain."
Program.FullCard.Name: Zaduru
Program.FullCard.Rules: This ally has Assault 1 for each ready opposing resource.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "The Warchief has made his declaration. Northrend must be purged of the plague of undeath and all those who carry it."
Program.FullCard.Name: Zagrun Wolfeye
Program.FullCard.Rules: If you control another Shaman: Flip Zagrun Put a +1 ATK counter on target Melee weapon.

Program.FullCard.Name: Zag'zil
Program.FullCard.Rules: X, Flip Zag'zil Destroy target weapon with cost X. Use only on your turn.

Program.FullCard.Name: Zaistor the Vigilant
Program.FullCard.Rules: 1, Destroy Zaistor Target hero or ally can't be destroyed this turn.

Program.FullCard.Name: Zakis Trickstab
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Elusive (This ally can't be attacked.)
Stealth (This ally can't be protected against.)

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "If they try to advance, I will strike them down."
Program.FullCard.Name: Zalan Ragewind
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Protector
When an opponent's hero readies, you may pay 1. If you do, destroy target ability or equipment that opponent controls.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Bring me his head, and I will know his reign of evil is over." - Master Gadrin
Program.FullCard.Name: Zalazane
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Troll Hero Required
During your turn, pay 3 to complete this quest.
Reward: Target player discards a card.

Program.FullCard.Name: Zandar Shadesprocket
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Elusive (Can't be attacked.)
When Zandar is dealt damage, also put that much on your hero.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "I'm going to have to do something about the giants if I stay out here!" - Zorbin Fandazzle
Program.FullCard.Name: Zapped Giants
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Pay 2 to complete this quest.
Reward: Reveal the top three cards of your deck. Put revealed ability card into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.
Program.FullCard.Rulings: [Paul Ross 9/3/2006] Any time you put cards on the top or bottom of your deck, you can put them in any order.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "I beseech the wind and sky - heed me now and hear my cry!"
Program.FullCard.Name: Zaritha
Program.FullCard.Rules: 2, Flip Zaritha Zaritha heals 5 damage from target hero or ally.

Program.FullCard.Name: Zari'zari
Program.FullCard.Rules: Berserking (+1 ATK for each damage.)

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "My devotion will be an example to you all. Long after I'm gone, you will remember."
Program.FullCard.Name: Zealot Kalinov
Program.FullCard.Rules: While this ally is in your graveyard, your hero has Mend 1.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: The shadows offer shelter to their children.
Program.FullCard.Name: Zempre, Grace of Elune
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Night Elf Hero Required
Shadowmeld
Prevent all damage that would be dealt to your hero while Zempre is exhausted.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "I have drunk the life energies of my bitterest enemy, and they were sweet beyond the telling."
Program.FullCard.Name: Zenith Shadowforce
Program.FullCard.Notes: From the Through the Dark Portal FAQ
Program.FullCard.Rules: 2, Flip Zenith Shadowforce Turn target opposing hero face down.
Program.FullCard.Rulings: [TDP Rules FAQ] Turning a hero face down does not use its flip power. Your opponent can flip the target hero in response if able. If the target hero is already face down as Zenith’s effect resolves, nothing happens. Using Zenith’s power has no impact on flip effects already on the chain.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: Nature, when in balance, gives and takes with equal fervor.
Program.FullCard.Name: Zephyr
Program.FullCard.Rules: Choose one: Your hero deals 1 nature damage to target hero or ally; or your hero heals 1 damage from target hero or ally.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Life always be shining through, mon, even in da darkest of times."
Program.FullCard.Name: Zerzu
Program.FullCard.Rules: When this ally enters play, she heals all damage from [Nature] allies you control.

Program.FullCard.Name: Zhar'doom, Greatstaff of the Devourer
Program.FullCard.Rules: 1, Exhaust your hero, remove three ability cards in your graveyard from the game Your hero deals 3 shadow damage to target hero or ally and heals 3 damage from itself.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: The Darkspear thrive under pressure.
Program.FullCard.Name: Zi'mo
Program.FullCard.Rules: Berserking (+1 ATK for each damage.)

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "Before joo know it, joo be dead."
Program.FullCard.Name: Zi'mo the Empowered
Program.FullCard.Rules: 1, Flip Zi'mo Zi'mo has +2 ATK while damaged this turn.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: You face the weapon of a god. Run.
Program.FullCard.Name: Zin'rokh, Destroyer of Worlds
Program.FullCard.Rules: When your hero deals combat damage with Zin'rokh, destroy all other abilities, allies, equipment, and resources.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: The cries of laughter upon seeing the tallstrider quickly turn to cries of pain.
Program.FullCard.Name: Zip
Program.FullCard.Rules: Ferocity (Can't attack immediately.)

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "So much killing. So little time."
Program.FullCard.Name: Zomm Hopeslayer
Program.FullCard.Rules: X, Flip Zomm Hopeslayer Put X Combo cards from your removed from game zone into your graveyard.

Program.FullCard.Flavor: "I left Exodar to search for my daughter, but all I found was more trouble."
Program.FullCard.Name: Zophos
Program.FullCard.Rules:
Protector
When Zophos defends, he deals 3 unpreventable holy damage to target attacking ally.
